endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Custom Script Code
//*
//***************************************************************************

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Sound Assets
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitSounds takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_snd_Theme="Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\Comradeship.mp3"
    set gg_snd_Doom="Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\Doom.mp3"
    set gg_snd_HolyWarEnding="Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\HeroicVictory.mp3"
    set gg_snd_NewRound=CreateSound("Sound\\Interface\\QuestNew.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_NewRound, 3750)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_NewRound, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_NewRound, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_NewRound, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_SargerasTheme="Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\PH1.mp3"
    set gg_snd_StartDuel=CreateSound("Sound\\Interface\\ArrangedTeamInvitation.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_StartDuel, 2914)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_StartDuel, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_StartDuel, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_StartDuel, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_StartGame=CreateSound("Sound\\Interface\\GameFound.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_StartGame, 7488)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_StartGame, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_StartGame, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_StartGame, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_StartTournament=CreateSound("Sound\\Interface\\NewTournament.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_StartTournament, 7987)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_StartTournament, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_StartTournament, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_StartTournament, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_Victory=CreateSound("Sound\\Interface\\ClanInvitation.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_Victory, 4295)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_Victory, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_Victory, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_Victory, 1.0)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer0()
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer9()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateAllUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNeutralHostileBuildings()
    call CreateNeutralPassiveBuildings()
    call CreatePlayerBuildings()
    call CreateNeutralHostile()
    call CreateNeutralPassive()
    call CreatePlayerUnits()
endfunction

function CreateRegions takes nothing returns nothing
    local weathereffect we

    set gg_rct_vision01=Rect(- 7680.0, - 8832.0, - 4608.0, - 4480.0)
    set gg_rct_level01=Rect(- 7296.0, 5888.0, - 6400.0, 6784.0)
    set gg_rct_level02=Rect(- 6400.0, 5888.0, - 5376.0, 6912.0)
    set gg_rct_level03=Rect(- 5376.0, 5888.0, - 4352.0, 6912.0)

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Cameras
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateCameras takes nothing returns nothing

    set gg_cam_winCam1=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 327.8, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 318.7, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1996.5, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 100.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_winCam1, - 6568.8, 3343.7, 0.0)

    set gg_cam_winCam2=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 209.8, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 322.3, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1996.5, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 100.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_winCam2, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_winCam2, - 5911.9, 3209.5, 0.0)

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Triggers
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Matrix speed teleport
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Matrix_speed_teleport_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Matrix_speed_teleport_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_Matrix_speed_teleport_Func002C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "locustswarm")
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 700.00, 700.00))
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NECancelDeath\\NECancelDeath.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Matrix_speed_teleport takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Matrix_speed_teleport=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Matrix_speed_teleport)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Matrix_speed_teleport, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Matrix_speed_teleport, function Trig_Matrix_speed_teleport_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

endfunction

    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse, function Trig_heavyDrugAbuse_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set Unique Units
//
// Dark Gift Sargeras
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func066Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap(udg_UniqueUnits[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func067A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('e009', 2, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func068A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h015', 3, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func069A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('n016', 6, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func070A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('n00O', 5, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func071A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('e00H', 2, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func072A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('e00B', 8, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func073A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('u00R', 8, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func074A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h01N', 8, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func075A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('o01H', 10, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func076A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('e00X', 4, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func077A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('e011', 4, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func078A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('u010', 4, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func079A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('u00L', 4, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func080A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('u00E', 4, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DoNotSaveReplay()
    // by default UniqueUnits[0]=Aeris, if you need, add new unique unit with index from 0 to 27
    // Default array length of <UniqueUnits> is 27
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
    set udg_UniqueUnits[1]='u007'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[2]='u00H'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[3]='h00K'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[4]='e00E'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[5]='e00A'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[6]='h01D'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[7]='u00J'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[8]='e015'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[9]='h00G'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[10]='h011'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[11]='h010'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[12]='o00V'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[13]='u00G'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[14]='n01D'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[15]='n01K'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[16]='n01M'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[17]='h00D'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[18]='h00J'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[19]='o00X'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[20]='e00G'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[21]='o00X'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[22]='h01E'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[23]='o00H'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[24]='o00Z'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[25]='h01K'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[26]='o00Y'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[27]='nmpe'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[28]='u00N'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[29]='e00K'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[30]='e00J'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[31]='h01N'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[32]='h01O'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[33]='h01R'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[34]='h01Q'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[35]='o018'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[36]='e00O'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[37]='n01P'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[38]='e00V'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[39]='o01J'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[40]='e00Y'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[41]='n03B'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[42]='h021'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[43]='u00W'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[44]='o01M'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[45]='h020'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[46]='h023'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[47]='h025'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[48]='u00Y'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[49]='u00Z'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[50]='n03N'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[51]='e014'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[52]='o01P'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[53]='h026'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[54]='h028'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[55]='h029'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[56]='e015'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[57]='o01T'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[58]='h02A'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[59]='h02B'
    set udg_UniqueUnits[60]='h02H'
    // change number in cycle if you add new unique units
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=60
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func066Func001A)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func067A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func068A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func069A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func070A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func071A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func072A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func073A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func074A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func075A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func076A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func077A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func078A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func079A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Func080A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Set_Unique_Units takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Set_Unique_Units=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_Unique_Units, function Trig_Set_Unique_Units_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set DarkPortalOrks
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_DarkPortalOrks_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_OrksDrenorPortal[1]='o000'
    set udg_OrksDrenorPortal[2]='o001'
    set udg_OrksDrenorPortal[3]='o002'
    set udg_OrksDrenorPortal[4]='o008'
    set udg_OrksDrenorPortal[5]='o004'
    set udg_OrksDrenorPortal[6]='o005'
    // Surprice Box Set
    set udg_SmallSurpriceBox[1]='nanw'
    set udg_SmallSurpriceBox[2]='nspr'
    set udg_SmallSurpriceBox[3]='nmrl'
    set udg_SmallSurpriceBox[4]='nmrr'
    set udg_SmallSurpriceBox[5]='nwlt'
    set udg_SmallSurpriceBox[6]='ncer'
    set udg_SmallSurpriceBox[7]='ntrv'
    set udg_SmallSurpriceBox[8]='nnht'
    set udg_SmallSurpriceBox[9]='nscb'
    // Surprice Box Set
    set udg_MediumSurpriceBox[1]='nwlg'
    set udg_MediumSurpriceBox[2]='nstl'
    set udg_MediumSurpriceBox[3]='nssp'
    set udg_MediumSurpriceBox[4]='nhrh'
    set udg_MediumSurpriceBox[5]='ncks'
    set udg_MediumSurpriceBox[6]='nbzk'
    set udg_MediumSurpriceBox[7]='ngrk'
    set udg_MediumSurpriceBox[8]='nomg'
    set udg_MediumSurpriceBox[9]='nbda'
    // Big Box Set
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[1]='ntkc'
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[2]='nsgg'
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[3]='nfgb'
    // Range Box Set
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[4]='ners'
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[5]='nsll'
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[6]='nwzd'
    // Air Box Set
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[7]='nrdr'
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[8]='ugar'
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[9]='nndr'
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[10]='nhrq'
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[11]='nrdr'
    set udg_BigSurpriceBox[12]='nndr'
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Set_DarkPortalOrks=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_DarkPortalOrks, function Trig_Set_DarkPortalOrks_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set NozdormuRegions
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_NozdormuRegions_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_NozdormuRegion[1]=gg_rct_team1spawn1
    set udg_NozdormuRegion[2]=gg_rct_team1spawn2
    set udg_NozdormuRegion[3]=gg_rct_team1spawn3
    set udg_NozdormuRegion[4]=gg_rct_team2spawn1
    set udg_NozdormuRegion[5]=gg_rct_BattleRoyal2
    set udg_NozdormuRegion[6]=gg_rct_BattleRoyal5
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Set_NozdormuRegions=CreateTrigger()

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: killingGoldBonus
//===========================================================================
function Trig_killingGoldBonus_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_pkc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))]=( udg_pkc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))] + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_killingGoldBonus takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_killingGoldBonus=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_killingGoldBonus, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_killingGoldBonus, function Trig_killingGoldBonus_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TransformationBlock
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TransformationBlock_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A03H' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04R' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04L' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04T' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04H' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07K' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0E5' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_TransformationBlock_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_TransformationBlock_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TransformationBlock_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_visionMain, udg_l[0]) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_visionDuels, udg_l[0]) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_visionBossBattle, udg_l[0]) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_teamBattleArena, udg_l[0]) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_TransformationBlock_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_TransformationBlock_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TransformationBlock_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    if ( Trig_TransformationBlock_Func003C() ) then
    else
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "stop")
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TransformationBlock takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TransformationBlock=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TransformationBlock, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TransformationBlock, Condition(function Trig_TransformationBlock_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TransformationBlock, function Trig_TransformationBlock_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: RandomUnitsList
//===========================================================================
function Trig_RandomUnitsList_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Q
    set udg_RUL1[1]='h001'
    set udg_RUL1[2]='h00V'
    set udg_RUL1[3]='o000'
    set udg_RUL1[4]='o009'
    set udg_RUL1[5]='u000'
    set udg_RUL1[6]='u006'
    set udg_RUL1[7]='n00H'
    set udg_RUL1[8]='n015'
    set udg_RUL1[9]='n00S'
    set udg_RUL1[10]='h00N'
    set udg_RUL1[11]='o00O'
    set udg_RUL1[12]='o00N'
    set udg_RUL1[13]='o00S'
    // W
    set udg_RUL2[1]='h00X'
    set udg_RUL2[2]='n002'
    set udg_RUL2[3]='o00B'
    set udg_RUL2[4]='o001'
    set udg_RUL2[5]='n00G'
    set udg_RUL2[6]='u00B'
    set udg_RUL2[7]='e001'
    set udg_RUL2[8]='n01G'
    set udg_RUL2[9]='e00D'
    set udg_RUL2[10]='h013'
    set udg_RUL2[11]='o00T'
    set udg_RUL2[12]='o00Q'
    set udg_RUL2[13]='h00L'
    // E
    set udg_RUL3[1]='h002'
    set udg_RUL3[2]='h00W'
    set udg_RUL3[3]='o00D'
    set udg_RUL3[4]='o002'
    set udg_RUL3[5]='u001'
    set udg_RUL3[6]='n00L'
    set udg_RUL3[7]='e019'
    set udg_RUL3[8]='n01O'
    set udg_RUL3[9]='e00C'
    set udg_RUL3[10]='o00L'
    set udg_RUL3[11]='h015'
    set udg_RUL3[12]='o00U'
    set udg_RUL3[13]='o00P'
    // R
    set udg_RUL4[1]='h01D'
    set udg_RUL4[2]='nmpe'
    set udg_RUL4[3]='o00R'
    set udg_RUL4[4]='o00K'
    set udg_RUL4[5]='e003'
    set udg_RUL4[6]='e00F'
    set udg_RUL4[7]='e00B'
    set udg_RUL4[8]='u003'
    set udg_RUL4[9]='u00C'
    set udg_RUL4[10]='o003'
    set udg_RUL4[11]='o00E'
    set udg_RUL4[12]='h019'
    set udg_RUL4[13]='e000'
    // A
    set udg_RUL5[1]='h006'
    set udg_RUL5[2]='h01B'
    set udg_RUL5[3]='o006'
    set udg_RUL5[4]='o00G'
    set udg_RUL5[5]='u004'
    set udg_RUL5[6]='u00E'
    set udg_RUL5[7]='e005'
    set udg_RUL5[8]='h00Q'
    set udg_RUL5[9]='n016'
    set udg_RUL5[10]='h027'
    // S
    set udg_RUL6[1]='h00M'
    set udg_RUL6[2]='e00H'
    set udg_RUL6[3]='n01I'
    set udg_RUL6[4]='n03R'
    set udg_RUL6[5]='u00R'
    set udg_RUL6[6]='n03T'
    set udg_RUL6[7]='o00F'
    set udg_RUL6[8]='o007'
    set udg_RUL6[9]='o01H'
    set udg_RUL6[10]='n03U'
    // D
    set udg_RUL7[1]='h00H'
    set udg_RUL7[2]='h029'
    set udg_RUL7[3]='o00W'
    set udg_RUL7[4]='o01S'
    set udg_RUL7[5]='n03S'
    set udg_RUL7[6]='n03N'
    set udg_RUL7[7]='e00N'
    set udg_RUL7[8]='n018'
    set udg_RUL7[9]='e013'
    set udg_RUL7[10]='o01Q'
    // F
    set udg_RUL8[1]='h00O'
    set udg_RUL8[2]='o01C'
    set udg_RUL8[3]='o01T'
    set udg_RUL8[4]='e009'
    set udg_RUL8[5]='e00E'
    set udg_RUL8[6]='e011'
    set udg_RUL8[7]='u012'
    set udg_RUL8[8]='u010'
    set udg_RUL8[9]='o01P'
    set udg_RUL8[10]='o01R'
    set udg_RUL8[11]='h028'
    set udg_RUL8[12]='h021'
    // Z
    set udg_RUL9[1]='h01Q'
    set udg_RUL9[2]='h02B'
    set udg_RUL9[3]='o00H'
    set udg_RUL9[4]='o00Z'
    set udg_RUL9[5]='u00Z'
    set udg_RUL9[6]='u007'
    set udg_RUL9[7]='n03B'
    set udg_RUL9[8]='e00A'
    set udg_RUL9[9]='n01D'
    set udg_RUL9[10]='h026'
    // X
    set udg_RUL10[1]='h00G'
    set udg_RUL10[2]='h02A'
    set udg_RUL10[3]='o00Y'
    set udg_RUL10[4]='o01M'
    set udg_RUL10[5]='u00G'
    set udg_RUL10[6]='u00Y'
    set udg_RUL10[7]='e00Y'
    set udg_RUL10[8]='n01K'
    set udg_RUL10[9]='e00G'
    set udg_RUL10[10]='h00J'
    // C
    set udg_RUL11[1]='h00K'
    set udg_RUL11[2]='e008'
    set udg_RUL11[3]='n01M'
    set udg_RUL11[4]='e015'
    set udg_RUL11[5]='u00H'
    set udg_RUL11[6]='u00W'
    set udg_RUL11[7]='o00V'
    set udg_RUL11[8]='o00X'
    set udg_RUL11[9]='h011'
    set udg_RUL11[10]='h010'
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RandomUnitsList, function Trig_RandomUnitsList_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: RandomRaceSpellList
//===========================================================================
function Trig_RandomRaceSpellList_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0CZ'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0DB'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0D1'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0DC'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0D3'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0D8'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0CY'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0DD'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0D4'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0D9'
    set udg_raceAbilityId=( udg_raceAbilityId + 1 )
    set udg_RRS[udg_raceAbilityId]='A0D6'
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: RandomUnitsSet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 15.00, ( "Q" + GetUnitName(GetEnumUnit()) ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, GetEnumPlayer())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, GetEnumPlayer())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, GetEnumPlayer())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())

    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())

    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])

    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())

    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, GetEnumPlayer())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())

    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())

    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])

    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())

function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func046A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, GetEnumPlayer())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer())
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    // Q
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 13
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL1[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL1[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 15.00, GetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit()))
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(12, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func005A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func006A)
    // W
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 13
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL2[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL2[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(12, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func009A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func010A)
    // E
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 13
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL3[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL3[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(12, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func013A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func014A)
    // R
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 13
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL4[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL4[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(12, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func017A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func018A)
    // A
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL5[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL5[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func021A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func022A)
    // S
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL6[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL6[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func025A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func026A)
    // D
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL7[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL7[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func029A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func030A)
    // F
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 12
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL8[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL8[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(11, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func033A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func034A)
    // Z
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL9[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL9[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func037A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func038A)
    // X
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL10[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL10[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func041A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func042A)
    // C
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL11[udg_R], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL11[udg_R], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func045A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Func046A)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02G', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R006', 1, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_randomAbility[udg_ip]=GetRandomInt(1, 11)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_RRS[udg_randomAbility[udg_ip]], GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 15.00, GetAbilityName(udg_RRS[udg_randomAbility[udg_ip]]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\WorldEditUI\\Editor-MultipleUnits.blp")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_RandomUnitsSet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_RandomUnitsSet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_RandomUnitsSet, Condition(function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RandomUnitsSet, function Trig_RandomUnitsSet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: RandomReRoll
//===========================================================================
function Trig_RandomReRoll_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'Roch' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 15.00, ( "Q" + GetUnitName(GetEnumUnit()) ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func017A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func018A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func021A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func022A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func025A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func026A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func029A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func030A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func033A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func034A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func037A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func038A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func041A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func042A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func045A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func046A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_RandomReRoll_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    // Q
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 13
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL1[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL1[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 15.00, GetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit()))
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(12, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func005A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func006A)
    // W
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 13
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL2[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL2[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(12, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func009A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func010A)
    // E
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 13
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL3[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL3[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(12, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func013A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func014A)
    // R
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 13
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL4[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL4[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(12, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func017A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func018A)
    // A
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL5[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL5[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func021A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func022A)
    // S
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL6[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL6[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func025A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func026A)
    // D
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL7[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL7[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func029A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func030A)
    // F
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 12
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL8[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL8[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(11, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func033A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func034A)
    // Z
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL9[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL9[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func037A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func038A)
    // X
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL10[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL10[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func041A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func042A)
    // C
    set udg_R=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_R > 10
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_RUL11[udg_R], false, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_RUL11[udg_R], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip])
        set udg_R=udg_R + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(9, udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func045A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_randomUnitsGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_RandomReRoll_Func046A)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_RRS[udg_randomAbility[udg_ip]], GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_randomAbility[udg_ip]=GetRandomInt(1, 11)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_RRS[udg_randomAbility[udg_ip]], GetTriggerUnit())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 15.00, GetAbilityName(udg_RRS[udg_randomAbility[udg_ip]]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\WorldEditUI\\Editor-MultipleUnits.blp")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_RandomReRoll takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_RandomReRoll=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_RandomReRoll, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_RandomReRoll, Condition(function Trig_RandomReRoll_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RandomReRoll, function Trig_RandomReRoll_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameTime
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameTime_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, udg_min)
endfunction

function Trig_GameTime_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_min=( udg_min + 1 )
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_GameTime_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameTime takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameTime=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_GameTime, 60.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameTime, function Trig_GameTime_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kick AFK
//
// 
// Листья с клена падают, с ясеня...
// Нихуя себе, нихуя себе!
// Я смотрю на них, и действительно
// Охуительно, охуительно!
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kick_AFK_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kick_AFK_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerValue[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kick_AFK_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Kick_AFK_Func002Func001C() ) then
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_players)
        call CustomDefeatBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), "TRIGSTR_6423")
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Kick_AFK_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_Kick_AFK_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kick_AFK takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kick_AFK=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Kick_AFK, 180.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Kick_AFK, Condition(function Trig_Kick_AFK_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kick_AFK, function Trig_Kick_AFK_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: StartModeSelect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_StartModeSelect_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_modeSelect), 0)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_modeSelect)
    set udg_modeVision[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
endfunction

function Trig_StartModeSelect_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_StartModeSelect_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_StartModeSelect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_StartModeSelect_Func001A)
    if ( Trig_StartModeSelect_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1850", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0380), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 50.00, 50.00, 50.00, 0)
        set udg_floats[3]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
        call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0379, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
        set udg_MSMain=2
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_ncp3_0380, 50.00, 50.00, 50.00, 0)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_ModeClassic)
    else
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1852", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0380), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        set udg_floats[3]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
        call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0380, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
        set udg_MSMain=1
    endif
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1798", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0379), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    set udg_floats[4]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_9278", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0009), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    set udg_floats[12]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    if ( Trig_StartModeSelect_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1849", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0381), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 50.00, 50.00, 50.00, 0)
        set udg_floats[5]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_ncp3_0381, 50.00, 50.00, 50.00, 0)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_ModeTournament)
    else
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1848", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0381), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        set udg_floats[5]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    endif
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1800", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0128), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    set udg_floats[6]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1801", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0127), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    set udg_floats[7]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1802", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0376), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    set udg_floats[8]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1803", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0382), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    set udg_floats[9]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1804", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0383), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    set udg_floats[10]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_1805", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0384), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    set udg_floats[11]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_942", OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp3_0010), - 256.00, 128.00), 0, 10.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    set udg_floats[20]=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0127, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
    set udg_MSSpeed=2
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0382, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
    set udg_MSPick=1
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(gg_unit_hrdh_0385, Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_StartModeSelect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_StartModeSelect=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_StartModeSelect, 0.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_StartModeSelect, function Trig_StartModeSelect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ModeClassic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ModeClassic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'hrdh' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeClassic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MSMain=1
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0380, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0379, PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0381, PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0009, PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetTextTagTextBJ(udg_floats[6], "TRIGSTR_1809", 10)
    call SetTextTagTextBJ(udg_floats[7], "TRIGSTR_1810", 10)
    call SetTextTagTextBJ(udg_floats[8], "TRIGSTR_1811", 10)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ModeClassic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ModeClassic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_ModeClassic, 100.00, gg_unit_ncp3_0380)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ModeClassic, Condition(function Trig_ModeClassic_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ModeClassic, function Trig_ModeClassic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ModeSurvival
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ModeSurvival_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'hrdh' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeSurvival_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MSMain=2
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0380, PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0379, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0381, PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0009, PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetTextTagTextBJ(udg_floats[6], "TRIGSTR_1812", 10)
    call SetTextTagTextBJ(udg_floats[7], "TRIGSTR_1813", 10)
    call SetTextTagTextBJ(udg_floats[8], "TRIGSTR_1814", 10)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ModeSurvival takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ModeSurvival=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_ModeSurvival, 100.00, gg_unit_ncp3_0379)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ModeSurvival, Condition(function Trig_ModeSurvival_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ModeSurvival, function Trig_ModeSurvival_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'hrdh' ) ) then
        return false

    return true

function Trig_ModeOverlordAscension_Actions takes nothing returns nothing

    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0380, PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0379, PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0381, PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0009, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
    call SetTextTagTextBJ(udg_floats[6], "TRIGSTR_9279", 10)
    call SetTextTagTextBJ(udg_floats[7], "TRIGSTR_9280", 10)
    call SetTextTagTextBJ(udg_floats[8], "TRIGSTR_9281", 10)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ModeConfirm
//
// Extinctionmode extinc ms2 - 9
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ModeConfirm_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func003Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func003Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func003Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerLives[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=udg_modeLives
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func005Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func005Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func005Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerLives[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=udg_modeLives
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R006', 1, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call FogModifierStop(udg_modeVision[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
endfunction

function Trig_ModeConfirm_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_floats[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('hrdh'), function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func002A)
    if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func003C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_StartGame)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_PlayerBounty)
        set udg_modeStartingGold=120
        set udg_modeManaRegeneration=1.00
        set udg_modeDuelFrequency=2
        set udg_modePointsForDuel=1
        set udg_modePointsForLevels=0
        set udg_modeExtinctionFrequency=1000
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func003Func009C() ) then
            set udg_modeVictoryPoints=6
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func003Func010C() ) then
            set udg_modeVictoryPoints=12
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func003Func011C() ) then
            set udg_modeVictoryPoints=18
        else
        endif
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_MultiboardClassic)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_StartGame)
        set udg_modeStartingGold=150
        set udg_modeManaRegeneration=1.50
        set udg_modeDuelFrequency=4
        set udg_modePointsForDuel=0
        set udg_modePointsForLevels=0
        set udg_modeExtinctionFrequency=9
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004Func008C() ) then
            set udg_modeLives=6
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004Func009C() ) then
            set udg_modeLives=12
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004Func010C() ) then
            set udg_modeLives=18
        else
        endif
        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func004Func011A)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_MultiboardSurvival)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func005C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_StartTournament)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_ScheduleRoundRobin)
        set udg_modeStartingGold=300
        set udg_modeManaRegeneration=2.00
        set udg_modeDuelFrequency=1
        // FREQUENCY WAS 0
        set udg_modePointsForDuel=1
        set udg_modeExtinctionFrequency=1000
        set udg_modePointsForLevels=0
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func005Func010C() ) then
            set udg_modeVictoryPoints=5
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func005Func011C() ) then
            set udg_modeVictoryPoints=8
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func005Func012C() ) then
            set udg_modeVictoryPoints=12
        else
        endif
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_MultiboardTournament)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30.00, "TRIGSTR_721")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_StartGame)
        set udg_modeStartingGold=600
        set udg_modeManaRegeneration=0.00
        set udg_modeDuelFrequency=3
        set udg_modePointsForDuel=0
        set udg_modePointsForLevels=0
        set udg_modeExtinctionFrequency=1000
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006Func008C() ) then
            set udg_modeLives=6
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006Func009C() ) then
            set udg_modeLives=12
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006Func010C() ) then
            set udg_modeLives=18
        else
        endif
        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func006Func011A)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_MultiboardOverlordsAscension)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Difficulty)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_offOverlordsAI)
    else
    endif
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_ModeConfirm_Func007A)
    set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=( udg_modeDuelFrequency * 3 )
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameStart)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ModeConfirm takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ModeConfirm=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_ModeConfirm, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ModeConfirm, Condition(function Trig_ModeConfirm_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ModeConfirm, function Trig_ModeConfirm_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameStart
//
// Draft units from race id (now 8)
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameStart_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSPick == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Func003Func003Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_draftGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Func003Func003Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, GetEnumPlayer())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_draftGroup[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Func003Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer())
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h00T', false, GetEnumPlayer())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(udg_raceBuilder[GetForLoopIndexA()], false, GetEnumPlayer())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_raceBuilder[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_draftGroup[udg_ip])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(8, udg_draftGroup[udg_ip]), function Trig_GameStart_Func003Func003Func005A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_draftGroup[udg_ip], function Trig_GameStart_Func003Func003Func006A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSPick == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Func004Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSPick == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction
