function Trig_GameStart_Func004Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(GetEnumPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_RandomUnitsSet)
    else
        if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func001Func002C() ) then
            // all pick
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02C', GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), 270.00)
        else
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func002C() ) then
        // all pick
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h008', GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), 270.00)
    else
        if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func002Func001C() ) then
            // all pick
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02C', GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), 270.00)
        else
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func003C() ) then
        // draft
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h008', GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), 270.00)
    else
        if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func003Func001C() ) then
            // all pick
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02C', GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), 270.00)
        else
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func004C() ) then
        // all random
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_raceBuilder[GetRandomInt(1, 11)], GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), 270.00)
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))
        set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func004Func006Func001C() ) then
                call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))], udg_raceIcon[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func004Func006Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSkink.blp")
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func004Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_raceBuilder[GetRandomInt(12, udg_raceId)], GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), 270.00)
            call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))
            set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=12
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_raceId
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func004Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
                    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func004Func001Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'n03V', GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                        set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))])
                        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02D', GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), OffsetLocation(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit())), 0.00, - 600.00), 180.00)
                        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNKobold.blp")
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func004Func001Func004Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'n03Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                        set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))])
                        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02E', GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), OffsetLocation(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit())), 0.00, - 600.00), 180.00)
                        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNDarkTroll.blp")
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func004Func001Func004Func001Func003C() ) then
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'n043', GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                        set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))])
                        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02F', GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()), OffsetLocation(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit())), 0.00, - 500.00), bj_UNIT_FACING)
                        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSeaGiant.blp")
                    else
                    endif
                else
                endif
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
        endif
    endif
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), 0)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, udg_visionRegion[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionMain)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionDuels)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_teamBattleArena)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetEnumPlayer())
    set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=1
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    set udg_upgFood[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=10
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP, 10)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, udg_modeStartingGold)
    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func019C() ) then
        set udg_upgGoldInc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=70
    else
        if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func019Func001C() ) then
            set udg_upgGoldInc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=50
        else
            set udg_upgGoldInc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=30
        endif
    endif
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_blacksmith[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func004Func022C() ) then
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_notReadyPlayers)
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_humanPlayers)
    else
    endif
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rosp', 1, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SinglePlayer == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Func006Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameStart_Func006Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameStart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetTimeOfDay(12)
    call UseTimeOfDayBJ(false)
    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func003C() ) then
        // draft
        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameStart_Func003Func003A)
    else
        if ( Trig_GameStart_Func003Func001C() ) then
            // all pick
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02C', GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), 270.00)
        else
        endif
    endif
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameStart_Func004A)
    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func005C() ) then
    else
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_roundTimer, false, 90.00)
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameStart_Func006C() ) then
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_ChooseTerrain)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_961")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenMeteor)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenTornado)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenVolcano)
    else
        set udg_i=1
        set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_duel1
        set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_d1west
        set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_d1east
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameStart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameStart=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameStart, function Trig_GameStart_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetMisc1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetMisc1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_hpea_0328, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), true)
    set udg_deleteWave[2]=1
    set udg_oddPlayerOut=Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
    set udg_bountyTable[1]=1
    set udg_bountyTable[2]=2
    set udg_bountyTable[3]=3
    set udg_bountyTable[4]=5
    set udg_bountyTable[5]=7
    set udg_bountyTable[6]=9
    set udg_bountyTable[7]=12
    set udg_bountyTable[8]=16
    set udg_bountyTable[9]=20
    set udg_bountyTable[10]=25
    set udg_bountyTable[11]=75
    set udg_bountyTable[12]=25
    set udg_bountyTable[13]=30
    set udg_bountyTable[17]=60
    set udg_bountyTable[16]=12
    set udg_bountyTable[17]=40
    set udg_bountyTable[18]=150
    set udg_bountyTable[19]=200
    set udg_bountyTable[20]=900
    set udg_bountyTable[21]=45
    set udg_bountyTable[25]=700
    set udg_bountyTable[29]=60
    set udg_bountyTable[30]=300
    set udg_bountyTable[31]=5
    set udg_bountyTable[32]=100
    set udg_bountyTable[32]=70
    set udg_bountyTable[33]=60
    set udg_bountyTable[35]=800
    set udg_bountyTable[60]=600
    set udg_bountyTable[70]=700
    set udg_bountyTable[80]=800
    set udg_bountyTable[99]=1000
    set udg_bountyTable[100]=3000
    // -------------
    set udg_hexConvId=( udg_hexConvId + 1 )
    set udg_hexConvChar[udg_hexConvId]="a"
    set udg_hexConvValue[udg_hexConvId]=10
    set udg_hexConvId=( udg_hexConvId + 1 )

    set udg_hexConvValue[udg_hexConvId]=11
    set udg_hexConvId=( udg_hexConvId + 1 )

    set udg_hexConvValue[udg_hexConvId]=12

    set udg_hexConvValue[udg_hexConvId]=13
    set udg_hexConvId=( udg_hexConvId + 1 )
    set udg_hexConvChar[udg_hexConvId]="e"
    set udg_hexConvValue[udg_hexConvId]=14
    set udg_hexConvId=( udg_hexConvId + 1 )
    set udg_hexConvChar[udg_hexConvId]="f"
    set udg_hexConvValue[udg_hexConvId]=15
    set udg_hexConvId=( udg_hexConvId + 1 )
    set udg_hexConvChar[udg_hexConvId]="g"
    set udg_hexConvValue[udg_hexConvId]=16
    set udg_hexConvId=( udg_hexConvId + 1 )
    set udg_hexConvChar[udg_hexConvId]="h"
    set udg_hexConvValue[udg_hexConvId]=17
    // -------------
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bblo'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bcrs'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bcyc'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bfae'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='B000'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='BUfa'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bhea'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='BOhx'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='BNht'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='BUsl'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bslo'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bssi'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bspo'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )

    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )

    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )

    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='BNsi'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bpoi'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bpsi'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bpsd'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bply'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='Bprg'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='BHtc'
    set udg_buffId=( udg_buffId + 1 )
    set udg_buffBuff[udg_buffId]='B003'
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetRegions)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetCreeps)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetCreepLevels)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GenerateCreeps)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_SetMisc1=CreateTrigger()

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetRegions
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetRegions_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_sV[1]=gg_rct_sV1
    set udg_sV[2]=gg_rct_sV2
    set udg_sV[3]=gg_rct_sV3
    set udg_sV[4]=gg_rct_sV4
    set udg_sV[5]=gg_rct_sV5
    set udg_sV[6]=gg_rct_sV6
    set udg_BattleRoyal[1]=gg_rct_BattleRoyal1
    set udg_BattleRoyal[2]=gg_rct_BattleRoyal2
    set udg_BattleRoyal[3]=gg_rct_BattleRoyal3
    set udg_BattleRoyal[4]=gg_rct_BattleRoyal4
    set udg_BattleRoyal[5]=gg_rct_BattleRoyal5
    set udg_BattleRoyal[6]=gg_rct_BattleRoyal6
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level01
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level02
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level03
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level04
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level05
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level06
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level07
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level08
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level09
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level10
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level11
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level12
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level13
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level14
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level15
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level16
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level17
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level18
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level19
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level20
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level21
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level22
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level23
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level24
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level25
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level26
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level27
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level28
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level29
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level30
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level31
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level32
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level33
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level34
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level35
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level36
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level36
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level38
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level39
    // ---
    set udg_levelId=( udg_levelId + 1 )
    set udg_levelRegion[udg_levelId]=gg_rct_level00
    // ---
    set udg_i=1
    set udg_visionRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_vision01
    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_spawn01
    set udg_creepRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_creeps01
    set udg_BossRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_tbBot1
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_visionRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_vision02
    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_spawn02
    set udg_creepRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_creeps02
    set udg_BossRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_tbBot2
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_visionRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_vision03
    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_spawn03
    set udg_creepRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_creeps03
    set udg_BossRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_tbBot3
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_visionRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_vision04
    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_spawn04
    set udg_creepRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_creeps04
    set udg_BossRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_tbTop1
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_visionRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_v05
    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_s05
    set udg_creepRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_c05
    set udg_BossRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_tbTop2
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_visionRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_v06
    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_s06
    set udg_creepRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_c06
    set udg_BossRegion[udg_i]=gg_rct_tbTop3
    // ---
    set udg_i=1
    set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_duel1
    set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_d1east
    set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_d1west
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_duel2
    set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_d2east
    set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_d2west
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_duel3
    set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_d3east
    set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_d3west
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_creepRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 60.00, - 320.00), 1660.00, - 300.00)
        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_creepRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 60.00, - 320.00), 1300.00, 90.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetRegions takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetRegions=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetRegions, function Trig_SetRegions_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetWater
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetWater_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(gg_rct_duel3, 'FDbl')
    call SetSkyModel("Environment\\Sky\\FoggedSky\\FoggedSky.mdl")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetWater takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetWater=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetWater, function Trig_SetWater_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetRaces
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetRaces_Func043C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SetRaces_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h000'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNFootman.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h009'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNArcher.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h007'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSkeletonWarrior.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h00S'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNFelHound.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h00Y'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNMortarTeam.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h003'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNHeroCryptLord.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h00C'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNHeadhunter.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h00P'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNElfVillager.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h00I'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNPeon.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h01C'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="Units\\Naga\\NagaSummoner\\NagaSummoner.mdl"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h01H'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNMarkOfFire.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='njg1'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNKobold.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='u01A'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNDarkTroll.blp"
    set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
    set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='n045'
    set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSeaGiant.blp"
    if ( Trig_SetRaces_Func043C() ) then
        set udg_raceId=( udg_raceId + 1 )
        set udg_raceBuilder[udg_raceId]='h01U'
        set udg_raceIcon[udg_raceId]="ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSpiritOfVengeance.blp"
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetRaces takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetRaces=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetRaces, function Trig_SetRaces_Actions)
endfunction

    // level 9 melee
    set udg_creepMeleeIdStart[udg_creepLevelId]=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='nfrg'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='nwrg'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='n00W'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='n00W'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='u01I'
    set udg_creepMeleeIdEnd[udg_creepLevelId]=udg_creepUnitId
    // -----
    // level 9 ranged
    set udg_creepRangedIdStart[udg_creepLevelId]=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='nhhr'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='nqbh'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='n00V'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='n04D'
    set udg_creepRangedIdEnd[udg_creepLevelId]=udg_creepUnitId
    // -----
    // level 10 melee
    set udg_creepMeleeIdStart[udg_creepLevelId]=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='nbdo'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='nwrg'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='nwrg'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='u01I'
    set udg_creepMeleeIdEnd[udg_creepLevelId]=udg_creepUnitId
    // -----
    // level 10 ranged
    set udg_creepRangedIdStart[udg_creepLevelId]=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='ndqp'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='ndqp'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='nhrq'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='nqbh'
    set udg_creepUnitId=( udg_creepUnitId + 1 )
    set udg_creepUnitType[udg_creepUnitId]='n04D'
    set udg_creepRangedIdEnd[udg_creepLevelId]=udg_creepUnitId
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetCreeps takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetCreeps=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetCreeps, function Trig_SetCreeps_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetCreepLevels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetCreepLevels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_levelGenString[1]="4"
    set udg_levelGenString[2]="6"
    set udg_levelGenString[3]="61"
    set udg_levelGenString[4]="73"
    // level 5 - boss
    set udg_levelGenString[6]="851"
    set udg_levelGenString[7]="f32"
    set udg_levelGenString[8]="2551"
    set udg_levelGenString[9]="0562"
    // level 10 - boss
    set udg_levelGenString[11]="0863"
    set udg_levelGenString[12]="01951"
    set udg_levelGenString[13]="00882"
    set udg_levelGenString[14]="00695"
    // level 15 - boss
    set udg_levelGenString[16]="002693"
    set udg_levelGenString[17]="000994"
    set udg_levelGenString[18]="0008952"
    set udg_levelGenString[19]="0007983"
    // level 20 - boss
    set udg_levelGenString[21]="0000998"
    set udg_levelGenString[22]="002967a0"
    set udg_levelGenString[23]="0001e585"
    set udg_levelGenString[24]="00008e58"
    // level 25 - boss
    set udg_levelGenString[26]="000352a75"
    set udg_levelGenString[27]="000568a65"
    set udg_levelGenString[28]="000098987"
    set udg_levelGenString[29]="00007f879"
    // level 30 - boss
    set udg_levelGenString[31]="0000ff879"
    set udg_levelGenString[32]="0003e9f879"
    set udg_levelGenString[33]="000097621"
    set udg_levelGenString[34]="4"
    // level 35 - boss
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetCreepLevels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetCreepLevels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetCreepLevels, function Trig_SetCreepLevels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GenerateCreeps
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GenerateCreeps_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(udg_levelGenString[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetForLoopIndexB(), GetForLoopIndexB()) == udg_hexConvChar[udg_C] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GenerateCreeps_Func001Func001Func001Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i >= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GenerateCreeps_Func001Func001Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GenerateCreeps_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_levelGenString[GetForLoopIndexA()] != "" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GenerateCreeps_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_levelId
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_GenerateCreeps_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=StringLength(udg_levelGenString[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
                set udg_i=S2I(SubStringBJ(udg_levelGenString[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetForLoopIndexB(), GetForLoopIndexB()))
                set udg_C=1
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_C > udg_hexConvId
                    if ( Trig_GenerateCreeps_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_i=udg_hexConvValue[udg_C]
                    else
                    endif
                    set udg_C=udg_C + 1
                endloop
                if ( Trig_GenerateCreeps_Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                    set udg_rangedUnitsCount=R2I(( I2R(udg_i) * GetRandomReal(0.25, 0.45) ))
                    if ( Trig_GenerateCreeps_Func001Func001Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                        set udg_rangedUnitsCount=( udg_rangedUnitsCount + 1 )
                    else
                    endif
                    set udg_meleeUnitsCount=( udg_i - udg_rangedUnitsCount )
                    set udg_C=1
                    loop
                        exitwhen udg_C > udg_meleeUnitsCount
                        set udg_l[0]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_levelRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0.00, - 150.00), 600.00, 300.00))
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_creepUnitType[GetRandomInt(udg_creepMeleeIdStart[GetForLoopIndexB()], udg_creepMeleeIdEnd[GetForLoopIndexB()])], Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
                        set udg_C=udg_C + 1
                    endloop
                    set udg_C=1
                    loop
                        exitwhen udg_C > udg_rangedUnitsCount
                        set udg_l[0]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_levelRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0.00, 150.00), 600.00, 150.00))
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_creepUnitType[GetRandomInt(udg_creepRangedIdStart[GetForLoopIndexB()], udg_creepRangedIdEnd[GetForLoopIndexB()])], Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
                        set udg_C=udg_C + 1
                    endloop
                else
                endif
                set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
        endif
        set udg_levelArmy[GetForLoopIndexA()]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GenerateCreeps takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GenerateCreeps=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GenerateCreeps, function Trig_GenerateCreeps_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetPlayerColours
//
// function Trig_Set_player_colours_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(0), ( "|cffff0202" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(0)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(1), ( "|cff0041ff" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(2), ( "|cff1be5b8" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(2)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(3), ( "|cff530080" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(3)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(4), ( "|cffffff00" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(4)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(5), ( "|cfffe890d" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(5)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(6), ( "|cff1fbf00" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(7), ( "|cffe45aaa" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(7)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(8), ( "|cff949596" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(8)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(9), ( "|cff7dbef1" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(9)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(10), ( "|cff0f6145" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r" ) ) )
//     call SetPlayerName( Player(11), ( "|cff4d2903" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r" ) ) )
// endfunction
// //===========================================================================
// function InitTrig_Set_player_colours takes nothing returns nothing
//     set gg_trg_Set_player_colours = CreateTrigger(  )
//     call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Set_player_colours, function Trig_Set_player_colours_Actions )
// endfunction
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_Player_Colours_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerName[1]=( "|cffff0202" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(0)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[2]=( "|cff0041ff" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[3]=( "|cff1be5b8" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(2)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[4]=( "|cff530080" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(3)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[5]=( "|cffffff00" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(4)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[6]=( "|cfffe890d" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(5)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[7]=( "|cffff0202" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(0)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[8]=( "|cff0041ff" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[9]=( "|cff1be5b8" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(2)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[10]=( "|cff530080" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(3)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[11]=( "|cffffff00" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(4)) + "|r" ) )
    set udg_playerName[12]=( "|cfffe890d" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(5)) + "|r" ) )

endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetPlayerColours takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetPlayerColours=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetPlayerColours, function Trig_Set_Player_Colours_Actions)
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetupPlayers
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetupPlayers_Func003Func001Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_SetupPlayers_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA())) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SetupPlayers_Func004Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
endfunction

function Trig_SetupPlayers_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_winningPlayer=Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
    set udg_boardPosId=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_SetupPlayers_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set udg_boardPosId=( udg_boardPosId + 1 )
            set udg_boardPos[GetForLoopIndexA()]=udg_boardPosId
            set udg_sortedPlayer[udg_boardPosId]=ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA())
            set udg_playerLevelAttempts[GetForLoopIndexA()]=1
            set udg_forecastLevel[GetForLoopIndexA()]=1
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 6 )), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 6 )), ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
            call SetPlayerColorBJ(ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 6 )), GetPlayerColor(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA())), true)
            call SetPlayerName(ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 6 )), GetPlayerName(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA())))
            set udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()]=ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 6 ))
            call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_players)
            call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_pg250value)
            call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_pgTips)
            call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG)
            call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA())), 2800.00, 2800.00))
            call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionMain)
            call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionDuels)
            set udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=1650.00
        else
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA())), function Trig_SetupPlayers_Func003Func001Func006A)
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_SetupPlayers_Func004Func001A)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetupPlayers takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetupPlayers=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetupPlayers, function Trig_SetupPlayers_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetHelpQuests
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetHelpQuests_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_742", "TRIGSTR_743", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNScrollOfRegenerationGreen.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_894", "TRIGSTR_895", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNBansheeMaster.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_5486", "TRIGSTR_5487", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNBansheeMaster.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_5857", "TRIGSTR_5858", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNScrollUber.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_1060", "TRIGSTR_1061", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNBlizzard.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_1062", "TRIGSTR_1063", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNGoldMine.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_1064", "TRIGSTR_1065", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNBerserk.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_7211", "TRIGSTR_7212", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNPriestMaster.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_8349", "TRIGSTR_8350", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNMoonStone.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_6373", "TRIGSTR_6374", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNTranquility.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_6503", "TRIGSTR_6504", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNTranquility.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_282", "TRIGSTR_1468", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNTranquility.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_7812", "TRIGSTR_7813", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNFrostWyrm.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_7814", "TRIGSTR_7815", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNBroxigar.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_7816", "TRIGSTR_7817", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNUndeadBattleShip.blp")
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - You need tanks; usually more than archers."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - Make your formation wide enough so that your enemy's tanks won't spill around to your archers."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - You can adjust your formation by moving your units around on the grass."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - Generally, cheaper units have better value that expensive units; but expensive units use less food. Find the right balance."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - Take note of armour and damage types! Some matchups can cause a damage bonus or loss of up to 50%."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - Your Spellbringer can cast offensive spells to affect any battle - including those between your opponents. Influence others' battles to work in your favour."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - At the start of each game, all of the creep waves are randomised. A build order that worked last time you played might not work again. Use your Spellbringer's Forecast ability to see what you're up against."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - Don't forget to upgrade your gold income."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - You can upgrade individual units."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - You can change the height of the camera using the \"Zoom\" button (Z) in your builder."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - Use terrain bonuses to get an advantage over enemy."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - You can get acquainted with all commands in the quest menu."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - You using units behaviours and want to test your skill? - Turn on creeps tactical mode (-tm)."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - Host can disable(-de) or enable(-ee) random events like Infernal / Tornado / Volcano. "
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - Use \"Set as Mercenary\" behavior to help friends or make damage to opponents."
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00HINT|r - Want to see |cffff0000\"Real Villain\"?|r Just type - |cffffff00ahm.|r"
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|CFFED1C24Whisper of Yogg Saron prevents attacks from weak units and can control them. Strong units have chance to be confusied!"
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00WARNING|r - Вам Нет Спасенья АЛЕКСЕЙ В ИГРЕ"
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00Личное собщение|r - Я Алексей XXX Красно Солнышко размажу вас по своим сапогам. "
    set udg_hintId=( udg_hintId + 1 )
    set udg_hintText[udg_hintId]="|cff00ff00Дружеский совет|r - Осторожно Сзади Алексей!!!Ливай......."
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetHelpQuests takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetHelpQuests=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetHelpQuests, function Trig_SetHelpQuests_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetUnitUpgradeOrders
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetUnitUpgradeOrders_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_upgradeOrderId=( udg_upgradeOrderId + 1 )
    set udg_upgradeOrderList[udg_upgradeOrderId]=UnitId2OrderIdBJ('u01F')
    set udg_upgradeOrderId=( udg_upgradeOrderId + 1 )
    set udg_upgradeOrderList[udg_upgradeOrderId]=UnitId2OrderIdBJ('n04O')
    set udg_upgradeOrderId=( udg_upgradeOrderId + 1 )
    set udg_upgradeOrderList[udg_upgradeOrderId]=UnitId2OrderIdBJ('u01G')
    set udg_upgradeOrderId=( udg_upgradeOrderId + 1 )
    set udg_upgradeOrderList[udg_upgradeOrderId]=UnitId2OrderIdBJ('u01E')
    set udg_upgradeOrderId=( udg_upgradeOrderId + 1 )

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetUnitUpgradeOrders takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetUnitUpgradeOrders=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetUnitUpgradeOrders, function Trig_SetUnitUpgradeOrders_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MultiboardClassic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MultiboardClassic_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], true, true)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], ( ( "0/" ) + I2S(udg_modeVictoryPoints) ))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_462")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_463")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_464")
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], 100, 80, 20, 0)
endfunction

function Trig_MultiboardClassic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateMultiboardBJ(5, udg_boardPosId, "TRIGSTR_2341")
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 0, 13.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 0, 3.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, 0, 3.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, 0, 4.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, 0, 6.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 0, 0, true, false)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 1, "TRIGSTR_456")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 1, "TRIGSTR_484")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, 1, "TRIGSTR_457")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, 1, "TRIGSTR_458")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, 1, "TRIGSTR_459")
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_MultiboardClassic_Func013A)
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(false, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(true, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardMinimizeBJ(true, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardMinimizeBJ(false, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MultiboardClassic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MultiboardClassic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MultiboardClassic, function Trig_MultiboardClassic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MultiboardOverlordsAscension
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MultiboardOverlordsAscension_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], true, true)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], I2S(udg_modeLives))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_9346")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_9347")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_9348")
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], 100, 80, 20, 0)
endfunction

function Trig_MultiboardOverlordsAscension_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateMultiboardBJ(5, udg_boardPosId, "TRIGSTR_2342")
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 0, 13.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 0, 5.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, 0, 3.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, 0, 4.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, 0, 6.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 0, 0, true, false)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 1, "TRIGSTR_9341")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 1, "TRIGSTR_9342")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, 1, "TRIGSTR_9343")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, 1, "TRIGSTR_9344")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, 1, "TRIGSTR_9345")
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_MultiboardOverlordsAscension_Func013A)
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(false, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(true, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardMinimizeBJ(true, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardMinimizeBJ(false, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
endfunction

    set gg_trg_MultiboardOverlordsAscension=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MultiboardOverlordsAscension, function Trig_MultiboardOverlordsAscension_Actions)

function Trig_MultiboardSurvival_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], true, true)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], I2S(udg_modeLives))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_1825")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_1826")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_1827")
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], 100, 80, 20, 0)
endfunction

function Trig_MultiboardSurvival_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateMultiboardBJ(5, udg_boardPosId, "TRIGSTR_2343")
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 0, 13.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 0, 5.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, 0, 3.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, 0, 4.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, 0, 6.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 0, 0, true, false)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 1, "TRIGSTR_1819")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 1, "TRIGSTR_1820")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, 1, "TRIGSTR_1821")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, 1, "TRIGSTR_1822")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, 1, "TRIGSTR_1823")
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_MultiboardSurvival_Func013A)
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(false, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(true, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardMinimizeBJ(true, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardMinimizeBJ(false, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MultiboardTournament
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MultiboardTournament_Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], true, true)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_1905")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_1836")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_1837")
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], 100, 80, 20, 0)
endfunction

function Trig_MultiboardTournament_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateMultiboardBJ(5, udg_boardPosId, "TRIGSTR_2344")
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 0, 13.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 0, 3.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, 0, 0.01)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, 0, 4.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, 0, 6.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 0, 0, true, false)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 1, "TRIGSTR_1829")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 1, "TRIGSTR_1830")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, 1, "TRIGSTR_1832")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, 1, "TRIGSTR_1833")
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_MultiboardTournament_Func012A)
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(false, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(true, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardMinimizeBJ(true, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    call MultiboardMinimizeBJ(false, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MultiboardTournament takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MultiboardTournament=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MultiboardTournament, function Trig_MultiboardTournament_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ChooseTerrain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ChooseTerrain_Func026Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ChooseTerrain_Func026A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_SelectTerrain, GetEnumPlayer())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_ChooseTerrain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6578")
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6579")
    set udg_TB[1]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6580")
    set udg_TB[2]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6582")
    set udg_TB[3]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6583")
    set udg_TB[4]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6584")
    set udg_TB[5]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6585")
    set udg_TB[6]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6586")
    set udg_TB[7]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6587")
    set udg_TB[8]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6588")
    set udg_TB[9]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6589")
    set udg_TB[10]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6590")
    set udg_TB[11]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_SelectTerrain, "TRIGSTR_6591")
    set udg_TB[12]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_ChooseTerrain_Func026A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ChooseTerrain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ChooseTerrain=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ChooseTerrain, function Trig_ChooseTerrain_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TS[GetForLoopIndexA()] == IMaxBJ(IMaxBJ(IMaxBJ(IMaxBJ(IMaxBJ(IMaxBJ(IMaxBJ(IMaxBJ(IMaxBJ(IMaxBJ(udg_TS[1], udg_TS[2]), udg_TS[3]), udg_TS[4]), udg_TS[5]), udg_TS[6]), udg_TS[7]), udg_TS[8]), udg_TS[9]), udg_TS[10]), udg_TS[11]) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_TS[1] > 0 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[3] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[4] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[5] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[6] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[7] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[8] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[9] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[10] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_TS[12] == udg_TS[11] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    endif
    if ( not ( udg_TS[1] > udg_TS[12] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( udg_TS[1] + ( udg_TS[2] + ( udg_TS[3] + ( udg_TS[4] + ( udg_TS[5] + ( udg_TS[6] + ( udg_TS[7] + ( udg_TS[8] + ( udg_TS[9] + ( udg_TS[10] + ( udg_TS[11] + udg_TS[12] ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) == CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_humanPlayers) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainSelect_Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n031' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n033' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n035' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainSelect_Func003Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[13]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetEnumUnit(), true)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainSelect_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( udg_TS[1] + ( udg_TS[2] + ( udg_TS[3] + ( udg_TS[4] + ( udg_TS[5] + ( udg_TS[6] + ( udg_TS[7] + ( udg_TS[8] + ( udg_TS[9] + ( udg_TS[10] + ( udg_TS[11] + udg_TS[12] ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) == CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_notReadyPlayers) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainSelect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_TS[1]=( udg_TS[1] + 1 )
    else
        if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_TS[2]=( udg_TS[2] + 1 )
        else
            if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_TS[3]=( udg_TS[3] + 1 )
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_TS[4]=( udg_TS[4] + 1 )
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_TS[5]=( udg_TS[5] + 1 )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_TS[6]=( udg_TS[6] + 1 )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_TS[7]=( udg_TS[7] + 1 )
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    set udg_TS[8]=( udg_TS[8] + 1 )
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        set udg_TS[9]=( udg_TS[9] + 1 )
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            set udg_TS[10]=( udg_TS[10] + 1 )
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                set udg_TS[11]=( udg_TS[11] + 1 )
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                    set udg_TS[12]=( udg_TS[12] + 1 )
                                                else
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[1])
        else
            if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[2])
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[3])
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[4])
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[5])
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[6])
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                    call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[7])
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                        call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[8])
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                            call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[9])
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                                call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[10])
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                                    call TriggerExecute(udg_Terrain[11])
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                            set udg_i2=0
                                                            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                                                            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
                                                            loop
                                                                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                                                                    set udg_i2=( udg_i2 + 1 )
                                                                    set udg_RTD[udg_i2]=udg_Terrain[GetForLoopIndexA()]
                                                                else
                                                                endif
                                                                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                                                            endloop
                                                            set udg_RTDEnd=udg_i2
                                                            call TriggerExecute(udg_RTD[GetRandomInt(1, udg_RTDEnd)])
                                                        else
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_TerrainSelect_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_poisonUG=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionMain)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_poisonUG, function Trig_TerrainSelect_Func003Func002A)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[13])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_poisonUG)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_RaceSpellUnlock)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainSelect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainSelect=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_TerrainSelect, udg_SelectTerrain)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainSelect, function Trig_TerrainSelect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetTerrain
//
// 
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetTerrain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Terrain[1]=gg_trg_TerrainDwarf
    set udg_Terrain[2]=gg_trg_TerrainHuman
    set udg_Terrain[3]=gg_trg_TerrainElfForest
    set udg_Terrain[4]=gg_trg_TerrainElfForestDefenders
    set udg_Terrain[5]=gg_trg_TerrainElfForestHigh
    set udg_Terrain[6]=gg_trg_TerrainDarkLand
    set udg_Terrain[7]=gg_trg_TerrainDarkLandNerubian
    set udg_Terrain[8]=gg_trg_TerrainDrenor
    set udg_Terrain[9]=gg_trg_TerrainSwampTroll
    set udg_Terrain[10]=gg_trg_TerrainWaterLand
    set udg_Terrain[11]=gg_trg_TerrainFireLand
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetTerrain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetTerrain=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetTerrain, function Trig_SetTerrain_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction
