function Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainDwarf_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_Dalaran=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Dalaran > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc2=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 400.00, 30.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Northrend\\Props\\FirePit\\FirePit.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\WheelBarrel\\WheelBarrel.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\Trash1\\Trash1.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\Hay\\Hay3.mdl")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 25.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, - 25.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, - 25.00, 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 45.00, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 95.00, - 80.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, - 80.00, 40.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Props\\AshenLogAngled\\AshenLogAngled.mdl")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009C() ) then
                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02V', ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 1 )), udg_loc2, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('ZTnc', udg_loc2, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Shroom\\Ruins_Shroom3.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02Z', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc2, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('LTba', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), 270.00, 1, 0)
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func005C() ) then
                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Shroom\\Ruins_Shroom4.mdl")
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func005Func002C() ) then
                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Shroom\\Ruins_Shroom0.mdl")
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func005Func002Func002C() ) then
                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02U', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc2, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('BTsc', udg_loc2, bj_UNIT_FACING, 1, 0)
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func005Func002Func002Func004C() ) then
                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 25.00, - 25.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, - 20.00, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks9.mdl")
                                                            else
                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func005Func002Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 30.00, - 30.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks0.mdl")
                                                                else
                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func005Func002Func002Func004Func002Func004C() ) then
                                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 25.00, - 25.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks1.mdl")
                                                                    else
                                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func005Func002Func002Func004Func002Func004Func004C() ) then
                                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 25.00, - 25.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks2.mdl")
                                                                        else
                                                                        endif
                                                                    endif
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc2)
            else
            endif
            set udg_Dalaran=udg_Dalaran + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(5.00, 57.25, 97.25, 0.00)
    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_DalaranTerrain=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DalaranTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdtr', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xgsb', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                set udg_DalaranTerrain=udg_DalaranTerrain + 1
            endloop
            set udg_DalaranTerrain=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DalaranTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdtr', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xgsb', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                set udg_DalaranTerrain=udg_DalaranTerrain + 1
            endloop
            set udg_DalaranTerrain=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DalaranTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func002Func003Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func002Func003Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdtr', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func002Func003Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xgsb', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                set udg_DalaranTerrain=udg_DalaranTerrain + 1
            endloop
            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xhdg', - 1, 5, 1)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Qdrt', - 1, 18, 1)
            set udg_DalaranTerrain=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DalaranTerrain > GetRandomInt(20, 40)
                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qdrr', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qrck', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qgrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qrck', - 1, 5, 0)
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                                    else
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                set udg_DalaranTerrain=udg_DalaranTerrain + 1
            endloop
            set udg_DalaranTerrain=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DalaranTerrain > GetRandomInt(20, 40)
                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qdrr', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func003Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qrck', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func003Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qgrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func003Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func003Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qrck', - 1, 5, 0)
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func003Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                                    else
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                set udg_DalaranTerrain=udg_DalaranTerrain + 1
            endloop
            set udg_DalaranTerrain=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DalaranTerrain > GetRandomInt(20, 40)
                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qdrr', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func004Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qrck', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func004Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qgrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func004Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func004Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qrck', - 1, 5, 0)
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDwarf_Func003Func001Func004Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                                    else
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                set udg_DalaranTerrain=udg_DalaranTerrain + 1
            endloop
            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qcbp', - 1, 5, 1)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainDwarf takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainDwarf=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainDwarf, function Trig_TerrainDwarf_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TerrainHuman
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func004Func002Func002Func004Func002Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomPercentageBJ() <= 15.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainHuman_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_Dalaran=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Dalaran > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc2=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 400.00, 30.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Plants\\AshenBush0\\AshenBush0.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Shrub\\Ruins_Shrub0.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Shrub\\Ruins_Shrub1.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Shrub\\Ruins_Shrub2.mdl")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 25.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, - 25.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, - 25.00, 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 45.00, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 95.00, - 80.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, - 80.00, 40.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Props\\AshenLogAngled\\AshenLogAngled.mdl")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009C() ) then
                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02V', ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 1 )), udg_loc2, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('ZTnc', udg_loc2, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Plants\\AshenShrooms\\AshenShrooms0.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02Z', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc2, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Props\\TreasurePile\\TreasurePile0.mdl")
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func004C() ) then
                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Plants\\AshenShrooms\\AshenShrooms2.mdl")
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Plants\\AshenShrooms\\AshenShrooms3.mdl")
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func004Func002Func002C() ) then
                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02U', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc2, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('BTsc', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0, 0), bj_UNIT_FACING, 1, 0)
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func004Func002Func002Func004C() ) then
                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 25.00, - 25.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, - 20.00, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Rocks\\AshenRock\\AshenRock9.mdl")
                                                            else
                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func004Func002Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 30.00, - 30.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Rocks\\AshenRock\\AshenRock0.mdl")
                                                                else
                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func004Func002Func002Func004Func002Func004C() ) then
                                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 25.00, - 25.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Rocks\\AshenRock\\AshenRock1.mdl")
                                                                    else
                                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func003Func003Func009Func004Func002Func004Func002Func002Func004Func002Func004Func004C() ) then
                                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc2, 500.00, - 35.00)
                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc2, 25.00, - 25.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc2, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Rocks\\AshenRock\\AshenRock2.mdl")
                                                                        else
                                                                        endif
                                                                    endif
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc2)
            else
            endif
            set udg_Dalaran=udg_Dalaran + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(0.00, 12.43, 96.01, 0.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func003Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdtr', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func003Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xgsb', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func003Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdtr', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func003Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xgsb', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func003Func003Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xdtr', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainHuman_Func003Func003Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xgsb', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Xhdg', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainHuman takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainHuman=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainHuman, function Trig_TerrainHuman_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TerrainElfForest
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003Func010Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomPercentageBJ() <= 15.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_TerrainElfForest_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Ldrt', - 1, 18, 1)
        set udg_ElfForest=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForest > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc4=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 300.00, 20.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Plants\\AshenBush0\\AshenBush0.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02T', ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 1 )), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                        call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_SpellRuneRoots, RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), 345.00, 345.00))
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\VinyPlant\\VinyPlant3.mdl")
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Cinematic\\GlowingRunes\\GlowingRunes1.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Flower\\Ruins_Flower3.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Flower\\Ruins_Flower2.mdl")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002C() ) then
                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 12.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Rocks\\Ruins_Rock\\Ruins_Rock8.mdl")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005C() ) then
                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 370.00, - 50.00)
                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02J', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "war3mapImported\\Healing Surge.mdx")
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 280.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 280.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 280.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 280.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 320.00, 260.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 320.00, 260.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 400.00, 320.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 400.00, 320.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 400.00, 320.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Plants\\FelwoodBush\\FelwoodBush0.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Cityscape\\Props\\CrystalLamp\\CrystalLamp.mdl")
                                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Brilliance\\Brilliance.mdl")
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006C() ) then
                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 15.00, - 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 20.00, - 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 25.00, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Rocks\\Lords_Rock\\Lords_Rock0.mdl")
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006C() ) then
                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\VinyPlant\\VinyPlant2.mdl")
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003C() ) then
                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 370.00, - 50.00)
                                                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02J', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "war3mapImported\\Healing Surge.mdx")
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 340.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 340.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003Func010C() ) then
                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Rocks\\Ruins_Rock\\Ruins_Rock1.mdl")
                                                            else
                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003Func010Func003C() ) then
                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 15.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 15.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Rocks\\Ruins_Rock\\Ruins_Rock2.mdl")
                                                                else
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc4)
            else
            endif
            set udg_ElfForest=udg_ElfForest + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(0.00, 87.00, 100.00, 0.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ldro', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ldrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lrok', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ldro', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ldrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lrok', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ldro', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func003Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ldrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func003Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForest_Func003Func003Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lrok', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrd', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainElfForest takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainElfForest=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainElfForest, function Trig_TerrainElfForest_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TerrainElfForestDefenders
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003Func009Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomPercentageBJ() <= 15.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Ldrt', - 1, 18, 1)
        set udg_ElfForest=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForest > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc4=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 300.00, 20.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Plants\\AshenBush0\\AshenBush0.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02T', ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 1 )), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                        call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_SpellRuneRoots, RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), 345.00, 345.00))
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\VinyPlant\\VinyPlant3.mdl")
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Cinematic\\GlowingRunes\\GlowingRunes1.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Flower\\Ruins_Flower3.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Flower\\Ruins_Flower2.mdl")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002C() ) then
                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 12.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Rocks\\Ruins_Rock\\Ruins_Rock8.mdl")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005C() ) then
                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 370.00, - 50.00)
                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02J', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "war3mapImported\\Healing Surge.mdx")
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 1)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Plants\\FelwoodBush\\FelwoodBush0.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Cityscape\\Props\\CrystalLamp\\CrystalLamp.mdl")
                                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Brilliance\\Brilliance.mdl")
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006C() ) then
                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 15.00, - 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 20.00, - 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 25.00, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Rocks\\Lords_Rock\\Lords_Rock0.mdl")
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006C() ) then
                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\VinyPlant\\VinyPlant2.mdl")
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003C() ) then
                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 370.00, - 50.00)
                                                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02J', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "war3mapImported\\Healing Surge.mdx")
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('LTlt', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003Func009C() ) then
                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Rocks\\Ruins_Rock\\Ruins_Rock1.mdl")
                                                            else
                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func005Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003Func009Func003C() ) then
                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 15.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 15.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Rocks\\Ruins_Rock\\Ruins_Rock2.mdl")
                                                                else
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc4)
            else
            endif
            set udg_ElfForest=udg_ElfForest + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(0.00, 65.09, 52.54, 0.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lrok', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lrok', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func003Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func003Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Func003Func003Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lrok', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Lgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Alvd', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainElfForestDefenders takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainElfForestDefenders=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainElfForestDefenders, function Trig_TerrainElfForestDefenders_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TerrainElfForestHigh
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc4) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func006Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003Func008Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
