function Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Bdrt', - 1, 18, 1)
        set udg_ElfForest=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForest > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc4=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 300.00, 20.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Shrub\\Ruins_Shrub1.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02T', ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 1 )), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                        call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_SpellRuneRoots, RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), 345.00, 345.00))
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\VinyPlant\\VinyPlant0.mdl")
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Cinematic\\GlowingRunes\\GlowingRunes3.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Flower\\Ruins_Flower1.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\Ruins_Flower\\Ruins_Flower4.mdl")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002C() ) then
                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 25.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 15.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks8.mdl")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func006C() ) then
                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 370.00, - 50.00)
                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02J', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "war3mapImported\\Healing Surge.mdx")
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('FTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('FTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('FTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('FTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('FTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 220.00, 220.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.05, 2)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func006Func004C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Props\\AshenHollowStump\\AshenHollowStump.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func006Func004Func003C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Cityscape\\Props\\CrystalLamp\\CrystalLamp.mdl")
                                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Brilliance\\Brilliance.mdl")
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func006Func004Func003Func006C() ) then
                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 15.00, - 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 20.00, - 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 25.00, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks1.mdl")
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func006Func004Func003Func006Func006C() ) then
                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\RibBones\\RibBones3.mdl")
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func006Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003C() ) then
                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 370.00, - 50.00)
                                                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02J', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc4, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "war3mapImported\\Healing Surge.mdx")
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('FTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('FTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('FTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('FTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc4, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func006Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003Func008C() ) then
                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks1.mdl")
                                                            else
                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002Func006Func004Func003Func006Func006Func003Func008Func003C() ) then
                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc4, 360.00, - 25.00)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, 15.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc4, - 15.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc4, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks7.mdl")
                                                                else
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Fgrd', - 1, 5, 1)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc4)
            else
            endif
            set udg_ElfForest=udg_ElfForest + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(12.15, 47.45, 50.98, 0.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bgrr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrg', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bgrr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func002Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrg', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func002Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bgrr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func003Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func003Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrg', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_ElfForestTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_ElfForestTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bgrr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func004Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrt', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Func003Func004Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Bdrg', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_ElfForestTerrain=udg_ElfForestTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Qgrt', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainElfForestHigh takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainElfForestHigh=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainElfForestHigh, function Trig_TerrainElfForestHigh_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_DarkLand=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DarkLand > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc6=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 300.00, 25.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile0.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\IceBlock\\IceBlock2.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc6, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 80.00, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 60.00, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('DTlv', udg_loc6, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Northrend\\Rocks\\NorthrendFissure\\NorthrendFissure0.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 15.00, - 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 15.00, 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 35.00, 12.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Northrend\\Rocks\\North_IceClaw\\North_IceClaw6.mdl")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006C() ) then
                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile1.mdl")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003C() ) then
                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02R', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc6, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIso\\BIsvTarget.mdl")
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile2.mdl")
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile2.mdl")
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile3.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02Y', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc6, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_SpellRestlessLegion, RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), 360.00, 360.00))
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Northrend\\Props\\NorthrendTombstone\\NorthrendTombstone1.mdl")
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006C() ) then

                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 15.00, - 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)

                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_Rock\\Ice_Rock2.mdl")
                                                                                else
                                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func004Func007C() ) then
                                                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 20.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 20.00, - 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_SnowRock\\Ice_SnowRock0.mdl")
                                                                                    else
                                                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func004Func007Func006C() ) then
                                                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 20.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 25.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, - 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_SnowRock\\Ice_SnowRock4.mdl")
                                                                                        else
                                                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func004Func007Func006Func007C() ) then
                                                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 20.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 15.00, - 7.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_SnowRock\\Ice_SnowRock7.mdl")
                                                                                            else
                                                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func004Func007Func006Func007Func005C() ) then
                                                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02Y', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc6, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                                                                    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_SpellRestlessLegion, RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), 360.00, 360.00))
                                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Cityscape\\Props\\CityGrave\\CityGrave0.mdl")
                                                                                                else
                                                                                                endif
                                                                                            endif
                                                                                        endif
                                                                                    endif
                                                                                endif
                                                                            endif
                                                                        endif
                                                                    endif
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc6)
            else
            endif
            set udg_DarkLand=udg_DarkLand + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(8.23, 42.74, 48.23, 0.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Idrt', - 1, 18, 1)
        set udg_DarkLandTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DarkLandTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Isnw', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Iice', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Idtr', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Idki', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DarkLandTerrain=udg_DarkLandTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DarkLandTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DarkLandTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Isnw', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Iice', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func003Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Idtr', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func003Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Idki', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DarkLandTerrain=udg_DarkLandTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DarkLandTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DarkLandTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Isnw', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Iice', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func004Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Idtr', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Func003Func004Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Idki', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DarkLandTerrain=udg_DarkLandTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Gbrk', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainDarkLand takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainDarkLand=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainDarkLand, function Trig_TerrainDarkLand_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc6) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return true

function Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_DarkLand=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DarkLand > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc6=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 300.00, 25.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile0.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\IceBlock\\IceBlock2.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc6, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 80.00, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 60.00, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('DTlv', udg_loc6, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Northrend\\Rocks\\NorthrendFissure\\NorthrendFissure0.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 15.00, - 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 15.00, 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 35.00, 12.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Northrend\\Rocks\\North_IceClaw\\North_IceClaw6.mdl")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006C() ) then
                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile1.mdl")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003C() ) then
                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02R', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc6, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIso\\BIsvTarget.mdl")
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile2.mdl")
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile2.mdl")
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile3.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02Y', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc6, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_SpellRestlessLegion, RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), 360.00, 360.00))
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Northrend\\Props\\NorthrendTombstone\\NorthrendTombstone1.mdl")
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006C() ) then
                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 15.00, - 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 15.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_Rock\\Ice_Rock2.mdl")
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004C() ) then
                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 20.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, - 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_SnowRock\\Ice_SnowRock0.mdl")
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006C() ) then
                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 25.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 10.00, - 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_SnowRock\\Ice_SnowRock4.mdl")
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006C() ) then
                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Props\\IceTorch\\IceTorch.mdl")
                                                            else
                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004C() ) then
                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 20.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Underground\\Rocks\\UndergoundRock\\UndergoundRock5.mdl")
                                                                else
                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004C() ) then
                                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02R', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc6, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('NTtw', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 200.00, 170.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc6, 302.00, 200.00)), "Doodads\\Cityscape\\Props\\MagicRunes\\MagicRunes0.mdl")
                                                                    else
                                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003C() ) then
                                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullPile\\SkullPile3.mdl")
                                                                        else
                                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003C() ) then
                                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\IceBlock\\IceBlock0.mdl")
                                                                            else
                                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func004C() ) then
                                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 25.00, - 7.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 20.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_Rock\\Ice_Rock2.mdl")
                                                                                else
                                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func004Func007C() ) then
                                                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 20.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 20.00, - 10.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_SnowRock\\Ice_SnowRock0.mdl")
                                                                                    else
                                                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func004Func007Func006C() ) then
                                                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 20.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 25.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, - 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_SnowRock\\Ice_SnowRock4.mdl")
                                                                                        else
                                                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func004Func007Func006Func007C() ) then
                                                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 20.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, - 15.00, - 7.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Icecrown\\Rocks\\Ice_SnowRock\\Ice_SnowRock7.mdl")
                                                                                            else
                                                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func003Func009Func006Func003Func004Func003Func006Func004Func006Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func004Func007Func006Func007Func005C() ) then
                                                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc6, 400.00, - 35.00)
                                                                                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02Y', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc6, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                                                                    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_SpellRestlessLegion, RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), 360.00, 360.00))
                                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc6, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc6, "Doodads\\Cityscape\\Props\\CityGrave\\CityGrave0.mdl")
                                                                                                else
                                                                                                endif
                                                                                            endif
                                                                                        endif
                                                                                    endif
                                                                                endif
                                                                            endif
                                                                        endif
                                                                    endif
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc6)
            else
            endif
            set udg_DarkLand=udg_DarkLand + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(10.58, 75.29, 97.25, 0.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Ndrt', - 1, 18, 1)
        set udg_DarkLandTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DarkLandTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Nice', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Nsnw', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ngrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Nsnw', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DarkLandTerrain=udg_DarkLandTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DarkLandTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DarkLandTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Nice', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func003Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Nsnw', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func003Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ngrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func003Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Nsnw', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DarkLandTerrain=udg_DarkLandTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DarkLandTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DarkLandTerrain > GetRandomInt(16, 32)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Nice', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func004Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Nsnw', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func004Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ngrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Func003Func004Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Nsnw', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DarkLandTerrain=udg_DarkLandTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Irbk', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainDarkLandNerubian=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainDarkLandNerubian, function Trig_TerrainDarkLandNerubian_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005Func004Func003Func003Func003Func003Func003Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
