function Trig_TerrainDrenor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_Drenor=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Drenor > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc8=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 300.00, 30.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', udg_loc8, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Rocks\\DungeonRock\\DungeonRock9.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\HeadOnSpear\\HeadOnSpear2.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Outland\\Props\\Skull\\Skull1.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Outland\\Plants\\Outland_Plant\\Outland_Plant6.mdl")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02L', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc8, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, - 20.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, - 60.00, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 80.00, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\BarrensFissure\\BarrensFissure1.mdl")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009C() ) then
                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 60.00)
                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02M', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc8, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', udg_loc8, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0.00, 0), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\UnholyAura\\UnholyAura.mdl")
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0.00, 0), "Doodads\\Outland\\Props\\Standard\\Standard0.mdl")
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Outland\\Rocks\\Outland_Rock\\Outland_Rock9.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Rocks\\DungeonRock\\DungeonRock7.mdl")
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004C() ) then
                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Rocks\\DungeonRock\\DungeonRock6.mdl")
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003C() ) then
                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Outland\\Rocks\\RubbleRock\\RubbleRock1.mdl")
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004C() ) then
                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02K', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc8, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\WarDrums\\DrumsCasterHeal.mdl")
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('ITag', udg_loc8, bj_UNIT_FACING, 1, 0)
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005C() ) then
                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 500.00, - 70.00)
                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Props\\Firepot\\Firepot.mdl")
                                                            else
                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005Func004C() ) then
                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Outland\\Rocks\\Outland_Rock\\Outland_Rock2.mdl")
                                                                else
                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005Func004Func003C() ) then
                                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Outland\\Plants\\Outland_Plant\\Outland_Plant4.mdl")
                                                                    else
                                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005Func004Func003Func003C() ) then
                                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SkullonStick\\SkullonStick5.mdl")
                                                                        else
                                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005Func004Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Geyser\\Geyser0.mdl")
                                                                            else
                                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005Func004Func003Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Outland\\Rocks\\Outland_Rock\\Outland_Rock4.mdl")
                                                                                else
                                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005Func004Func003Func003Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                                                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Outland\\Rocks\\Outland_Rock\\Outland_Rock4.mdl")
                                                                                    else
                                                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005Func004Func003Func003Func003Func003Func003Func004C() ) then
                                                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks6.mdl")
                                                                                        else
                                                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func009Func005Func004Func004Func003Func004Func005Func004Func003Func003Func003Func003Func003Func004Func004C() ) then
                                                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks7.mdl")
                                                                                            else
                                                                                            endif
                                                                                        endif
                                                                                    endif
                                                                                endif
                                                                            endif
                                                                        endif
                                                                    endif
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc8)
            else
            endif
            set udg_Drenor=udg_Drenor + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(62.27, 29.01, 18.82, 0.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Odrt', - 1, 18, 1)
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(20, 40)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Odtr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Osmb', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ofst', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Olgb', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(20, 40)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Odtr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Osmb', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func003Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ofst', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func003Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Olgb', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(20, 40)
            if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Odtr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Osmb', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func004Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ofst', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainDrenor_Func003Func004Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Olgb', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Orok', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainDrenor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainDrenor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainDrenor, function Trig_TerrainDrenor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TerrainSwampTroll
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc8) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func013Func006Func004Func004Func003Func004Func006Func003Func005Func005Func003Func003Func003Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean

function Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_Drenor=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Drenor > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc8=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 300.00, 30.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', udg_loc8, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Rocks\\FelwoodRock\\FelwoodRock0.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Plants\\AshenShrooms\\AshenShrooms3.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Plants\\FelwoodShrooms\\FelwoodShrooms1.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Plants\\FelwoodShrooms\\FelwoodShrooms2.mdl")
                            else

                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, - 60.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, - 60.00, 60.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 60.00, - 60.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Units\\Creeps\\ForgottenOne\\ForgottenOne.mdl")
                                else

                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n033', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc8, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))

                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0.00, 0), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\TrueshotAura\\TrueshotAura.mdl")
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Props\\CentaurTotem\\CentaurTotem0.mdl")
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func013Func006C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Rocks\\FelwoodRock\\FelwoodRock0.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func013Func006Func004C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Rocks\\FelwoodRock\\FelwoodRock7.mdl")
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func013Func006Func004Func004C() ) then
                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Rocks\\FelwoodRock\\FelwoodRock6.mdl")
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func013Func006Func004Func004Func003C() ) then
                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Structures\\FelwoodRubble\\FelwoodRubble2.mdl")
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func013Func006Func004Func004Func003Func004C() ) then
                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n035', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc8, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\ThornsAura\\ThornsAura.mdl")
                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Plants\\Felwood_Thorns\\Felwood_Thorns0.mdl")
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func013Func006Func004Func004Func003Func004Func006C() ) then

                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Plants\\FelwoodCatTail\\FelwoodCatTail.mdl")

                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                                                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n035', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc8, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\ThornsAura\\ThornsAura.mdl")
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Plants\\Felwood_Thorns\\Felwood_Thorns0.mdl")
                                                                else
                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func013Func006Func004Func004Func003Func004Func006Func003Func005C() ) then
                                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 50.00)
                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('ATtc', GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc8, 500.00, 650.00)), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)

                                                                    else

                                                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Water\\AshenvaleLilyPad\\AshenvaleLilyPad0.mdl")
                                                                        else

                                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc8, "Doodads\\Felwood\\Rocks\\FelwoodRock\\FelwoodRock6.mdl")
                                                                                        else
                                                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func002Func002Func002Func013Func006Func004Func004Func003Func004Func006Func003Func005Func005Func003Func003Func003Func004Func004C() ) then
                                                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc8, 360.00, - 40.00)
                                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc8, 0, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)

                                                                                            else
                                                                                            endif
                                                                                        endif
                                                                                    endif
                                                                                endif
                                                                            endif
                                                                        endif
                                                                    endif
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc8)
            else
            endif
            set udg_Drenor=udg_Drenor + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(13.49, 79.81, 11.22, 30.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Cdrt', - 1, 18, 1)
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(25, 50)
            if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cdrd', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cvin', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cpos', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(25, 50)
            if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cdrd', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func003Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cvin', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func003Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cpos', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(25, 50)
            if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cdrd', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func004Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cvin', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Func003Func004Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Cpos', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Crck', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainSwampTroll takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainSwampTroll=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainSwampTroll, function Trig_TerrainSwampTroll_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TerrainWaterLand
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc10) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc10) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc10) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc10) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc10) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc10) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomPercentageBJ() <= 15.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_WaterLand=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_WaterLand > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc10=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc10, 300.00, 25.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc10, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Plants\\VinyPlant\\VinyPlant2.mdl")

                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpc', OffsetLocation(udg_loc10, 0, 15.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1, 0)
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc10, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Props\\AshenBrokenObilisk\\AshenBrokenObilisk0.mdl")

                                    else

                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func001Func004Func001Func001Func002Func005Func002Func002C() ) then

                                                                                else
                                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func001Func004Func001Func001Func002Func005Func002Func002Func002Func004Func004Func006Func006Func013Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                                                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc10, 550.00, - 55.00)
                                                                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02O', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc10, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                                                                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpb', OffsetLocation(udg_loc10, 0, 0), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 0.20, 0)
                                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(OffsetLocation(udg_loc10, 0, 0), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\VampiricPotion\\VampPotionCaster.mdl")
                                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(OffsetLocation(udg_loc10, - 35.00, 35.00), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\VampiricPotion\\VampPotionCaster.mdl")
                                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(OffsetLocation(udg_loc10, 35.00, - 35.00), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\VampiricPotion\\VampPotionCaster.mdl")
                                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(OffsetLocation(udg_loc10, 35.00, 35.00), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\VampiricPotion\\VampPotionCaster.mdl")
                                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(OffsetLocation(udg_loc10, - 35.00, - 35.00), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\VampiricPotion\\VampPotionCaster.mdl")
                                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc10, "Doodads\\Ruins\\Props\\Brazier\\Brazier0.mdl")
                                                                                    else
                                                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func001Func004Func001Func001Func002Func005Func002Func002Func002Func004Func004Func006Func006Func013Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc10, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SignPost\\SignPost.mdl")
                                                                                        else
                                                                                        endif
                                                                                    endif
                                                                                endif
                                                                            endif
                                                                        endif
                                                                    endif
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc10)
            else
            endif
            set udg_WaterLand=udg_WaterLand + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(0.00, 87.00, 100.00, 10.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Zdrt', - 1, 18, 1)
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(25, 50)
            if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zdtr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zbks', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zbkl', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(25, 50)
            if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zdtr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zbks', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func003Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zbkl', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func003Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(25, 50)
            if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zdtr', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zbks', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func004Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zbkl', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Func003Func004Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Zgrs', - 1, 5, 0)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ztil', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainWaterLand takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainWaterLand=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainWaterLand, function Trig_TerrainWaterLand_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn01, udg_loc12) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn02, udg_loc12) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn03, udg_loc12) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_spawn04, udg_loc12) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s05, udg_loc12) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_s06, udg_loc12) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction
