function Trig_TerrainFireLand_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_FireLand=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_FireLand > GetRandomInt(70, 100)
            set udg_loc12=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 420.00, 40.00)
            if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 420.00, - 50.00)
                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpc', udg_loc12, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.00, 0)
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Rocks\\DungeonStalagmite\\DungeonStalagmite0.mdl")
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 600.00, - 50.00)
                        call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpc', udg_loc12, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.00, 0)
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Barrens\\Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks\\Barrens_Rocks9.mdl")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 420.00, - 50.00)
                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpc', udg_loc12, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.00, 0)
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Outland\\Props\\Obstacle\\Obstacle4.mdl")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003C() ) then
                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 420.00, - 60.00)
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02N', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc12, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpc', udg_loc12, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.00, 0)
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_loc12, 320.00, 320.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeEmbers.mdl")
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Props\\Obelisk\\Obelisk0.mdl")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004C() ) then
                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 600.00, - 50.00)
                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpc', udg_loc12, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.00, 0)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Rocks\\DungeonRock\\DungeonRock7.mdl")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004C() ) then
                                        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 600.00, - 60.00)
                                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02H', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc12, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Rocks\\Cave_FieryCrator\\Cave_FieryCrator.mdl")
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004C() ) then
                                            call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 420.00, - 75.00)
                                            call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpc', udg_loc12, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.00, 0)
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Outland\\Props\\Altar\\Altar.mdl")
                                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_loc12, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\VampiricAura\\VampiricAura.mdl")
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004Func006C() ) then
                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 600.00, - 70.00)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfc', OffsetLocation(udg_loc12, 0.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 3.00, 1)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfc', OffsetLocation(udg_loc12, 0.00, 30.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 3.00, 1)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfc', OffsetLocation(udg_loc12, 30.00, 0.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 3.00, 1)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfc', OffsetLocation(udg_loc12, 0.00, 60.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 3.00, 1)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfc', OffsetLocation(udg_loc12, 0.00, - 60.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 3.00, 1)
                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTfc', OffsetLocation(udg_loc12, - 30.00, - 60.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 3.00, 1)
                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Outland\\Rocks\\Outland_Spires\\Outland_Spires0.mdl")
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004Func006Func009C() ) then
                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\LordaeronSummer\\Props\\SmokeSmudge\\SmokeSmudge2.mdl")
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004Func006Func009Func002C() ) then
                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Props\\LavaCracks\\LavaCracks2.mdl")
                                                    else
                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004Func006Func009Func002Func002C() ) then
                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Props\\ScorchedRemains\\ScorchedRemains0.mdl")
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004Func006Func009Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 500.00, - 40.00)
                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Props\\LavaCracks\\LavaCracks3.mdl")
                                                            else
                                                                if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004Func006Func009Func002Func002Func002Func003C() ) then
                                                                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 500.00, - 55.00)
                                                                    call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpc', udg_loc12, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.00, 0)
                                                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc10, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Rocks\\DungeonRock\\DungeonRock9.mdl")
                                                                else
                                                                    if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004Func006Func009Func002Func002Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                                                                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Ashenvale\\Props\\ScorchedRemains\\ScorchedRemains2.mdl")
                                                                    else
                                                                        if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004Func006Func009Func002Func002Func002Func003Func004Func002C() ) then
                                                                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Props\\LavaCracks\\LavaCracks0.mdl")
                                                                        else
                                                                            if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func001Func001Func003Func002Func003Func004Func003Func004Func004Func004Func006Func009Func002Func002Func002Func003Func004Func002Func002C() ) then
                                                                                call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_loc12, 600.00, - 60.00)
                                                                                call CreateDestructableLoc('YTpc', udg_loc12, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.00, 0)
                                                                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_loc12, "Doodads\\Dungeon\\Rocks\\DungeonRock\\DungeonRock9.mdl")
                                                                            else
                                                                            endif
                                                                        endif
                                                                    endif
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_loc12)
            else
            endif
            set udg_FireLand=udg_FireLand + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetWaterBaseColorBJ(96.05, 9.41, 2.35, 0.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 0.00), 'Ddrt', - 1, 18, 1)
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(25, 50)
            if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Dbrk', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func003Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Dlvc', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ddkr', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(25, 50)
            if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Dbrk', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func003Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Dlvc', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func003Func003Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ddkr', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        set udg_DrenorTerrain=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DrenorTerrain > GetRandomInt(25, 50)
            if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
                call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Dbrk', - 1, 5, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func003Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Dlvc', - 1, 5, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TerrainFireLand_Func003Func004Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Ddkr', - 1, 5, 0)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            set udg_DrenorTerrain=udg_DrenorTerrain + 1
        endloop
        call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 'Drds', - 1, 5, 1)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TerrainFireLand takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TerrainFireLand=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TerrainFireLand, function Trig_TerrainFireLand_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SpellRuneRoots
//
// Owner of fankor - set all  angles and spawn to player var
// level evil =/ number of building
// tooltip for mirror and extend dmg
// Return to building?
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SpellRuneRoots_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0CP', GetEnumUnit()) != 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) < 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SpellRuneRoots_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'n02T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SpellRuneRoots_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SpellRuneRoots_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Tranquility\\TranquilityTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "entanglingroots", GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_SpellRuneRoots_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[9]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(360.00, udg_l[9])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0CP', GetTriggerUnit())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_SpellRuneRoots_Func004A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[9])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SpellRuneRoots takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SpellRuneRoots=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SpellRuneRoots, Condition(function Trig_SpellRuneRoots_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SpellRuneRoots, function Trig_SpellRuneRoots_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SpellRestlessLegion
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SpellRestlessLegion_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n02Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n02R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n02S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n02E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'u00U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0CP', GetEnumUnit()) != 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SpellRestlessLegion_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SpellRestlessLegion_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0CP', GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[9], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00U', GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), udg_l[9], 90.00)
        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 3000.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_SpellRestlessLegion_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[9]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(360.00, udg_l[9])
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_RestlessGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_SpellRestlessLegion_Func004A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[9])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SpellRestlessLegion takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SpellRestlessLegion=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SpellRestlessLegion, function Trig_SpellRestlessLegion_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Poison
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Poison_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTerrainTypeBJ(udg_l[13]) == 'Cpos' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n031' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n033' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n035' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n034' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'ndtt' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'ndtw' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'nsbm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n030' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n00M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n023' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n00N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'e007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n02D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'o00Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'osp4' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Poison_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[13]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_Poison_Func002Func002C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\OrbVenom\\OrbVenomSpecialArt.mdl")
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 40.00 ))
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Poison_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_poisonUG=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionMain)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_poisonUG, function Trig_Poison_Func002A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[13])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_poisonUG)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Poison takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Poison=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Poison)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Poison, 3.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Poison, function Trig_Poison_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lava
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lava_Func002Func002Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'h01P' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'h00O' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Lava_Func002Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTerrainTypeBJ(udg_l[12]) == 'Dlvc' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Lava_Func002Func002Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lava_Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTerrainTypeBJ(udg_l[12]) == 'Dlvc' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'h00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lava_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTerrainTypeBJ(udg_l[12]) == 'Dlvc' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h01P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n02N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n02H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n02I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'nkol' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'e007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lava_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[12]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_Lava_Func002Func002C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Environment\\LargeBuildingFire\\LargeBuildingFire2.mdl")
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 50.00 ))
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Lava_Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\SpellBreakerAttack.mdl")
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 10.00 ))
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
            if ( Trig_Lava_Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\SpellBreakerAttack.mdl")
                call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ))
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Lava_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_poisonUG=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionMain)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_poisonUG, function Trig_Lava_Func002A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[12])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_poisonUG)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lava takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lava=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Lava)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Lava, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lava, function Trig_Lava_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SuddenMeteor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SuddenMeteor_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_NeedFinalBoss == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SuddenMeteor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SuddenMeteor_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ipE=GetRandomInt(1, 6)
        set udg_l[42]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[udg_ipE])
        set udg_Count[1]=50
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[42], "Objects\\InventoryItems\\tomeGreen\\tomeGreen.mdl")
        set udg_Event[1]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_MeteorTimer)
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SuddenMeteor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SuddenMeteor=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenMeteor)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_SuddenMeteor, 60.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SuddenMeteor, function Trig_SuddenMeteor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MeteorTimer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MeteorTimer_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Count[1] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MeteorTimer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Count[1]=( udg_Count[1] - 5 )
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ(I2S(udg_Count[1]), udg_l[42], 0, 10, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 42.00, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
    if ( Trig_MeteorTimer_Func007C() ) then
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Event[1])
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_efdr_0073, "dreadlordinferno", udg_l[42])
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.85)
        call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.24, true, udg_l[42], 480.00, 60.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[42])
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MeteorTimer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MeteorTimer=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_MeteorTimer, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MeteorTimer, function Trig_MeteorTimer_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SuddenTornado
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SuddenTornado_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_NeedFinalBoss == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SuddenTornado_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SuddenTornado_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ipE=GetRandomInt(1, 6)
        set udg_l[43]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[udg_ipE])
        set udg_Count[2]=80
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[43], "Objects\\InventoryItems\\tomeBlue\\tomeBlue.mdl")
        set udg_Event[2]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_TornadoTimer)
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SuddenTornado takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SuddenTornado=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenTornado)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_SuddenTornado, 90.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SuddenTornado, function Trig_SuddenTornado_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TornadoTimer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TornadoTimer_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Count[2] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TornadoTimer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Count[2]=( udg_Count[2] - 5 )
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ(I2S(udg_Count[2]), udg_l[43], 0, 10, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
    if ( Trig_TornadoTimer_Func007C() ) then
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Event[2])
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_echm_0074, "tornado", udg_l[43])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[43])
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_TornadoTimer, 5.00)

    if ( not ( udg_NeedFinalBoss == false ) ) then

    if ( not ( udg_Count[3] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)

        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Event[3])
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_hmtm_0075, "volcano", udg_l[44])

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SuddenSpeed
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SuddenSpeed_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_NeedFinalBoss == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SuddenSpeed_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_EventTimer, false, 360.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SuddenSpeed takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SuddenSpeed=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_SuddenSpeed, udg_roundTimer)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SuddenSpeed, Condition(function Trig_SuddenSpeed_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SuddenSpeed, function Trig_SuddenSpeed_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SuddenSpeedStart
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SuddenSpeedStart_Func003Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0JP', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_SuddenSpeedStart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1924")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_playerCreeps[GetForLoopIndexA()], function Trig_SuddenSpeedStart_Func003Func001A)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SuddenSpeedStart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SuddenSpeedStart=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_SuddenSpeedStart, udg_EventTimer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SuddenSpeedStart, function Trig_SuddenSpeedStart_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetBot
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetBot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_AddBot[1]=gg_trg_test_bot_HumanAntiMagic
    set udg_AddBot[2]=gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart
    set udg_AddBot[3]=gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee
    set udg_AddBot[4]=gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfRange
    set udg_AddBot[5]=gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMagic
    set udg_AddBot[6]=gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMelee
    set udg_AddBot[7]=gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianAntiMagic
    set udg_AddBot[8]=gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee
    set udg_AddBot[9]=gg_trg_test_bot_Naga
    set udg_AddBot[10]=gg_trg_test_bot_Murloc
    set udg_AddBot[11]=gg_trg_test_bot_DemonsAntiMagic
    set udg_AddBot[12]=gg_trg_test_bot_DemonsMagicMelee
    set udg_AddBot[13]=gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic
    set udg_AddBot[14]=gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMelee
    set udg_AddBot[15]=gg_trg_test_bot_HighElfMagic
    set udg_AddBot[16]=gg_trg_test_bot_HighElfMelee
    set udg_AddBot[17]=gg_trg_test_bot_NightElfMelee
    set udg_AddBot[18]=gg_trg_test_bot_NightElfRange
    set udg_AddBot[19]=gg_trg_test_bot_OrksMelee
    set udg_AddBot[20]=gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic
    set udg_AddBot[21]=gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsMelee
    set udg_AddBot[22]=gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsRange
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetBot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetBot=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetBot, function Trig_SetBot_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AddBot2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AddBot2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(Player(1)) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AddBot2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerExecute(udg_AddBot[GetRandomInt(1, 4)])
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(1), udg_SinglePlayerGroup)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AddBot2, Condition(function Trig_AddBot2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AddBot2, function Trig_AddBot2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HumanStandart
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HumanStandart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h004', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h002', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNFootman.blp")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_HumanStandart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart, function Trig_test_bot_HumanStandart_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HumanStandart2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HumanStandart2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 5)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00U', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01E', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 5, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart2)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart2, 420.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart2, function Trig_test_bot_HumanStandart2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HumanStandart3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HumanStandart3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01N', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01R', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00E', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h011', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 10, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 10, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanStandart4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HumanStandart4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HumanStandart4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01N', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(5, 9)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e000', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HumanAntiMagic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HumanAntiMagic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h002', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00U', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNTheCaptain.blp")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanAntiMagic2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HumanAntiMagic2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HumanAntiMagic2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e000', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanAntiMagic3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HumanAntiMagic3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HumanAntiMagic3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01E', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01N', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01R', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_HumanAntiMagic4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HumanAntiMagic4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HumanAntiMagic4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01Q', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 5)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01N', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd

        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00W', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00X', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 12)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00V', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNRifleman.blp")

        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(8, 16)

            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd

            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(6, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01H', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 6)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01X', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot DwarfMelee3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_DwarfMelee3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01H', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h010', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_DwarfMelee3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee3=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee3)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee3, 1000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee3, function Trig_test_bot_DwarfMelee3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot DwarfMelee4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_DwarfMelee4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(8, 12)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(8, 12)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01X', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_DwarfMelee4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee4=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee4)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee4, 1850.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_DwarfMelee4, function Trig_test_bot_DwarfMelee4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot SkeletonMelee
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_SkeletonMelee_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u002', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSkeletonWarrior.blp")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMelee2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_SkeletonMelee takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMelee=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMelee, function Trig_test_bot_SkeletonMelee_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot SkeletonMelee2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_SkeletonMelee2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u005', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMelee3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot SkeletonMelee3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_SkeletonMelee3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 12)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00N', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00J', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMelee4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot SkeletonMelee4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_SkeletonMelee4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(6, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(6, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u007', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00F', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u002', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSkeletonMage.blp")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMagic2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot SkeletonMagic2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_SkeletonMagic2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00Q', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMagic3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u007', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(8, 12)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00F', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00N', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMagic4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction
