    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMagic3, 1000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMagic3, function Trig_test_bot_SkeletonMagic3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot SkeletonMagic4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_SkeletonMagic4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(12, 20)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00Q', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(10, 20)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_test_bot_SkeletonMagic4=CreateTrigger()

            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop

            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00L', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot NerubianMelee2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_NerubianMelee2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00O', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00L', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee2)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee2, 420.00)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot NerubianMelee3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_NerubianMelee3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00O', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00L', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03E', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee3)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee3, 1000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee3, function Trig_test_bot_NerubianMelee3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot NerubianMelee4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_NerubianMelee4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00R', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 6)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00T', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00H', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_NerubianMelee4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee4=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianMelee4)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot NerubianAntiMagic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_NerubianAntiMagic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=3
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00L', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00C', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNCryptFiend.blp")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_NerubianAntiMagic2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set bj_forLoopBIndex=4
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00N', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h013', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 6)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h014', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])

//===========================================================================

    set bj_forLoopBIndex=4
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h015', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01D', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h024', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot Murloc
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_Murloc_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=4
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(10, 16)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00O', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_Murloc2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_Murloc, function Trig_test_bot_Murloc_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot Murloc2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_Murloc2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=4
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00P', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00Q', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_Murloc3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot Murloc3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_Murloc3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=4
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00T', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01C', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 6)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01E', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o015', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_Murloc4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_Murloc3, 1000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_Murloc3, function Trig_test_bot_Murloc3_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot Murloc4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_Murloc4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=4
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 5)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01O', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01T', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o016', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 5)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01V', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00J', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot DemonsMagicMelee4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_DemonsMagicMelee4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=4
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00K', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01P', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 6)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00K', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DemonsMagicMelee5)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot DemonsMagicMelee5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_DemonsMagicMelee5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=4
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(8, 20)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01Y', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01P', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 6)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot NightElfMelee
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_NightElfMelee_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 3)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e019', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e004', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_NightElfMelee2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e005', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e009', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e003', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd

            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00J', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e009', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])

// Trigger: test bot NightElfRange4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_NightElfRange4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e008', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(10, 18)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(10, 18)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00R', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_NightElfRange5)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 4)

// Trigger: test bot HighElfMagic2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HighElfMagic2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00U', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00C', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00D', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_HighElfMagic3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

// Trigger: test bot HighElfMagic3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HighElfMagic3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00M', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00B', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00V', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_HighElfMagic4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HighElfMagic4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HighElfMagic4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e012', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00O', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00B', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00E', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e014', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot HighElfMelee4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_HighElfMelee4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(8, 12)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00T', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(8, 12)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 3)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_DefendersMagic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic, function Trig_test_bot_DefendersMagic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot DefendersMagic2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_DefendersMagic2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n018', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n016', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_DefendersMagic2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic2)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic2, 420.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic2, function Trig_test_bot_DefendersMagic2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot DefendersMagic3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_DefendersMagic3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n016', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_DefendersMagic3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic3=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic3)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic3, 1000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic3, function Trig_test_bot_DefendersMagic3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot DefendersMagic4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_DefendersMagic4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n018', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01D', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01K', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01M', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic5)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_DefendersMagic4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic4=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic4)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic4, 1850.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMagic4, function Trig_test_bot_DefendersMagic4_Actions)
endfunction

    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5

        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n018', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

function Trig_test_bot_DefendersMelee_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(5, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01O', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMelee2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01F', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 6)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n018', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_DefendersMelee3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set bj_forLoopBIndex=5

    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00F', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01K', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00K', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01M', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

        endloop

        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop

    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd

            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00F', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e011', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))

    set bj_forLoopBIndex=6
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00C', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsMelee2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop

        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1

        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00D', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsMelee3)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot TrollsMelee3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_TrollsMelee3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=6
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 6)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00F', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00V', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00Z', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsMelee4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_TrollsMelee3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsMelee3=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsMelee3)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsMelee3, 1000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsMelee3, function Trig_test_bot_TrollsMelee3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot TrollsMelee4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_TrollsMelee4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=6
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(8, 16)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01S', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 7)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00C', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 15, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_TrollsRange2)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1

        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01A', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)

            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(5, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01G', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 2)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o010', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])

//===========================================================================

    set bj_forLoopBIndex=6
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(5, 10)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 5)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o010', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction
