    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic2)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic2, 420.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic2, function Trig_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot OrksStealthMagic3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=6
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o006', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 4)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o007', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(0, 1)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00X', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o008', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic4)
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic3=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic3)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic3, 1000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic3, function Trig_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test bot OrksStealthMagic4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopBIndex=6
    set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(10, 20)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00I', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o008', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 8)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o006', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(12, 24)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o003', ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetForLoopIndexB()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexB() + 6 )))
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic4=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic4)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic4, 1850.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic4, function Trig_test_bot_OrksStealthMagic4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GetRace
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GetRace_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_PEON) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n03X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u01A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n045' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_raceBuilder[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()) == 'n03X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func010Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()) == 'u01A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func010Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()) == 'n045' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h02G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func005Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()) == 'h01C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()) == udg_raceBuilder[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetRace_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_raceBuilder[GetRandomInt(1, 11)], bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))
        set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))]=GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func005Func001C() ) then
                call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))], udg_raceIcon[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func005Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSkink.blp")
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), 200.00, 0.00)
    else
        if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_raceBuilder[GetRandomInt(12, udg_raceId)], bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))
            set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))]=GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=12
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_raceId
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func010Func001C() ) then
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_941")
                    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'n03V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                    set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))])
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), OffsetLocation(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 0.00, - 600.00), 180.00)
                    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNKobold.blp")
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func010Func002C() ) then
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_2148")
                    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'n03Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                    set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))])
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), OffsetLocation(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 0.00, - 600.00), 180.00)
                    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNDarkTroll.blp")
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func010Func003C() ) then
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_2307")
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'n043', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                    set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))])
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), OffsetLocation(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 0.00, - 600.00), 180.00)
                    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSeaGiant.blp")
                else
                endif
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
            call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), 200.00, 0.00)
        else
            set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=GetTriggerUnit()
            if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_2330")
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
                call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'n03V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))])
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), OffsetLocation(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 0.00, - 600.00), 180.00)
                call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNKobold.blp")
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_2332")
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
                call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'n03Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))])
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), OffsetLocation(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 0.00, - 600.00), 180.00)
                call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNDarkTroll.blp")
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_2331")
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
                call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'n043', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
                set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))])
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), OffsetLocation(GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 0.00, - 500.00), bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSeaGiant.blp")
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                if ( Trig_GetRace_Func001Func001Func005Func001C() ) then
                    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_raceIcon[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                else
                endif
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
            call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 200.00, 0.00)
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GetRace takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GetRace=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GetRace, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_UPGRADE_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GetRace, Condition(function Trig_GetRace_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GetRace, function Trig_GetRace_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GetNaga
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GetNaga_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_PEON) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetNaga_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h01C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetNaga_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GetNaga_Func001C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSeaWitch.blp")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GetNaga takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GetNaga=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GetNaga, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_UPGRADE_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GetNaga, Condition(function Trig_GetNaga_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GetNaga, function Trig_GetNaga_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MurlocRevolution
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MurlocRevolution_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MurlocRevolution_Func002Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h012' )
endfunction

function Trig_MurlocRevolution_Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_MurlocRevolution_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R006' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MurlocRevolution_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MurlocRevolution_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_MurlocRevolution_Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_MurlocRevolution_Func002Func001A)
        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSeaWitch.blp")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MurlocRevolution takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MurlocRevolution=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MurlocRevolution, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MurlocRevolution, Condition(function Trig_MurlocRevolution_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MurlocRevolution, function Trig_MurlocRevolution_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nele' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif

endfunction

function Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_army[udg_ip])
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func005A)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func009C() ) then
    else
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetTriggerUnit())
    endif
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011C() ) then
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func001C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func002C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func003C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func004C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func005C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func006C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func007C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func008C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func009C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010C() ) then
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func002C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func003C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func004C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func005C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func007C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func008C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func009C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011C() ) then
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func002C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func003C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func004C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func005C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func006C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func007C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func008C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func009C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011C() ) then
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func001C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func002C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func003C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func004C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func005C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func006C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func007C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func008C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func009C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011C() ) then
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func001C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func002C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func003C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func004C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func005C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func006C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func007C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func008C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func009C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011C() ) then
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func001C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func002C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func003C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func004C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func005C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func006C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func007C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func008C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func011Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func009C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                            else
                            endif
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func012C() ) then
        call SetUnitScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 200.00, 200.00, 200.00)
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 15.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func013C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Ahea', GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Ahea', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func014C() ) then
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09F', GetTriggerUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhra', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func015C() ) then
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0JN', GetTriggerUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhra', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Func016C() ) then
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05P', GetTriggerUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R003', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GetSoldierBuild takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GetSoldierBuild=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GetSoldierBuild, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_CONSTRUCT_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GetSoldierBuild, Condition(function Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GetSoldierBuild, function Trig_GetSoldierBuild_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GetSoldierUpgrade
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_PEON) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_bF25[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(GetTriggerUnit(), PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetUnitColor(GetTriggerUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func009A)
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func010C() ) then
        call SetUnitScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 75.00, 75.00, 75.00)
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 15.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit()))
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_army[udg_ip])
        set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func006A)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012C() ) then
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func002C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func003C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func004C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func005C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func007C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func008C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func009C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010C() ) then
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func002C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func003C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func004C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func005C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func006C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func007C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func008C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func009C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011C() ) then
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func001C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func002C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func003C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func004C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func005C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func006C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func007C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func008C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func009C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011C() ) then
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func001C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                        else

                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func002C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                        else

                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func003C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func004C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func005C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func006C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func007C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func008C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func009C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011C() ) then

                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                            else
                            endif

                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func003C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func004C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func005C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func006C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                            else

                            else

                            else

                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func009C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                            else
                            endif
                        else
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011C() ) then
                                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func001C() ) then
                                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                                else
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func002C() ) then
                                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                                else

                                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                                else
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func004C() ) then
                                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                                else
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func011Func012Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func005C() ) then
                                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                                else
                                endif

                                else

                                else

                                else

                            else

    else

    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017C() ) then
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func001C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func002C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func003C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
        else
        endif

            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func005C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func006C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func007C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func008C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func009C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010C() ) then
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func002C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func003C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func004C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func005C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func007C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func008C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func009C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011C() ) then
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func002C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func003C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func004C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func005C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func006C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func007C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func008C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func009C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011C() ) then
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func001C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func002C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func003C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func004C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func005C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func006C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func007C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func008C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func009C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011C() ) then
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func001C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func002C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func003C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func004C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func005C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func006C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func007C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func008C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func009C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                        if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011C() ) then
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func001C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func002C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func003C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func004C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func005C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func006C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func007C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func008C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
                            else
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func017Func010Func011Func011Func011Func011Func009C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
                            else
                            endif
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func018C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('u00G', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func019C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('u007', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func020C() ) then
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 70.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Func021C() ) then
        call SetUnitScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 75.00, 75.00, 75.00)
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 300.00, 0.70)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GetSoldierUpgrade takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GetSoldierUpgrade=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GetSoldierUpgrade, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_UPGRADE_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GetSoldierUpgrade, Condition(function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GetSoldierUpgrade, function Trig_GetSoldierUpgrade_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GetUpgrades
//
// level	bonus	income	cost	return		level	 bonus	total food	cost	cost per food
// 1	5	35	30	6		1	10	20	30	3
// 2	6	42	45	7		2	11	32	45	4
// 3	7	51	60	8		3	12	46	60	5
// 4	8	62	75	9		4	13	62	75	5
// 5	9	75	90	10		5	14	80	90	6
// 6	10	90	105	10		6	15	100	105	7
// 7	11	107	120	10		7	16	122	120	7
// 8	12	126	135	11		8	17	146	135	7
// 9	13	147	150	11		9	18	172	150	8
// 10	14	170	165	11		10	19	200	165	8
// 11	15	195	180	12		11	20	230	180	9
// 12	16	222	195	12		12	21	262	195	9
// 13	17	251	210	12		13	22	296	210	9
// 14	18	282	225	12		
// 15	19	315	240	12		
// 16	20	350	255	12		
// 17	21	387	270	12		
// 18	22	426	285	12		
// 19	23	467	300	13		
// 20	24	510	315	13		
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GetUpgrades_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() != 'R000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetResearched() != 'R001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgrades_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GetUpgrades_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgrades_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgrades_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgrades_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap(GetResearched(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple(GetResearched(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip])
    if ( Trig_GetUpgrades_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip] + ( 20 + ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple(GetResearched(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) * 10 ) ) )
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetUpgrades_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_upgFood[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_upgFood[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] + ( 9 + GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) ) )
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP, udg_upgFood[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GetUpgrades_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_upgGoldInc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_upgGoldInc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] + ( 4 + GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) ) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GetUpgrades takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GetUpgrades=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GetUpgrades, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GetUpgrades, function Trig_GetUpgrades_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GetUpgradesSylvanas
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GetUpgradesSylvanas_Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05P', GetEnumUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R003', GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())))
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgradesSylvanas_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgradesSylvanas_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GetUpgradesSylvanas_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgradesSylvanas_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap(GetResearched(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple(GetResearched(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip])
    if ( Trig_GetUpgradesSylvanas_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('e00G'), function Trig_GetUpgradesSylvanas_Func002Func001A)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GetUpgradesSylvanas takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GetUpgradesSylvanas=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GetUpgradesSylvanas, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GetUpgradesSylvanas, function Trig_GetUpgradesSylvanas_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09F', GetEnumUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhra', GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())))
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0K7', GetEnumUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhra', GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())))
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Func002Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0JN', GetEnumUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhra', GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())))
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'Rhra' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Func002Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap(GetResearched(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple(GetResearched(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip])
    if ( Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetResearchingUnit()), 'n016'), function Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Func002Func001A)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetResearchingUnit()), 'n04O'), function Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Func002Func002A)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow, function Trig_GetUpgradesMagicCrossbow_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CheckValue
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CheckValue_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_CheckValue_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_CheckValue_Func001Func003A)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
endfunction

function Trig_CheckValue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_CheckValue_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CheckValue takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CheckValue=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_CheckValue, 6.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CheckValue, function Trig_CheckValue_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unlock250Value
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unlock250Value_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerValue[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] >= 250 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unlock250Value_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Unlock250Value_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Z', GetEnumPlayer(), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_pg250value)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Unlock250Value_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_pg250value, function Trig_Unlock250Value_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unlock250Value takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unlock250Value=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unlock250Value, function Trig_Unlock250Value_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SelectBlacksmith
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SelectBlacksmith_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A018' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SelectBlacksmith_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_blacksmith[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_SelectBlacksmith=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SelectBlacksmith, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SelectBlacksmith, Condition(function Trig_SelectBlacksmith_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SelectBlacksmith, function Trig_SelectBlacksmith_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A021' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
endfunction
