    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithClick, Condition(function Trig_DeselectBlacksmithClick_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithClick, function Trig_DeselectBlacksmithClick_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DeselectBlacksmithEsc
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DeselectBlacksmithEsc_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitSelected(udg_blacksmith[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], GetTriggerPlayer()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DeselectBlacksmithEsc_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], GetTriggerPlayer())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DeselectBlacksmithEsc takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithEsc=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithEsc, Player(0))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithEsc, Player(1))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithEsc, Player(2))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithEsc, Player(3))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithEsc, Player(4))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithEsc, Player(5))
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithEsc, Condition(function Trig_DeselectBlacksmithEsc_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DeselectBlacksmithEsc, function Trig_DeselectBlacksmithEsc_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HeroGlowColourChange
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HeroGlowColourChange_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_PEON) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HeroGlowColourChange_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(GetTriggerUnit(), PLAYER_COLOR_MAROON)
    call SetUnitColor(GetTriggerUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HeroGlowColourChange takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HeroGlowColourChange=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_HeroGlowColourChange, GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_HeroGlowColourChange, Condition(function Trig_HeroGlowColourChange_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HeroGlowColourChange, function Trig_HeroGlowColourChange_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Difficulty
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'nhfp' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'nftr' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'nbrg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'nrog' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'nspb' ) ) then

        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h001', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
    else

            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h001', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        else

                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h004', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h006', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                else

                                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h01R', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                    else

                                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                        else

    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func009Func001Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'u002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
    else
        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func009Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'u000', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        else
            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func009Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'u002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            else

                    else
                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func009Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func010Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'u00W', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00N', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u00Q', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func013Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n01L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01N', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01E', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'e011', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'n016', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'n018', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level20), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func013Func001Func007A)
    else
    endif
endfunction

                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'e009', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func015Func001Func005Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'e00X', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func015Func001Func005Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'e00N', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func016A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func016Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'e00Y', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03B', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e008', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00J', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'e00H', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'e00W', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(14, 'e00R', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'e00X', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'e009', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
endfunction

    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
    else
        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00P', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        else
            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00P', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            else
                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00S', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00S', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00U', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00U', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00N', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00R', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                        else

                                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00R', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)

                                                else
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001Func002C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h013', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
    else

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func011Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o01T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'h014', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'o01O', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func014Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n01L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(12, 'n01I', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'n01G', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'e00K', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n00S', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
    else
        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n00S', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        else
            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n00S', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            else
                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'e00C', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'e00C', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'e00C', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                        else

                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n00T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n00U', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n00U', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                    else

                                        else

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00N', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
    else
        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00N', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        else
            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00N', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            else
                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00F', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00F', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00F', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o01Q', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00K', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                                else
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
    else
        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        else
            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            else
                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00F', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h01T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h027', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00O', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o01B', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o01K', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00O', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00O', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00L', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                                else

                                                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o01Q', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                                    else

                                                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h01T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                                        else
                                                            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00K', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                                            else
                                                                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then

                                                                else

                                                                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o01B', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                                                                    else
                                                                    endif
                                                                endif
                                                            endif
                                                        endif
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func003C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h01T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
    else
        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h01T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        else
            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h027', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            else
                if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o01Q', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h01Y', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h01J', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'o00K', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func011Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'nsgb' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func011Func001C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'h00J', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00K', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'h01P', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'h00L', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'e007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'ndqp', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
endfunction

    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func017Func002C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'n04P', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'nfov', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetUnitLoc(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossEnemies == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Difficulty_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_CoinSpawner)
    set udg_BossEnemies=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, I2S(udg_BossEnemies))
    if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_overlordsIP=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 4
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func002Func001A)
            set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
            set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
        endloop
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level05), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func003A)
        set udg_levelArmy[5]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level05)
        // Second Boss
        set udg_overlordsIP=6
        loop
            exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 9
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func006Func001A)
            set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
            set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
        endloop
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level10), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func007A)
        set udg_levelArmy[10]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level10)
        // Third Boss
        set udg_overlordsIP=11
        loop
            exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 14
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func010Func001A)
            set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
            set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
        endloop
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level15), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func011A)
        set udg_levelArmy[15]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level15)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level25), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func013A)
        set udg_levelArmy[25]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level25)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level30), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func015A)
        set udg_levelArmy[30]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level30)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level35), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func017A)
        set udg_levelArmy[35]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level35)
    else
        if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001C() ) then
            set udg_overlordsIP=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 4
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func002Func001A)
                set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
                set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
            endloop
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level05), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func003A)
            set udg_levelArmy[5]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level05)
            // Second Boss
            set udg_overlordsIP=6
            loop
                exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 9
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func006Func001A)
                set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
                set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
            endloop
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level10), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func007A)
            set udg_levelArmy[10]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level10)
            // Third Boss
            set udg_overlordsIP=11
            loop
                exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 14
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func010Func001A)
                set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
                set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
            endloop
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level15), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func011A)
            set udg_levelArmy[15]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level15)
            set udg_overlordsIP=16
            loop
                exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 19
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func013Func001A)
                set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
                set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
            endloop
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level20), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func014A)
            set udg_levelArmy[20]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level20)
        else
            if ( Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_overlordsIP=1
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 4
                    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
                    set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
                endloop
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level05), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func002A)
                set udg_levelArmy[5]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level05)
                // Second Boss
                set udg_overlordsIP=6
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 9
                    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func005Func001A)
                    set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
                    set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
                endloop
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level10), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func006A)
                set udg_levelArmy[10]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level10)
                // Third Boss
                set udg_overlordsIP=11
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 14
                    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func009Func001A)
                    set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
                    set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
                endloop
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level15), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func010A)
                set udg_levelArmy[15]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level15)
                set udg_overlordsIP=16
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 19
                    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func012Func001A)
                    set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
                    set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
                endloop
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level20), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func013A)
                set udg_levelArmy[20]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level20)
                set udg_overlordsIP=21
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_overlordsIP > 24
                    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP]), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func015Func001A)
                    set udg_levelArmy[udg_overlordsIP]=GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_levelRegion[udg_overlordsIP])
                    set udg_overlordsIP=udg_overlordsIP + 1
                endloop
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level25), function Trig_Difficulty_Func004Func001Func001Func016A)
                set udg_levelArmy[25]=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_level25)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Difficulty takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Difficulty=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Difficulty, function Trig_Difficulty_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CoinSpawner
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CoinSpawner_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_NeedFinalBoss == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CoinSpawner_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_CoinSpawner_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ipE=GetRandomInt(1, 6)
        set udg_l[82]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_visionRegion[udg_ipE])
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nogo', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[82], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[82])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CoinSpawner takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CoinSpawner=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CoinSpawner)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_CoinSpawner, 70.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CoinSpawner, function Trig_CoinSpawner_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TidalIncomeIncrease
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TidalIncomeIncrease_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nele' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TidalIncomeIncrease_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_upgGoldInc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_upgGoldInc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] + 16 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TidalIncomeIncrease takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TidalIncomeIncrease=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TidalIncomeIncrease, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_CONSTRUCT_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TidalIncomeIncrease, Condition(function Trig_TidalIncomeIncrease_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TidalIncomeIncrease, function Trig_TidalIncomeIncrease_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TidalIncomeDecrease
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TidalIncomeDecrease_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nele' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TidalIncomeDecrease_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_upgGoldInc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_upgGoldInc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] - 16 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TidalIncomeDecrease takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TidalIncomeDecrease=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TidalIncomeDecrease, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TidalIncomeDecrease, Condition(function Trig_TidalIncomeDecrease_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TidalIncomeDecrease, function Trig_TidalIncomeDecrease_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]) == 'n03V' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]) == 'n03W' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap(GetResearched(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple(GetResearched(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip])
    set udg_ipo=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetResearchingUnit()))
    if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004C() ) then
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func002Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A003', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func002Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func003C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func003Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IF', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00B', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func003Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IF', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func004C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func004Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00E', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func004Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08C', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func005C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func005Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06Q', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func005Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06Q', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func006C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func006Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08G', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00G', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func006Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func007C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func007Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A008', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00F', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func007Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A008', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func008C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], 'n03W', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))]=GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ipo])
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A005', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func008Func005C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A003', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00B', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func008Func006C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IF', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IF', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00C', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00B', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func008Func007C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08C', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00E', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func008Func008C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06Q', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06Q', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func008Func009C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08G', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00G', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func004Func008Func010C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A008', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A008', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00F', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005C() ) then
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func002Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GF', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func002Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GF', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func003C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func003Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00A', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00I', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func003Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00A', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func004C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func004Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08L', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00L', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func004Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08L', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func005C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func005Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06Y', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00M', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func005Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06Y', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func006C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func006Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0ID', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00O', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func006Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0ID', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func007C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func007Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0I6', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00N', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func007Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0I6', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func008C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], 'n040', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))]=GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ipo])
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func008Func004C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GF', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GF', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00I', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func008Func005C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00A', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00A', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00J', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00I', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func008Func006C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08L', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08L', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00M', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00L', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func008Func007C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06Y', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06Y', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00L', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00M', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func008Func008C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0ID', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0ID', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00N', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00O', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func005Func008Func009C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0I6', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0I6', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00O', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00N', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006C() ) then
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func002Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00G', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00Q', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func002Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00G', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func003C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func003Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00F', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00P', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func003Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00F', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func004C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func004Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06S', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00T', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func004Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06S', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func005C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func005Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A084', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00S', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func005Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A084', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func006C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func006Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IA', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00U', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func006Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IA', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func007C() ) then
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func007Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08P', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00V', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
            else
                if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func007Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08P', udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00U', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func008C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], 'n044', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
            set udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))]=GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ipo])
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func008Func004C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00G', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00G', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00P', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00Q', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func008Func005C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00F', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00F', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00Q', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00P', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func008Func006C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06S', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06S', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00S', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00T', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func008Func007C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A084', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A084', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00T', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00S', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func008Func008C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IA', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IA', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00V', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00U', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Func006Func008Func009C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08P', udg_builder[udg_ipo])
                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08P', udg_builder[udg_ipo], GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00U', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo)))
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00V', 0, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipo))
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_overlordsUpgrades takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_overlordsUpgrades=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_overlordsUpgrades, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_overlordsUpgrades, Condition(function Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_overlordsUpgrades, function Trig_overlordsUpgrades_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: offOverlordsAI
//===========================================================================
function Trig_offOverlordsAI_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Underwalk_Cast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Worms_Cast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Tricking_cast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_TaskmasterSlamCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_TaskmasterShockwaveCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DarkTrollAxesCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DarkTrollBoarCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DarkTrollFogCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DarkTrollWindWalk)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_BehemothMinionsCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_BehemothSWAGCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_BehemothStompCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_BehemothWaveCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_BehemothWaterSpellCast)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_offOverlordsAI takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_offOverlordsAI=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_offOverlordsAI, function Trig_offOverlordsAI_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SinglePlayer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SinglePlayer_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerController(Player(1)) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_SinglePlayer_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerController(Player(2)) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_SinglePlayer_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerController(Player(3)) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_SinglePlayer_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(4)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerController(Player(4)) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_SinglePlayer_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(5)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerController(Player(5)) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_SinglePlayer_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_SinglePlayer_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_SinglePlayer_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_SinglePlayer_Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_SinglePlayer_Func007C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_SinglePlayer_Func008C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SinglePlayer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_SinglePlayer=true
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(0), udg_SinglePlayerGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SinglePlayer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SinglePlayer=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SinglePlayer, Condition(function Trig_SinglePlayer_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SinglePlayer, function Trig_SinglePlayer_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetReady
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetReady_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SetReady_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_notReadyPlayers) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SetReady_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_notReadyPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SetReady_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SetReady_Func001C() ) then
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_notReadyPlayers)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 5.00, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] + " is |cff00ff00ready|r." ))
        if ( Trig_SetReady_Func001Func003C() ) then
            call StartTimerBJ(udg_roundTimer, false, 1.00)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetReady takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetReady=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SetReady, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SetReady, Condition(function Trig_SetReady_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetReady, function Trig_SetReady_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SargerasBattleFailure
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SargerasBattleFailure_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_SargerasBattleFailure_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_AlliesSargerasBattle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SargerasBattleFailure_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SargerasBattleFailure_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_SargerasBattleFailure_Func001Func003A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
        set udg_BossEnd=true
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SargerasBattleFailure takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SargerasBattleFailure=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SargerasBattleFailure)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_SargerasBattleFailure, 7.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SargerasBattleFailure, function Trig_SargerasBattleFailure_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: NozdormuFailure
//===========================================================================
function Trig_NozdormuFailure_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_NozdormuFailure_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_AlliesSargerasBattle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NozdormuFailure_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_NozdormuFailure_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_teamBattleArena)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_NozdormuFailure_Func001Func003A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_NozdormuFailure takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_NozdormuFailure=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_NozdormuFailure)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_NozdormuFailure, 7.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_NozdormuFailure, function Trig_NozdormuFailure_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SargerasBattleSuccess
//
// players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'n014' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Func005Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 150000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Func005Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PlayerIsAtFinalBoss[udg_ip]=false
    set udg_NeedFinalBoss=false
    set udg_modeDuelFrequency=1
    set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=( udg_modeDuelFrequency * 1 )
    if ( Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_spawnRegion[udg_ip]=gg_rct_bossSpawn
        set udg_HolyWar=true
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('n02B'), function Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Func005Func004A)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle), function Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Func005Func005A)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundEnd)
    else
        call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_EndingChoice, "TRIGSTR_5876")
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_EndingChoice, "TRIGSTR_5877")
        set udg_HW=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_EndingChoice, "TRIGSTR_5878")
        set udg_AW=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_EndingChoice, ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 6 )))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SargerasBattleSuccess takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SargerasBattleSuccess=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SargerasBattleSuccess)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SargerasBattleSuccess, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SargerasBattleSuccess, Condition(function Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SargerasBattleSuccess, function Trig_SargerasBattleSuccess_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: NozdormuEnd
//===========================================================================
function Trig_NozdormuEnd_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'n03H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NozdormuEnd_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_players, 30, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] + " |CFF00B5B5su|CFF00B3B5rv|CFF00B1B5iv|CFF00AEB4ed |CFF00ABB4in |CFF00ABB3Ho|CFF00ADB3ly |CFF00B1B4Wa|CFF00B3B4r." ))
    call CustomVictoryBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), true, true)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Survived)
endfunction

function Trig_NozdormuEnd_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_NozdormuEnd_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
