    set gg_trg_NozdormuEnd=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_NozdormuEnd)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_NozdormuEnd, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_NozdormuEnd, Condition(function Trig_NozdormuEnd_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_NozdormuEnd, function Trig_NozdormuEnd_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LastChoiceA
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LastChoiceA_Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_ip]=udg_BattleRoyal[udg_ip]
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_tempPlayers)
endfunction

function Trig_LastChoiceA_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_AW ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LastChoiceA_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_LastChoiceA_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_LastChoiceA_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_AnnihilationWar=true
        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_LastChoiceA_Func001Func002A)
        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
        call ForceClear(udg_AntiBossTeam)
    else
    endif
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle), function Trig_LastChoiceA_Func003A)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundEnd)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LastChoiceA takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LastChoiceA=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_LastChoiceA, udg_EndingChoice)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LastChoiceA, function Trig_LastChoiceA_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AnnihilationEnds
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'ohwd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_teamBattleArena, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'u008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'u009' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001C() ) then
            set udg_ip=GetForLoopIndexA()
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001Func004C() ) then
                set udg_playerLives[udg_ip]=0
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_6881")
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_players, 30, ( udg_playerName[udg_ip] + " |cffff0000has been eliminated.|r" ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], I2S(udg_playerLives[udg_ip]))
                call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func005A)
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_players)
                if ( Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func007C() ) then
                    set udg_winningPlayer=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_players)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_players, 30, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_winningPlayer)] + " is the last surviving player." ))
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameEnd)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AnnihilationEnds takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AnnihilationEnds=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_AnnihilationEnds)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AnnihilationEnds, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AnnihilationEnds, Condition(function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AnnihilationEnds, function Trig_AnnihilationEnds_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LastChoiceH
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LastChoiceH_Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_ip]=gg_rct_bossSpawn
    set udg_HolyWar=true
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())), udg_AntiBossTeam)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) + 6 )), udg_AntiBossTeam)
endfunction

function Trig_LastChoiceH_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_HW ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LastChoiceH_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_LastChoiceH_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_LastChoiceH_Func001C() ) then
        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_LastChoiceH_Func001Func001A)
        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    else
    endif
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle), function Trig_LastChoiceH_Func003A)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundEnd)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_LastChoiceH=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_LastChoiceH, udg_EndingChoice)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LastChoiceH, function Trig_LastChoiceH_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HolyWarFaliure
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_players, 30, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] + " |CFF00B5B5su|CFF00B3B5rv|CFF00B1B5iv|CFF00AEB4ed |CFF00ABB4in |CFF00ABB3Ho|CFF00ADB3ly |CFF00B1B4Wa|CFF00B3B4r." ))
    call CustomVictoryBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), true, true)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Survived)
endfunction

function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_HolyEndGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_HolyEndGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func004Func002C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_HolyEndGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_AlliesSargerasBattle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func004A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_test_endround)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_kill)
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
        if ( Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func001Func001A)
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle), function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Func001Func001Func003A)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HolyWarFaliure takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HolyWarFaliure=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_HolyWarFaliure)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_HolyWarFaliure, 7.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HolyWarFaliure, function Trig_HolyWarFaliure_Actions)
endfunction

// For each 1-6
// kill in the end

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_notReadyPlayers)
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_forecastLevel[udg_ip]=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] + 1 )
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=20
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()), 20.00, ( "[Level " + ( I2S(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]) + ( ( ", attempt " + I2S(udg_playerLevelAttempts[udg_ip]) ) + "]" ) ) ))
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_gSpawnVsCreeps)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenSpeed)
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func016Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetTriggerPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func016Func009Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_AlliesSargerasBattle)
    call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 4000.00)
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func016Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func016Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_visionBossBattle, GetEnumPlayer()), function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func016Func009Func001Func001A)
        set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[2], 0.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SargerasBattleFailure)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SargerasBattleSuccess)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_HellRage)
    else
    endif
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_iS == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_NeedFinalBoss == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func017Func023Func002C() ) then

        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[2], 0.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_HolyWarFaliure)
    else
    endif
endfunction

        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    else

    endif

    if ( not ( udg_duelTicker == udg_modeDuelFrequency ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) >= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_massDuelTicker == udg_modeMassDuelFrequency ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return ( udg_BossEnd == true )
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_NeedFinalBoss == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_allUnits) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_duelTicker == udg_modeDuelFrequency ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) != 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_duelTicker == udg_modeMassDuelFrequency ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) != 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[udg_ip] >= udg_modeVictoryPoints ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func003Func002C() ) then
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_winningPlayers)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_winningPlayers) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_winningPlayers) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004Func004Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_winningPlayers)
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_winningPlayers) >= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_winningPlayers) != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    set udg_i=( 40 + ( udg_round * 10 ) )
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r." ) ))
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] > udg_i ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func004Func001C() ) then
        set udg_i=udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] == udg_i ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func005Func001C() ) then
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_winningPlayers)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_winningPlayers) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_winningPlayers) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func008Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_players)
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func008Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_winningPlayers)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_players)
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_winningPlayers) >= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_round == udg_rrRoundId ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call ForForce(udg_notReadyPlayers, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func002A)
    set udg_indexId=0
    set udg_round=( udg_round + 1 )
    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005C() ) then
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundTournament)
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_StartDuel)
    else
        if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
            call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_CastleDefenceGroup, udg_CastleDefenceGroup, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
            call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_TwinBossGroup, udg_TwinBossGroup, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
            call ForceClear(udg_TwinBossGroup)
            call ForceClear(udg_CastleDefenceGroup)
            call ForceClear(udg_team1P)
            call ForceClear(udg_team2P)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundMassDuel)
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_StartDuel)
            // Change it if MassDuelFrequency is not equal DuelFrequency * N
            set udg_duelTicker=0
        else
            set udg_massDuelTicker=( udg_massDuelTicker + 1 )
            if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015C() ) then
                call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_CastleDefenceGroup, udg_CastleDefenceGroup, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_TwinBossGroup, udg_TwinBossGroup, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                call ForceClear(udg_TwinBossGroup)
                call ForceClear(udg_CastleDefenceGroup)
                call ForceClear(udg_team1P)
                call ForceClear(udg_team2P)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundDuel)
                call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_StartDuel)
            else
                if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001C() ) then
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundExtinction)
                    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_StartDuel)
                else
                    call ForceClear(udg_TwinBossGroup)
                    call ForceClear(udg_CastleDefenceGroup)
                    call ForceClear(udg_team1P)
                    call ForceClear(udg_team2P)
                    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_NewRound)
                    set udg_duelTicker=( udg_duelTicker + 1 )
                    set udg_extinctionTicker=( udg_extinctionTicker + 1 )
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "- - - |cffffcc00Round " + ( I2S(udg_round) + "|r - - -" ) ))
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func011C() ) then
                        call MultiboardSetTitleText(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), ( ( "Classic - [|cffffffffRound " + I2S(udg_round) ) + ( "|r]" + ( " Next Round: [|cffffffff" + ( R2S(TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer)) + "|r]" ) ) ) ))
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func012C() ) then
                        call MultiboardSetTitleText(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), ( ( "Survival - [|cffffffffRound " + I2S(udg_round) ) + ( "|r]" + ( " Next Round: [|cffffffff" + ( R2S(TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer)) + "|r]" ) ) ) ))
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func013C() ) then
                        call MultiboardSetTitleText(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), ( ( "Overlords Ascention - [|cffffffffRound " + I2S(udg_round) ) + ( "|r]" + ( " Next Round: [|cffffffff" + ( R2S(TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer)) + "|r]" ) ) ) ))
                    else
                    endif
                    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func014A)
                    // ----------------Boss spawn------------------
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func016C() ) then
                        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func016Func001A)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02B', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Portal), bj_UNIT_FACING)
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n014', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn), GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_Sargeras)
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                        call ForForce(udg_AntiBossTeam, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func016Func009A)
                        set udg_iS=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
                        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_SargerasSpell[udg_iS], GetLastCreatedUnit())
                        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 9000.00)
                        if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func016Func013C() ) then
                            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_AncientFearGolems)
                        else
                            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_AncientFearGolems)
                        endif
                        set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_tbBot2)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func017C() ) then
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n013', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Archimond), GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_HolyEndGroup)
                        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n012', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Tichondrius), GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_HolyEndGroup)
                        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n011', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Mannoroth), GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_HolyEndGroup)
                        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=30
                        loop
                            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h022', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_FelGuards), GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                            set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                            call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
                            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                        endloop
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=60
                        loop
                            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nfgb', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_RightGeneral), GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                            set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                            call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
                            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                        endloop
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=13
                        loop
                            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'ndqp', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_LeftGeneral), GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                            set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                            call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
                            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                        endloop
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=8
                        loop
                            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01Z', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_TopGeneral), GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                            set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                            call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
                            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                        endloop
                        call ForForce(udg_AntiBossTeam, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func017Func023A)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func018C() ) then
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03H', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Nozdormu), bj_UNIT_FACING)
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 9000.00)
                        call ForForce(udg_AntiBossTeam, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func018Func006A)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_FORCE_PLAYER[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM], bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_FORCE_PLAYER[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA], bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) + 6 ))), bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) + 6 ))), bj_FORCE_PLAYER[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM], bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) + 6 ))), bj_FORCE_PLAYER[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA], bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) + 6 ))), bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE], bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM], GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA], GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE], GetForceOfPlayer(GetEnumPlayer()), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE], GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) + 6 ))), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM], GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) + 6 ))), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA], GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) + 6 ))), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE], GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) + 6 ))), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_AnnihilationEnds)
                        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_NozdormuFailure)
                        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_teamBattleArena), function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func018Func025A)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func019C() ) then
                        call ForForce(udg_cameraAutoSnapPG, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func005Func001Func015Func001Func019Func001A)
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nfgb', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_teamBattleArena), GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
                        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
                        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 3000.00)
                        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_AnnihilationEnds)
                    else
                    endif
                    // ----------------=========------------------
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func006C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SargerasFightLoop)
        loop
            exitwhen ( (udg_BossEnd == true) ) // INLINED!!
            call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 1))
        endloop
        set udg_BossEnd=false
    else
    endif
    loop
        exitwhen ( (IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_allUnits) == true) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 1))
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010C() ) then
        if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006C() ) then
            set udg_i=0
            call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func004A)
            call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func005A)
            if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func006C() ) then
                set udg_winningPlayer=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_winningPlayers)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameEnd)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func007C() ) then
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameEndTieBreaker)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func008C() ) then
                set udg_modeVictoryPoints=( udg_modeVictoryPoints + 1 )
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5189")
                call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func008Func003A)
                call ForForce(udg_winningPlayers, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func008Func004A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_ScheduleRoundRobin)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundEnd)
            else
            endif
        else
            call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func006Func001A)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundEnd)
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, "TRIGSTR_5188")
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func002C() ) then
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, "TRIGSTR_7735")
        else
        endif
        call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func003A)
        if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004C() ) then
            if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004Func002C() ) then
                set udg_winningPlayer=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_winningPlayers)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameEnd)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004Func003C() ) then
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameEndTieBreaker)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004Func004C() ) then
                set udg_modeVictoryPoints=( udg_modeVictoryPoints + 1 )
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "Victory condition automatically changed to " + ( I2S(udg_modeVictoryPoints) + " points." ) ))
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundEnd)
                call ForForce(udg_winningPlayers, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Func010Func004Func004Func004A)
            else
            endif
        else
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameRoundEnd)
        endif
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_kill)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameRoundMain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameRoundMain=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_GameRoundMain, udg_roundTimer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameRoundMain, function Trig_GameRoundMain_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameRoundEnd
//
// visBB  Add unitsTerrain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func004002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n01J' )
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func007002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_CharmGroup) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func013002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'nfgt' )
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func016002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'nskg' )
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func017A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func019002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n022' )
endfunction

    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n035' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func134Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func134Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func134A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func134Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func140A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerInDuel[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=false
    call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_builder[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]) + udg_modeManaRegeneration ))
    set udg_l[2]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetEnumPlayer())
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_l[2], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func144Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SinglePlayer == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func144C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func145C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_NeedFinalBoss == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_HolyWar == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_AnnihilationWar == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_NeedSecretBoss == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func146Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(GetEnumPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func146A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func146Func001C() ) then
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_notReadyPlayers)
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_endRoundGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func147C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_classicDuels == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func148C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_extinctionTicker == udg_modeExtinctionFrequency ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func001002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func004002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func007002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func008A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionDuels)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func011A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func013002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func016002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func017A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func019002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func020A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func022002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func023A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func025002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func026A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func028002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func029A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func031002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func032A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func034002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func035A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func037002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func038A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func040002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func041A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func043002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func044A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func046002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func047A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func049002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func050A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func052002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func053A)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func054002002))
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func056A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func058002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func059A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func061002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func062A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func064002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func065A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func067002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func068A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func070002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func071A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func073002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func074A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func077A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func079002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func080A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func082002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func083A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func085002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func086A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func088002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func089A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func091002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func092A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func094002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func095A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func097002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func098A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func100002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func101A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func103002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func104A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func106002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func107A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_v05)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func110A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
    if ( Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func113C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func113Func001A)
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_vision01)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func116A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_vision02)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func119A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_vision03)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func122A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_v06)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func125A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_vision04)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func128A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_twinBossVision)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func131A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_castleDefenceArea)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func134A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Medivh_Crow)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Medivh_BackTrack)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_IllidanMorph)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SirDinadanTauntCast)
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func140A)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, "TRIGSTR_1157")
    // DeleteOldCreepWavesUnit
    // DeleteOldWavesEnd
    if ( Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func144C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_roundTimer, false, 60.00)
    else
        if ( Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func144Func002C() ) then
        else
            call StartTimerBJ(udg_roundTimer, false, 30.00)
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func145C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetPlayersAllies(udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()]), GetPlayersAllies(udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()]), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 6 )), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(ConvertedPlayer(( GetForLoopIndexA() + 6 )), ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func146A)
    if ( Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func147C() ) then
        set udg_duelTicker=1
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, "TRIGSTR_7874")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameRoundEnd_Func148C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, "TRIGSTR_1835")
    else
    endif
    set udg_eR=0
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_EventTimer)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_OrderGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_shoutForHelpGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_CharmGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_DarkGiftGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_DragonRitualGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_FrostBurstGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_HexGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_HexUnitGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_KilJaedenExplosionGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_MetheorUnitGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_StoneGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_SunWellGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ReaperFear)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_End)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameRoundEnd takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameRoundEnd=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameRoundEnd, function Trig_GameRoundEnd_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameEndTieBreaker
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameEndTieBreaker_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=20
endfunction

function Trig_GameEndTieBreaker_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1159")
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    set udg_i=1
    call ForForce(udg_winningPlayers, function Trig_GameEndTieBreaker_Func004A)
    set udg_tempPlayer=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_winningPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer, udg_winningPlayers)
    set udg_tempPlayer2=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_winningPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer2, udg_winningPlayers)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_1165")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] + ( " vs " + udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)] ) ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest)
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameDuelEnds)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameEndTieBreakerEnd)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameEndTieBreaker takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameEndTieBreaker=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameEndTieBreaker, function Trig_GameEndTieBreaker_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameEndTieBreakerEnd
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func004Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexB()] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func004Func002Func001Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip2])
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func004Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func004Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001C() ) then
            set udg_ip=GetForLoopIndexA()
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func004C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, ( ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))] + " has beaten " ) + ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] + "!" ) ))
                set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
                    if ( Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func004Func002Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_ip2=GetForLoopIndexB()
                        set udg_winningPlayer=ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB())
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip2], function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Func004Func001Func004Func002Func001Func004A)
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameEnd)
                    else
                    endif
                    set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
                endloop
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameEndTieBreakerEnd=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameEndTieBreakerEnd)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GameEndTieBreakerEnd, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GameEndTieBreakerEnd, Condition(function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameEndTieBreakerEnd, function Trig_GameEndTieBreakerEnd_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameEnd
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameEnd_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_pgTips)
endfunction

function Trig_GameEnd_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_x=( GetLocationX(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationX(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_y=( GetLocationY(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationY(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_podium)
    set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[2], udg_x, udg_y)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(100.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
endfunction

function Trig_GameEnd_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_podium)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_winCam1, GetEnumPlayer(), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_winCam2, GetEnumPlayer(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_GameEnd_Func019001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() != udg_winningPlayer )
endfunction

function Trig_GameEnd_Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CustomDefeatBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), "TRIGSTR_1854")
endfunction

function Trig_GameEnd_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_GameEnd_Func003A)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Victory)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 120.00, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_winningPlayer)] + " has won the game." ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 120.00, "TRIGSTR_1153")
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_winningPlayer)
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[udg_ip]=300
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_GameEnd_Func010A)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_GameEnd_Func011A)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundDuel)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundEnd)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundMain)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundSuccess)
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    call CustomVictoryBJ(udg_winningPlayer, true, true)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_GameEnd_Func019001001)), function Trig_GameEnd_Func019A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameEnd takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameEnd=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameEnd, function Trig_GameEnd_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: gSpawnVsCreeps
//
// Spawn Sargeras
// Random skills for bosses
//===========================================================================
function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_x=( GetLocationX(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationX(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_y=( GetLocationY(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationY(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[udg_ip])
    set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[2], udg_x, udg_y)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
    set udg_u=GetEnumUnit()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func012C() ) then
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn), 0, 1000.00)
    else
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
    endif
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func015C() ) then
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func015Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn), - 1000.00, 3000.00)
        else
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
        endif
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func016C() ) then
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func016Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn), 1000.00, 3000.00)
        else
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
        endif
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_SmallSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(1, 9)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func010C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func011C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001C() ) then
            call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_MediumSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(1, 9)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func001C() ) then
                call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_BigSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(1, 3)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func001Func010C() ) then
                    set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func001Func011C() ) then
                    set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_BigSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(4, 6)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                    set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func001Func001Func010C() ) then
                        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func001Func001Func011C() ) then
                        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_BigSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(7, 12)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func001Func001Func001Func009C() ) then
                            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func017Func001Func001Func001Func001Func010C() ) then
                            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func018C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02T', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func019C() ) then

    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func029C() ) then
        set udg_Matilda[udg_ip]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func029Func002C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func029Func003C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func029Func004C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()

            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func030C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=7
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func030Func001Func008C() ) then
