            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func031C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=9
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "war3mapImported\\PoisonCloudKingSize.mdx")
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func031Func001Func009C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func031Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func032Func001C() ) then
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allMercenaryUnits[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit(), OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), - 1000.00, 2000.00))
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0.00, 0.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
            call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetPlayersAllies(udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()]), GetPlayersAllies(udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()]), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
        else
            if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002Func032Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_ipl[udg_ip]=( udg_ipl[udg_ip] + GetUnitLevel(GetLastCreatedUnit()) )
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit(), OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 1000.00, 2000.00))
                call SetUnitOwner(GetLastCreatedUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), false)
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0.00, 0.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Creep) == 'ndrj' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Creep) == 'h00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] > 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] < 33 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] > 25 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] < 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] > 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] < 25 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func021Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'nkol' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'ndtw' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'nsgb' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'nsbm' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'e007' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'edes' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'ndqs' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'n014' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func021Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_l[0]=GetRectCenter(udg_levelRegion[udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]])
    set udg_x=( GetLocationX(udg_l[1]) - GetLocationX(udg_l[0]) )
    set udg_y=( GetLocationY(udg_l[1]) - GetLocationY(udg_l[0]) )
    set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(udg_creepRegion[udg_ip])
    set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[2], udg_x, udg_y)
    set udg_Creep=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func008C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=3
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 3000.00)
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerCreeps[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func009C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02T', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011C() ) then
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_TacticalCreeps[GetRandomInt(1, 2)])
        else
            if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001Func002C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_TacticalCreeps[GetRandomInt(1, 3)])
            else
                if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_TacticalCreeps[GetRandomInt(1, 4)])
                else
                    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_TacticalCreeps[GetRandomInt(1, 4)])
                    else
                        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_TacticalCreeps[GetRandomInt(1, 5)])
                        else
                            if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_TacticalCreeps[GetRandomInt(1, 5)])
                            else
                                if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func011Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_TacticalCreeps[GetRandomInt(1, 5)])
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func012C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_TaskMaster[GetRandomInt(1, 5)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func013C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_DarkTrollSpell[GetRandomInt(1, 5)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AG', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func014C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_BehemothSpell[GetRandomInt(0, 3)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AI', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func015C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_BroodSpell[GetRandomInt(1, 3)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AJ', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func016C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_StronholdSpell[GetRandomInt(1, 3)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AD', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func017C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_AncientDragon[GetRandomInt(1, 3)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AK', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func018C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_QueenSpell2[GetRandomInt(0, 2)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func019C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_QueenSpell1[GetRandomInt(0, 2)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func020C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        set udg_iS=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_SargerasSpell[udg_iS], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func020Func005C() ) then
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_AncientFearGolems)
        else
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_AncientFearGolems)
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001Func021C() ) then
        set udg_boss[udg_ip]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 3000.00)
    set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_spawnRegion[udg_ip])
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerCreeps[udg_ip])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ipl[udg_ip] > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[udg_ip])
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[2], 0.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    else
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func002A)
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_levelArmy[udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]], function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func003Func001A)
    else
    endif
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_ipl[udg_ip], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    if ( Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Func005C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_ipl[udg_ip]) + " gold|r from |CFF00D857Burn|CFF00D158ing L|CFF00CE59egio|CFF00D658n|r for your mercenaries." ) ))
    else
    endif
    set udg_ipl[udg_ip]=0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_gSpawnVsCreeps takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_gSpawnVsCreeps=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_gSpawnVsCreeps, function Trig_gSpawnVsCreeps_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameRoundFailure
//
// !!!
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_visionMain, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_visionBossBattle, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_twinBossArea, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_castleDefenceArea, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_AlliesSargerasBattle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_AlliesSargerasBattle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Multiplier == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func004Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func004Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLives[udg_ip] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ModuloInteger(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip], 5) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func009Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_twinBossArea, udg_l[6]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func010Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_castleDefenceInvanders)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_castleDefenceDefenders) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_castleDefenceArea, udg_l[6]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerCreeps[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[6]=GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_l[6]=GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func004C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HolyEndGroup)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func005C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_AlliesSargerasBattle)
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001C() ) then
            set udg_ip=GetForLoopIndexA()
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004C() ) then
                if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_playerLives[udg_ip]=( udg_playerLives[udg_ip] - 1 )
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func003C() ) then
                        set udg_Multiplier=0
                        set udg_i=R2I(( I2R(( ( udg_pkc[( udg_ip + 6 )] * udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] ) / 110 )) * ( ( 1.10 - I2R(( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R001', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)) / GetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)) )) ) * ( 2.00 - I2R(( udg_playerLives[udg_ip] / udg_modeLives )) ) ) ))
                        if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold as reward|r " ) ))
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func004C() ) then
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_1847")
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_players, 30, ( udg_playerName[udg_ip] + " |cffff0000has been eliminated.|r" ))
                        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], I2S(udg_playerLives[udg_ip]))
                        set udg_ug=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip))
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func004Func005A)
                        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_players)
                        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_humanPlayers)
                        if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func001Func004Func008C() ) then
                            set udg_winningPlayer=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_players)
                            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_players, 30, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_winningPlayer)] + " is the last surviving player." ))
                            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_GameEnd)
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, ( "|cffff0000You have lost a life.|r (" + ( I2S(udg_playerLives[udg_ip]) + " remaining)" ) ))
                        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], I2S(udg_playerLives[udg_ip]))
                    endif
                else
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_1846")
                endif
                set udg_playerBattleChecker[udg_ip]=- 1
                if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func003C() ) then
                    set udg_i=R2I(( ( ( ( 100.00 - GetUnitLifePercent(udg_boss[udg_ip]) ) / 100.00 ) * I2R(udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(udg_boss[udg_ip])]) ) * 0.75 ))
                    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r compensation." ) ))
                else
                endif
                set udg_playerLevelAttempts[udg_ip]=( udg_playerLevelAttempts[udg_ip] + 1 )
                set udg_i=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r from your gold mine." ) ))
                call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundSuccess)
                if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func009C() ) then
                    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_TwinBossesSuccess)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_9072")
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops, function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func009Func003A)
                    set udg_Extinction=false
                    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_TwinBossesSuccess)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[6])
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func010C() ) then
                    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CastleDefenceSuccess)
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_castleDefenceInvanders, function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func010Func002A)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_9088")
                    set udg_Extinction=false
                    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_CastleDefenceSuccess)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[6])
                else
                endif
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_playerCreeps[udg_ip], function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Func006Func001Func004Func011A)
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundSuccess)
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameRoundFailure takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameRoundFailure=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure, Condition(function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure, function Trig_GameRoundFailure_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameRoundSuccess
//
// Set NeedFinalBoss
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_twinBossArea, GetDyingUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_castleDefenceArea, GetDyingUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func006Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'u016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'u017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'u01B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_koboldCash=( udg_koboldCash + 2 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func001Func002C() ) then
        set udg_koboldCash=( udg_koboldCash + 10 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func001Func003C() ) then
        set udg_koboldCash=( udg_koboldCash + 20 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_koboldCash >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] == 18 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] == 13 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] == 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012Func001Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetTriggerPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012Func001Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012Func001Func013C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] == 36 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func020A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allMercenaryUnits[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_playerCreeps[udg_ip]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_playerCreeps[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_playerCreeps[udg_ip])
        if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_playerBattleChecker[udg_ip]=- 1
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_5190")
            set udg_i=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r from your gold mine." ) ))
            if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func006C() ) then
                set udg_Multiplier=1
                set udg_i=R2I(( I2R(( ( udg_pkc[( udg_ip + 6 )] * udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] ) / 110 )) * ( ( 1.05 - I2R(( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R001', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)) / GetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)) )) ) * ( 2.00 - I2R(( ( ( udg_modeLives + 1 ) - udg_playerLives[udg_ip] ) / udg_modeLives )) ) ) ))
                if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func006Func003C() ) then
                    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold as reward|r " ) ))
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            set udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] + 1 )
            if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip], function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func001A)
                if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func002C() ) then
                    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_koboldCash, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_koboldCash) + " gold|r from your workers " ) ))
                    set udg_koboldCash=0
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func003C() ) then
                    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 5, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 5, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 5, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 5, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 5, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 5, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                else
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func003Func001C() ) then
                        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 10, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 10, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 10, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 10, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 10, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 10, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                    else
                        if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func008Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            else
            endif
            // changes for Yogg Saron
            if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func010C() ) then
                if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func010Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_modeExtinctionFrequency=100
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), udg_hintText[17])
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_creepRegion[udg_ip]), 60.00, - 320.00), 1660.00, 270.00)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            // changes for final boss level
            if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012C() ) then
                if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012Func001C() ) then
                    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_OMFG)
                    set udg_modeDuelFrequency=100
                    set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=100
                    set udg_modeExtinctionFrequency=100
                    set udg_PlayerIsAtFinalBoss[udg_ip]=true
                    set udg_NeedFinalBoss=true
                    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012Func001Func008A)
                    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_ip]=udg_BossRegion[udg_ip]
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_AntiBossTeam)
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(( udg_ip + 6 )), udg_AntiBossTeam)
                    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
                else
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func012Func001Func002C() ) then
                        set udg_duelTicker=1
                        set udg_modeDuelFrequency=1
                        set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=100
                        set udg_classicDuels=true
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            else
            endif
            // ==========
            set udg_playerPoints[udg_ip]=( udg_playerPoints[udg_ip] + udg_modePointsForLevels )
            set udg_playerLevelAttempts[udg_ip]=1
            if ( Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func016C() ) then
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerPoints[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_modeVictoryPoints) ))
            else
            endif
            call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], I2S(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]))
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip], function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func019A)
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_allMercenaryUnits[udg_ip], function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005Func001Func004Func020A)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Func005A)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameRoundSuccess takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameRoundSuccess=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GameRoundSuccess, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GameRoundSuccess, Condition(function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameRoundSuccess, function Trig_GameRoundSuccess_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameBattleCheckAdd
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameBattleCheckAdd_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) == GetEnumPlayer() ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckAdd_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameBattleCheckAdd_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckAdd_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameBattleCheckAdd_Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=10
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckAdd_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameBattleCheckAdd_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameBattleCheckAdd takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameBattleCheckAdd=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GameBattleCheckAdd, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameBattleCheckAdd, function Trig_GameBattleCheckAdd_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func005Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerInDuel[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func005Func003Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func005Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_playerArmy[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])]), GetEnumUnit(), 1000000000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(gg_unit_hpea_0328, GetEnumUnit(), 1000000000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func005Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_pid=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, udg_camHeight[udg_pid], 0.80)
    if ( Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func005Func003C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_playerArmy[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func005Func003Func001A)
    else
    endif
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=( udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] - 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func001C() ) then
        call MultiboardSetTitleText(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), ( ( "Classic - [|cffffffffRound " + I2S(udg_round) ) + ( "|r]" + ( " Next Round: [|cffffffff" + ( I2S(R2I(TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer))) + "|r]" ) ) ) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func002C() ) then
        call MultiboardSetTitleText(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), ( ( "Survival - [|cffffffffRound " + I2S(udg_round) ) + ( "|r]" + ( " Next Round: [|cffffffff" + ( I2S(R2I(TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer))) + "|r]" ) ) ) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func003C() ) then
        call MultiboardSetTitleText(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), ( ( "Tournament - [|cffffffffRound " + I2S(udg_round) ) + ( ( "/" + I2S(udg_rrRoundId) ) + ( "|r]" + ( " Next Round: [|cffffffff" + ( I2S(R2I(TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer))) + "|r]" ) ) ) ) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func004C() ) then
        call MultiboardSetTitleText(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), ( ( "Overlords Ascention - [|cffffffffRound " + I2S(udg_round) ) + ( "|r]" + ( " Next Round: [|cffffffff" + ( I2S(R2I(TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer))) + "|r]" ) ) ) ))
    else
    endif
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Func005A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam, function Trig_GameBattleCheckLoopAndCam_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SargerasFightLoop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SargerasFightLoop_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_visionBossBattle))
endfunction

function Trig_SargerasFightLoop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle), function Trig_SargerasFightLoop_Func001A)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SargerasFightLoop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SargerasFightLoop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SargerasFightLoop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_SargerasFightLoop, 5.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SargerasFightLoop, function Trig_SargerasFightLoop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GoldPresent
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GoldPresent_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSSpeed == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GoldPresent_Func003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetEnumPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_GoldPresent_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (GetPlayerController(GetEnumPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GoldPresent_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_GoldPresent_Func003002)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5199")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GoldPresent takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GoldPresent=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_GoldPresent, 1800.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GoldPresent, Condition(function Trig_GoldPresent_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GoldPresent, function Trig_GoldPresent_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GoldPresentDrug
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GoldPresentDrug_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GoldPresentDrug_Func002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetEnumPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_GoldPresentDrug_Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (GetPlayerController(GetEnumPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GoldPresentDrug_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_GoldPresentDrug_Func002002)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5283")
endfunction

    set gg_trg_GoldPresentDrug=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_GoldPresentDrug, 2700.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GoldPresentDrug, Condition(function Trig_GoldPresentDrug_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GoldPresentDrug, function Trig_GoldPresentDrug_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PlayerWithoutArmy
//
// 
// Листья с клена падают, с ясеня...
// Нихуя себе, нихуя себе!
// Я смотрю на них, и действительно
// Охуительно, охуительно!
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func004Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func004Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2] == ( udg_modeVictoryPoints - 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2] == ( udg_modeVictoryPoints - 1 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip2])
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), true)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_duelPartner[udg_ip] == ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_playerArmy[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_duelPartner[udg_ip])]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    if ( Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002C() ) then
        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team1, udg_team1, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team2, udg_team2, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
        call ForceClear(udg_team1)
        call ForceClear(udg_team2)
        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
        set udg_i=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r from your gold mine." ) ))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_6957")
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001C() ) then
                set udg_ip2=GetForLoopIndexB()
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip2)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_6958")
                if ( Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func004C() ) then
                    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], ( ( I2S(udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_modeVictoryPoints) ))
                else
                    if ( Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
                        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], I2S(udg_playerLives[udg_ip2]))
                    else
                        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], I2S(udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2]))
                    endif
                endif
                set udg_i=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip2]
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip2)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r from your gold mine." ) ))
                if ( Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func008C() ) then
                    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], 100, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
                    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( "|cffff0000Warning|r - " + ( udg_playerName[udg_ip2] + " only needs |cffff0000two|r more points to win!" ) ))
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func009C() ) then
                    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( "|cffff0000Warning|r - " + ( udg_playerName[udg_ip2] + " only needs |cffff0000one|r more point to win!" ) ))
                else
                endif
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip2], function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001Func002Func010Func001Func010A)
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PlayerWithoutArmy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PlayerWithoutArmy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PlayerWithoutArmy, function Trig_PlayerWithoutArmy_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameRoundDuel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func023Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func023Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func023Func004Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func023A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_tempPlayers)
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=12
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, GetPlayerName(GetEnumPlayer()))
    if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func023Func004C() ) then
        set udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=GetRandomInt(1, 10)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001Func002Func001Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001Func002Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func019Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] >= udg_tempScore ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func019Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempScore=udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]
        set udg_tempPlayer=GetEnumPlayer()
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] >= udg_tempScore ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021Func010Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempScore=udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]
        set udg_tempPlayer2=GetEnumPlayer()
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) != 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_tempPlayers) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_oddPlayerOut != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_tempPlayers) != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_duelTicker=0
    // ---
    // Setting duel areas and offset which is used in "DuelSpawnEast/DuelSpawnWest"
    set udg_i=1
    set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_duel1
    set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_d1west
    set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_d1east
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_duel2
    set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_d2east
    set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_d2west
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_duel3
    set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_d3east
    set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_d3west
    // ---
    set udg_duelOffsetX=1500.00
    set udg_duelOffsetY=1000.00
    // ---
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "- - - |cffffcc00Round " + ( I2S(udg_round) + "|r - - -" ) ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_4182")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameDuelEnds)
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func023A)
    set udg_i=0
    set udg_Duel=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Duel > 3
        call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, ( "loop " + ( ( I2S(GetForLoopIndexA()) + ", i = " ) + I2S(udg_i) ) ))
        if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
            else
                if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_i=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
                else
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_i=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                            set udg_i=1
                        else
                            if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func001Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                                set udg_i=GetRandomInt(2, 3)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            // ---
            if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_tempPlayer=udg_oddPlayerOut
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPlayers)
                set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
                set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest)
                set udg_tempPlayer2=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_tempPlayers)
                set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_tempPlayer2
                set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_tempPlayer
                set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_i
                set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_i
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer2, udg_tempPlayers)
                set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
                set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast)
                set udg_oddPlayerOut=Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
            else
                set udg_tempScore=0
                call ForForce(udg_tempPlayers, function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func019A)
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPlayers)
                if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021C() ) then
                    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021Func002C() ) then
                        set udg_i2=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
                        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i2, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i2) + " bonus gold|r" ) ))
                    else
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] + " has no opponent this round." ))
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021Func021C() ) then
                        set udg_oddPlayerOut=udg_tempPlayer
                    else
                    endif
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(udg_tempPlayer), 20.00, ( "[Level " + ( I2S(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]) + ( ( ", attempt " + I2S(udg_playerLevelAttempts[udg_ip]) ) + "]" ) ) ))
                    set udg_playerBattleChecker[udg_ip]=10
                    set udg_forecastLevel[udg_ip]=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] + 1 )
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_gSpawnVsCreeps)
                else
                    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
                    set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                    set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest)
                    set udg_oddPlayerOut=Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
                    // ---
                    set udg_tempScore=0
                    call ForForce(udg_tempPlayers, function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func021Func010A)
                    set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_tempPlayer2
                    set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_tempPlayer
                    set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_i
                    set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_i
                    // ---
                    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer2, udg_tempPlayers)
                    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
                    set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                    set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast)
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Duel=udg_Duel + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_PlayerWithoutArmy)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameRoundDuel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameRoundDuel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameRoundDuel, function Trig_GameRoundDuel_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: GameRoundMassDuel

function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func023Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func023A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_tempPlayers)
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=16
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, GetPlayerName(GetEnumPlayer()))
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_teamBattleArena)
    set udg_visiblityModifier[0]=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
    if ( Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func023Func006C() ) then
        set udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=GetRandomInt(1, 10)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func025Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] >= udg_tempScore ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func025Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempScore=udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]
        set udg_tempPlayer=GetEnumPlayer()
    else
    endif
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
