function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_oddPlayerOut != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_tempPlayers) != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MassDuel=true
    set udg_massDuelTicker=0
    // ---
    set udg_i=1
    set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_teamBattleArena
    set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_team1spawn1
    set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_team2spawn1
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_teamBattleArena
    set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_team1spawn2
    set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_team2spawn2
    set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
    set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_teamBattleArena
    set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_team1spawn3
    set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_team2spawn3
    // ---
    set udg_duelOffsetX=5000.00
    set udg_duelOffsetY=1000.00
    // ---
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "- - - |cffffcc00Round " + ( I2S(udg_round) + "|r - - -" ) ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_4183")
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameDuelEnds)
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func023A)
    set udg_i=0
    set udg_Duel=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Duel > 3
        call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, ( "loop " + ( ( I2S(GetForLoopIndexA()) + ", i = " ) + I2S(udg_i) ) ))
        if ( Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002C() ) then
            set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
            // ---
            if ( Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_tempPlayer=udg_oddPlayerOut
                call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer, udg_team1)
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPlayers)
                set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
                set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_team2)
                call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_team2)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest)
                set udg_tempPlayer2=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_tempPlayers)
                set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_tempPlayer2
                set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_tempPlayer
                set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_i
                set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_i
                call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer2, udg_team2)
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer2, udg_tempPlayers)
                set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
                set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_team1)
                call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_team1)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast)
                set udg_oddPlayerOut=Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
            else
                set udg_tempScore=0
                call ForForce(udg_tempPlayers, function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func025A)
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPlayers)
                if ( Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func027C() ) then
                    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func027Func002C() ) then
                        set udg_i2=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
                        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i2, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i2) + " bonus gold|r" ) ))
                    else
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] + " has no opponent this round." ))
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func027Func025C() ) then
                        set udg_oddPlayerOut=udg_tempPlayer
                    else
                    endif
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(udg_tempPlayer), 20.00, ( "[Level " + ( I2S(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]) + ( ( ", attempt " + I2S(udg_playerLevelAttempts[udg_ip]) ) + "]" ) ) ))
                    set udg_playerBattleChecker[udg_ip]=10
                    set udg_forecastLevel[udg_ip]=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] + 1 )
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_gSpawnVsCreeps)
                else
                    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
                    set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                    set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_team2)
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_team2)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest)
                    set udg_oddPlayerOut=Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
                    // ---
                    set udg_tempScore=0
                    call ForForce(udg_tempPlayers, function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Func025Func002Func003Func027Func012A)
                    set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_tempPlayer2
                    set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_tempPlayer
                    set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_i
                    set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_i
                    // ---
                    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer2, udg_tempPlayers)
                    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
                    set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                    set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_team1)
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_team1)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast)
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Duel=udg_Duel + 1
    endloop
    set udg_i=0
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team1, udg_team1, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team2, udg_team2, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    set udg_ipU[2]=0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameRoundMassDuel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameRoundMassDuel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameRoundMassDuel, function Trig_GameRoundMassDuel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DuelSpawnEast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_Extinction == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

        return false
    endif

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func032Func001Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func032C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'u00E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MassDuel == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Extinction == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033Func001Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033Func001Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'u00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_x=( GetLocationX(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationX(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_y=( GetLocationY(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationY(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelEast[udg_i])
    set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[2], ( udg_y * - 1.00 ), udg_x)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 180.00)
    set udg_u=GetEnumUnit()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func012C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam1)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func013C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
    else
    endif
    set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelWest[udg_i])
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func015C() ) then
        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
    else
    endif
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func018C() ) then
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1500.00, - 1000.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func019C() ) then
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1500.00, 1000.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func020C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02T', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_SmallSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(1, 9)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func010C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func011C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001C() ) then
            call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_MediumSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(1, 9)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func001C() ) then
                call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_BigSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(1, 3)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func010C() ) then
                    set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func011C() ) then
                    set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_BigSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(4, 6)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                    set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func010C() ) then
                        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func011C() ) then
                        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_BigSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(7, 12)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func001Func009C() ) then
                            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func001Func010C() ) then
                            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func022C() ) then
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 70.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func023C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0DU', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0F7', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_u))
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func023Func004C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00G', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00G', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00P', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func023Func005C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00F', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00F', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00Q', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func023Func006C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06S', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06S', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00S', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func023Func007C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A084', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A084', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00T', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func023Func008C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IA', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IA', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00V', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func023Func009C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08P', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08P', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00U', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        call SetUnitOwner(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), true)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func024C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0DU', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0F7', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_u))
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func024Func004C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A003', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00B', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func024Func005C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IF', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00C', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else

        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func024Func006C() ) then

            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08C', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00D', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func024Func007C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06Q', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06Q', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00E', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func024Func008C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08G', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00F', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func024Func009C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A008', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A008', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00G', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func024Func010C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A005', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
        endif
        call SetUnitOwner(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), true)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func025C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0DU', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0F7', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_u))

            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08L', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00M', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func025Func007C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06Y', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06Y', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00L', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else

            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0ID', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00N', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func025Func009C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08I', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08I', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00O', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        call SetUnitOwner(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), true)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func026C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)

            else

            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func026Func001Func011C() ) then

                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func027C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd

            else

            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func027Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif

                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func028C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd

            else

            else

            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func028Func001Func010C() ) then

                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func028Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func029C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)

            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func029Func001Func005C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam1)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func029Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelWest[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func029Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func029Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func030C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func030Func001Func005C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam1)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func030Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelWest[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func030Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func030Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func031C() ) then
        set udg_Matilda[udg_ip]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func031Func002C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func031Func003C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func031Func004C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func032C() ) then
        set udg_C=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_C > 7
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func032Func001Func005C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam1)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func032Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelWest[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func032Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1500.00, - 1000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func032Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1500.00, 1000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set udg_C=udg_C + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033C() ) then
        set udg_C=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_C > 9
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "war3mapImported\\PoisonCloudKingSize.mdx")
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam1)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033Func001Func007C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelWest[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002Func033Func001Func012C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set udg_C=udg_C + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_teamBattleArena)
            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[2], 0.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelMain[udg_i])
            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[2], 0.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        else
        endif
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DuelSpawnEast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast, function Trig_DuelSpawnEast_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: DuelSpawnWest

function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_Extinction == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

        return false

function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func030Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Extinction == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func030Func001Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func030C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'n00I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func031Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'u00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_x=( GetLocationX(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationX(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_y=( GetLocationY(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationY(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelWest[udg_i])
    set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[2], udg_y, ( udg_x * - 1.00 ))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 0.00)
    set udg_u=GetEnumUnit()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func012C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func013C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
    else
    endif
    set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelEast[udg_i])
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func015C() ) then
        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
    else
    endif
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func018C() ) then
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], udg_duelOffsetX, udg_duelOffsetY)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func019C() ) then
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], udg_duelOffsetX, ( 0.00 - udg_duelOffsetY ))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func020C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02T', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_SmallSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(1, 9)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func010C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func011C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001C() ) then
            call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_MediumSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(1, 9)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func001C() ) then
                call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_BigSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(1, 3)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func010C() ) then
                    set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func011C() ) then
                    set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_BigSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(4, 6)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                    set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func010C() ) then
                        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func011C() ) then
                        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_BigSurpriceBox[GetRandomInt(7, 12)], udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func001Func009C() ) then
                            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func021Func001Func001Func001Func001Func010C() ) then
                            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func022C() ) then
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 70.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func023C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0DU', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0F7', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_u))
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func023Func004C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00G', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00G', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00P', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func023Func005C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00F', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00F', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00Q', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func023Func006C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06S', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06S', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00S', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func023Func007C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A084', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A084', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00T', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func023Func008C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IA', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IA', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00V', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func023Func009C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08P', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08P', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00U', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        call SetUnitOwner(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), true)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func024C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0DU', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0F7', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_u))
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func024Func004C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A003', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00B', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func024Func005C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IF', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00C', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func024Func006C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08C', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00D', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func024Func007C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06Q', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06Q', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00E', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func024Func008C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08G', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00F', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func024Func009C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A008', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A008', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00G', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func024Func010C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A005', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
        endif
        call SetUnitOwner(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), true)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func025C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0DU', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0F7', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_u))
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func025Func004C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GF', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00I', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func025Func005C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00A', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00J', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func025Func006C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08L', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08L', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00M', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func025Func007C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06Y', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06Y', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00L', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func025Func008C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0ID', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0ID', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00N', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func025Func009C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08I', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08I', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00O', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)))
        else
        endif
        call SetUnitOwner(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), true)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func026C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func026Func001Func005C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func026Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelEast[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func026Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func026Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func027C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func027Func001Func005C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func027Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelEast[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func027Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func027Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func028C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=5
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func028Func001Func005C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func028Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelEast[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func028Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func028Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func029C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func029Func001Func005C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func029Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelEast[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func029Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func029Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func030C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func030Func001Func005C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func030Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelEast[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func030Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func030Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func031C() ) then
        set udg_Matilda[udg_ip]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func031Func002C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func031Func003C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func031Func004C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func032C() ) then
        set udg_C=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_C > 7
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func032Func001Func005C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func032Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelEast[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func032Func001Func010C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], udg_duelOffsetX, udg_duelOffsetY)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func032Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], udg_duelOffsetX, ( 0.00 - udg_duelOffsetY ))
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set udg_C=udg_C + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func033C() ) then
        set udg_C=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_C > 9
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "war3mapImported\\PoisonCloudKingSize.mdx")
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func033Func001Func006C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func033Func001Func007C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
            else
            endif
            set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelEast[udg_i])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func033Func001Func011C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002Func033Func001Func012C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set udg_C=udg_C + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
endfunction

function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_teamBattleArena)
            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[2], 0.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(udg_duelMain[udg_i])
            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[2], 0.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        else
        endif
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DuelSpawnWest takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest, function Trig_DuelSpawnWest_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CameraFinalBattle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CameraFinalBattle_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CameraFinalBattle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_CameraFinalBattle_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[2], 0.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CameraFinalBattle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CameraFinalBattle=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CameraFinalBattle, function Trig_CameraFinalBattle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CameraAnnihilation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CameraAnnihilation_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CameraAnnihilation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_CameraAnnihilation_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_teamBattleArena)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[2], 0.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
