    set gg_trg_CameraAnnihilation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CameraAnnihilation, function Trig_CameraAnnihilation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameDuelEnds
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_visionDuels, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_teamBattleArena, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'ohwd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'u008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'u009' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_duelTicker == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func002Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), true)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_duelMain[GetForLoopIndexB()], udg_l[0]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func005Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_MSMain == 4 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func005Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2] == ( udg_modeVictoryPoints - 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2] == ( udg_modeVictoryPoints - 1 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip2])
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_duelPartner[udg_ip] == ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexB()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001C() ) then
            set udg_ip=GetForLoopIndexA()
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            if ( Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004C() ) then
                set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
                set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=3
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
                    if ( Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func002Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_duelMain[GetForLoopIndexB()]), function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func002Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                    set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
                endloop
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
                call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team1, udg_team1, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team2, udg_team2, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
                call ForceClear(udg_team1)
                call ForceClear(udg_team2)
                call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
                set udg_i=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r from your gold mine." ) ))
                set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=6
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
                    if ( Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001C() ) then
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, ( ( udg_playerName[GetForLoopIndexB()] + " won" ) + ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] + "!" ) ))
                        set udg_ip2=GetForLoopIndexB()
                        set udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2]=( udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2] + udg_modePointsForDuel )
                        if ( Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func005C() ) then
                            call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], ( ( I2S(udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_modeVictoryPoints) ))
                        else
                            if ( Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func005Func001C() ) then
                                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], I2S(udg_playerLives[udg_ip2]))
                            else
                                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], I2S(udg_playerPoints[udg_ip2]))
                            endif
                        endif
                        set udg_i=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip2]
                        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip2)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r from your gold mine." ) ))
                        if ( Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func009C() ) then
                            call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], 100, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
                            call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( "|cffff0000Warning|r - " + ( udg_playerName[udg_ip2] + " only needs |cffff0000two|r more points to win!" ) ))
                        else
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func010C() ) then
                            call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip2], 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                            call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( "|cffff0000Warning|r - " + ( udg_playerName[udg_ip2] + " only needs |cffff0000one|r more point to win!" ) ))
                        else
                        endif
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_playerArmy[udg_ip2], function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Func006Func001Func004Func012Func001Func011A)
                    else
                    endif
                    set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
                endloop
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameDuelEnds takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameDuelEnds=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GameDuelEnds, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GameDuelEnds, Condition(function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameDuelEnds, function Trig_GameDuelEnds_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MassDuelVictoryConditions
//
// Set NeedFinalBoss
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam1) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetDyingUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_teamBattleArena, GetDyingUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func004Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_massDuelTeam2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_massDuelTeam1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func004Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'nstw' )
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), true)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) <= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func003Func001C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, ( "|CFFFF0000" + GetPlayerName(GetEnumPlayer()) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) <= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func005Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
        set udg_extinctionGold=( udg_extinctionGold + ( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip] ) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) <= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func007Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_extinctionGold, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_extinctionGold) + " from enemy treasures." ) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), true)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam1)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) <= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func010Func001C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, ( "|CFF18E7EC" + GetPlayerName(GetEnumPlayer()) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) <= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func012Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
        set udg_extinctionGold=( udg_extinctionGold + ( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip] ) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func014Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) <= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func014Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_extinctionGold, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_extinctionGold) + " from enemy treasures." ) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_winningTeamNumber == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_winningTeamNumber != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetDyingUnit(), udg_allUnits)
        if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func002C() ) then
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetDyingUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam1)
        else
            if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func002Func002C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetDyingUnit(), udg_massDuelTeam2)
            else
            endif
        endif
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 30, GetUnitName(GetDyingUnit()))
        if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func004C() ) then
            // ---team1 lost
            set udg_winningTeamNumber=2
        else
            if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func004Func001C() ) then
                // ---team2 lost
                set udg_winningTeamNumber=1
            else
            endif
        endif
        if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005C() ) then
            set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_teamBattleArena, Condition(function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func002A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
            // ---add points---
            if ( Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_massDuelTeam1, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func008A)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_9093")
                call ForForce(udg_team1, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func010A)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_9094")
                call ForForce(udg_team2, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func012A)
                set udg_extinctionGold=( udg_extinctionGold / ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_team1) * 30 ) )
                call ForForce(udg_team1, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func014A)
            else
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_massDuelTeam2, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func001A)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_9095")
                call ForForce(udg_team2, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func003A)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_9889")
                call ForForce(udg_team1, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func005A)
                set udg_extinctionGold=( udg_extinctionGold / ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_team2) * 30 ) )
                call ForForce(udg_team2, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Func005Func005Func006Func007A)
            endif
            call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team1, udg_team1, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
            call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team2, udg_team2, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
            call ForceClear(udg_team1)
            call ForceClear(udg_team2)
            call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
            set udg_V[1]=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_V[1] > 6
                call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_V[1])), GetForceOfPlayer(udg_dummyplayer[udg_V[1]]), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
                call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(udg_dummyplayer[udg_V[1]]), GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_V[1])), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
                set udg_V[1]=udg_V[1] + 1
            endloop
            set udg_winningTeamNumber=0
            set udg_MassDuel=false
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MassDuelVictoryConditions takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MassDuelVictoryConditions=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MassDuelVictoryConditions, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MassDuelVictoryConditions, Condition(function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MassDuelVictoryConditions, function Trig_MassDuelVictoryConditions_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: kill
//===========================================================================
function Trig_kill_Func001002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_kill_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_kill_Func005002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_kill_Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_kill_Func009002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_kill_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionDuels), function Trig_kill_Func001002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_visionBossBattle), function Trig_kill_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_castleDefenceArea), function Trig_kill_Func005002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_twinBossVision), function Trig_kill_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_teamBattleArena), function Trig_kill_Func009002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_kill takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_kill=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_kill, function Trig_kill_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ScheduleRoundRobin
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_roundRobintemp)
endfunction

function Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func001A)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_roundRobintemp)
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_roundRobinPlayerId=( udg_roundRobinPlayerId + 1 )
        set udg_tempPlayer=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_roundRobintemp)
        set udg_roundRobinPlayer[udg_roundRobinPlayerId]=udg_tempPlayer
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer, udg_roundRobintemp)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_rrDuelLooper=3
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_MSSpeed
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="123456"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="132546"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="142635"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="152436"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="162345"
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_rrDuelLooper=2
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_MSSpeed
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="1234"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="1325"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="1435"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="1524"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="2345"
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_rrDuelLooper=2
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_MSSpeed
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="1234"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="1324"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="1423"
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_rrDuelLooper=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_MSSpeed
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="12"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="23"
            set udg_rrRoundId=( udg_rrRoundId + 1 )
            set udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_rrRoundId]="13"
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ScheduleRoundRobin takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ScheduleRoundRobin=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ScheduleRoundRobin, function Trig_ScheduleRoundRobin_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameRoundTournament
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=10
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, GetPlayerName(GetEnumPlayer()))
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func007Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() == udg_roundRobinPlayer[udg_ip] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_stillTrue == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func007Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func007Func006Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempPlayer=GetEnumPlayer()
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
        set udg_stillTrue=true
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func007Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() == udg_roundRobinPlayer[udg_ip2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_stillTrue == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func007Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func007Func008Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempPlayer2=GetEnumPlayer()
        set udg_ip2=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
        set udg_stillTrue=true
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_duelTicker=0
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "- - - |cffffcc00Round " + ( I2S(udg_round) + "|r - - -" ) ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_1904")
    call MultiboardSetTitleText(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), ( ( "Tournament - [|cffffffffRound " + I2S(udg_round) ) + ( ( "/" + I2S(udg_rrRoundId) ) + ( "|r]" + ( "Next Round: [|cffffffff" + ( R2S(TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer)) + "|r]" ) ) ) ) ))
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func005A)
    set udg_i=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_rrDuelLooper
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, ( "loop " + ( ( I2S(GetForLoopIndexA()) + ", i = " ) + I2S(udg_i) ) ))
        set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
        set udg_ip=S2I(SubStringBJ(udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_round], ( ( udg_i * 2 ) - 1 ), ( ( udg_i * 2 ) - 1 )))
        set udg_ip2=S2I(SubStringBJ(udg_roundRobinRounds[udg_round], ( ( udg_i * 2 ) - 0 ), ( ( udg_i * 2 ) - 0 )))
        set udg_stillTrue=false
        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func007Func006A)
        set udg_stillTrue=false
        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Func007Func008A)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( ( udg_playerName[udg_ip] + " vs " ) + udg_playerName[udg_ip2] ))
        set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_tempPlayer2
        set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_tempPlayer
        set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_i
        set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_i
        set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
        set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest)
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
        set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
        set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameRoundTournament takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameRoundTournament=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameRoundTournament, function Trig_GameRoundTournament_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GameRoundExtinction
//
// Закрыть псле саргераса
// Extinction off after end
// Insert new cash sustem in cd and tb
// all CD enemy*
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func001Func001Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_twinBossVision)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_castleDefenceArea)
    set udg_visiblityModifier[0]=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func001Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_castleDefenceArea)
    set udg_visiblityModifier[0]=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) < 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_twinBossVision)
    set udg_visiblityModifier[0]=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) < 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func010Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_tempPlayers)
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=20
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, GetPlayerName(GetEnumPlayer()))
    if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func010Func004C() ) then
        set udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=GetRandomInt(1, 10)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip], GetRectCenter(gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss1)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip], GetRectCenter(gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss1)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func019Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] >= udg_tempScore ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func019Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempScore=udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]
        set udg_tempPlayer=GetEnumPlayer()
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip], GetRectCenter(gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss1)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] >= udg_tempScore ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func010Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempScore=udg_playerPoints[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]
        set udg_tempPlayer2=GetEnumPlayer()
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip], GetRectCenter(gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss1)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) != 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_tempPlayers) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_oddPlayerOut != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_tempPlayers) != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Extinction=true
    set udg_extinctionTicker=0
    // ---
    if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_i=1
        set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_twinBossArea
        set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss1
        set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss2
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "- - - |cffffcc00Round " + ( I2S(udg_round) + "|r - - -" ) ))
        call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func007A)
    else
        if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func001C() ) then
            set udg_i=1
            set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_castleDefenceArea
            set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_extictionCastleVanguardRight
            set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_extictionCastleVanguardLeft
            set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
            set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_castleDefenceArea
            set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_extictionCastleRearguardRight
            set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_extictionCastleRearguardLeft
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "- - - |cffffcc00Round " + ( I2S(udg_round) + "|r - - -" ) ))
            call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func001Func011A)
        else
            if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_i=1
                set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_twinBossArea
                set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss1
                set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss2
                set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
                set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_castleGates
                set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_extictionCastleVanguardRight
                set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_extictionCastleVanguardLeft
                set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
                set udg_duelMain[udg_i]=gg_rct_castleGates
                set udg_duelEast[udg_i]=gg_rct_extictionCastleRearguardRight
                set udg_duelWest[udg_i]=gg_rct_extictionCastleRearguardLeft
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "- - - |cffffcc00Round " + ( I2S(udg_round) + "|r - - -" ) ))
                call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func004Func001Func001Func014A)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
    // ---
    set udg_duelOffsetX=5000.00
    set udg_duelOffsetY=1000.00
    // ---
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameDuelEnds)
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func010A)
    set udg_i=0
    set udg_ExtinctionLoop=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_ExtinctionLoop > 3
        call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, ( "loop " + ( ( I2S(GetForLoopIndexA()) + ", i = " ) + I2S(udg_i) ) ))
        if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002C() ) then
            set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
            // ---
            if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_tempPlayer=udg_oddPlayerOut
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPlayers)
                set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
                set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func006C() ) then
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_TwinBossesSpawn)
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_TwinBossGroup)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_9087")
                else
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_CastleDefenceCS)
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_CastleDefenceGroup)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_9080")
                endif
                set udg_tempPlayer2=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_tempPlayers)
                set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_tempPlayer2
                set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_tempPlayer
                set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_i
                set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_i
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer2, udg_tempPlayers)
                set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
                set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func016C() ) then
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_TwinBossesSpawn)
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_TwinBossGroup)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_9086")
                else
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_CastleDefenceCS)
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_CastleDefenceGroup)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_9081")
                endif
                set udg_oddPlayerOut=Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
            else
                set udg_tempScore=0
                call ForForce(udg_tempPlayers, function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func019A)
                call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer, udg_tempPlayers)
                if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021C() ) then
                    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func002C() ) then
                        set udg_i2=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
                        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i2, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i2) + " bonus gold|r" ) ))
                    else
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)] + " has no ally for this round." ))
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func021C() ) then
                        set udg_oddPlayerOut=udg_tempPlayer
                    else
                    endif
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(udg_tempPlayer), 20.00, ( "[Level " + ( I2S(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]) + ( ( ", attempt " + I2S(udg_playerLevelAttempts[udg_ip]) ) + "]" ) ) ))
                    set udg_playerBattleChecker[udg_ip]=10
                    set udg_forecastLevel[udg_ip]=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] + 1 )
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_gSpawnVsCreeps)
                else
                    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
                    set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                    set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func006C() ) then
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop)
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_TwinBossesSpawn)
                        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_TwinBossGroup)
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_9078")
                    else
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnWest)
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_CastleDefenceCS)
                        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_CastleDefenceGroup)
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_9082")
                    endif
                    set udg_oddPlayerOut=Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
                    // ---
                    set udg_tempScore=0
                    call ForForce(udg_tempPlayers, function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func010A)
                    set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_tempPlayer2
                    set udg_duelPartner[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_tempPlayer
                    set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)]=udg_i
                    set udg_playerDuelArena[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)]=udg_i
                    // ---
                    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_tempPlayer2, udg_tempPlayers)
                    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
                    set udg_playerInDuel[udg_ip]=true
                    set udg_duellingRegion[udg_ip]=udg_duelMain[udg_i]
                    if ( Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Func012Func002Func003Func021Func020C() ) then
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow)
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_TwinBossesSpawn)
                        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_TwinBossGroup)
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_9085")
                    else
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DuelSpawnEast)
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_CastleDefenceCS)
                        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_CastleDefenceGroup)
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_9083")
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_ExtinctionLoop=udg_ExtinctionLoop + 1
    endloop
    // setting teams
    set udg_i=0
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_TwinBossGroup, udg_TwinBossGroup, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_CastleDefenceGroup, udg_CastleDefenceGroup, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GameRoundExtinction takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GameRoundExtinction=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GameRoundExtinction, function Trig_GameRoundExtinction_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop
//
// Spawn Sargeras
// Random skills for bosses
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func014Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerIsAtFinalBoss[udg_ip] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func015Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerIsAtFinalBoss[udg_ip] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'h00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'o01K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'n016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return false

    return true

    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'o01P' ) ) then

    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'u00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_x=( GetLocationX(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationX(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_y=( GetLocationY(udg_l[0]) - GetLocationY(udg_l[1]) )
    set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss1)
    set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[2], udg_x, udg_y)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
    set udg_u=GetEnumUnit()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
    call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func014C() ) then
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func014Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn), - 1000.00, 3000.00)
        else
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
        endif
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func015C() ) then
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func015Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn), 1000.00, 3000.00)
        else
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
        endif
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func016C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02T', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func017C() ) then
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 70.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func018C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "flamingarrows")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func019C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func019Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func019Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func020C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func020Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func020Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func021C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func021Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func021Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func022C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func022Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func022Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func023C() ) then
        set udg_Matilda[udg_ip]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func023Func002C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func023Func003C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func023Func004C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func024C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=7
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func024Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func024Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func025C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=9
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "war3mapImported\\PoisonCloudKingSize.mdx")
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func025Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002Func025Func001Func009C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_twinBossVision)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[2], 0.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    else
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop, function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnTop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow
//
// Spawn Sargeras
// Random skills for bosses
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func014Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerIsAtFinalBoss[udg_ip] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func015Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerIsAtFinalBoss[udg_ip] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'h00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'o01K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'n016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true

    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == false ) ) then
