    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u) == 'u00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_x=( GetLocationX(udg_l[1]) - GetLocationX(udg_l[0]) )
    set udg_y=( GetLocationY(udg_l[1]) - GetLocationY(udg_l[0]) )
    set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_exctinctionAntiBoss2)
    set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[2], udg_x, udg_y)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
    set udg_u=GetEnumUnit()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
    call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func014C() ) then
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func014Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn), - 1000.00, 3000.00)
        else
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
        endif
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func015C() ) then
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func015Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_bossSpawn), 1000.00, 3000.00)
        else
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
        endif
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func016C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02T', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func017C() ) then
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 70.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func018C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "flamingarrows")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func019C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func019Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func019Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func020C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func020Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func020Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func021C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func021Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func021Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func022C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=2
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func022Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func022Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func023C() ) then
        set udg_Matilda[udg_ip]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func023Func002C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 0, 3000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func023Func003C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func023Func004C() ) then
            set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nstw', udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            set udg_Matilda[( udg_ip + 6 )]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func024C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=7
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func024Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func024Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func025C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=9
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), udg_dummyplayer[udg_ip], udg_l[3], 90.00)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "war3mapImported\\PoisonCloudKingSize.mdx")
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5000.00)
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func025Func001Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002Func025Func001Func009C() ) then
                set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 1000.00, 2000.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_twinBossVision)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_l[2], 0.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    else
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow, function Trig_ExtinctionTwinBossSpawnLow_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TwinBossesSpawn
//
// Spawn Sargeras
// Random skills for bosses
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] < 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] < 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func006Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_eB == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] >= 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func006Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_eB == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] > 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] < 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] > 26 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] / 8 )
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_l[3]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_coboldsLine1)
        set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_coboldsLine2)
        set udg_l[5]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_twinBossVision)
        if ( Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func001Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(GetRandomInt(0, 1), 'nkol', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], 180.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(GetRandomInt(0, 1), 'nkol', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[4], 0.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[5])
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'uabo', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], 180.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'uabo', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[4], 0.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2000.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[5])
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] / 2 )
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_l[3]=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_zombieLine1)
        set udg_l[4]=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_zombieLine2)
        set udg_l[5]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_twinBossVision)
        if ( Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nzom', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], 180.00)
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[3], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\RaiseSkeletonWarrior\\RaiseSkeleton.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nzom', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[4], 0.00)
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[4], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\RaiseSkeletonWarrior\\RaiseSkeleton.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[5])
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'ndmu', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], 180.00)
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[3], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\RaiseSkeletonWarrior\\RaiseSkeleton.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'ndmu', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[4], 0.00)
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[4], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\RaiseSkeletonWarrior\\RaiseSkeleton.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[5])
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_l[3]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_twinBoss1)
    set udg_l[4]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_twinBoss2)
    set udg_l[5]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_twinBossVision)
    if ( Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func006C() ) then
        if ( Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func006Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nhhr', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], 180.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2800.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nubr', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], 0.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2800.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            set udg_eB=1
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nubk', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[4], 180.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2800.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nhhr', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[4], 0.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2800.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
            set udg_eB=0
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func006Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func006Func001Func002C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(GetRandomInt(1, 2), 'nhhr', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], 180.00)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
                call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2800.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(GetRandomInt(1, 2), 'nhhr', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], 180.00)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
                call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2800.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
                set udg_eB=1
            else
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nzof', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[4], 180.00)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
                call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2800.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
                set udg_eB=0
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(GetRandomInt(0, 2), 'nslf', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], 180.00)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2800.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(GetRandomInt(0, 2), 'nslf', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[4], 180.00)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2800.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_l[5])
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[5])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TwinBossesSpawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TwinBossesSpawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TwinBossesSpawn, function Trig_TwinBossesSpawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CastleDefenceCS
//
// Spawn Sargeras
// Random skills for bosses
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Creep) == 'ndrj' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func010Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'nkol' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func011Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'ndtw' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func012Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'nsgb' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func013Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'nsbm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true )
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'e007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func015Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'edes' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'ndqs' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func018Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_iS == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'n014' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func019Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'nkol' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'ndtw' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'nsgb' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'nsbm' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'e007' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'edes' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'ndqs' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 'n014' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func019Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_l[0]=GetRectCenter(udg_levelRegion[udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]])
    set udg_x=( GetLocationX(udg_l[1]) - GetLocationX(udg_l[0]) )
    set udg_y=( GetLocationY(udg_l[1]) - GetLocationY(udg_l[0]) )
    set udg_l[2]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_castleGates)
    set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[2], udg_x, udg_y)
    set udg_Creep=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func008C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=3
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 4500.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceInvanders)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[3], GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func010C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_TaskMaster[GetRandomInt(1, 5)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func011C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_DarkTrollSpell[GetRandomInt(1, 5)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AG', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func012C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_BehemothSpell[GetRandomInt(0, 3)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AI', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func013C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_BroodSpell[GetRandomInt(1, 3)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AJ', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func014C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_StronholdSpell[GetRandomInt(0, 3)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AD', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func015C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_AncientDragon[GetRandomInt(1, 3)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AK', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func016C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_QueenSpell2[GetRandomInt(0, 2)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func017C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_QueenSpell1[GetRandomInt(0, 2)], GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func018C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        set udg_iS=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        call SetUnitUserData(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_indexId)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_SargerasSpell[udg_iS], GetLastCreatedUnit())
        if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func018Func005C() ) then
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_AncientFearGolems)
        else
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_AncientFearGolems)
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001Func019C() ) then
        set udg_boss[udg_ip]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
    endif
    call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 4500.00)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_castleDefenceInvanders)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_levelArmy[udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]], function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CastleDefenceCS takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CastleDefenceCS=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CastleDefenceCS, function Trig_CastleDefenceCS_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TwinBossesSuccess
//
// Set NeedFinalBoss
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetDyingUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_twinBossArea, GetDyingUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func001Func008Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func001Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) - 6 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_9084")
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[udg_ip]=- 1
    set udg_i=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r from your gold mine." ) ))
    set udg_extinctionGold=( udg_extinctionGold + udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] )
    if ( Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func001Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Multiplier=1
        set udg_i=R2I(( I2R(( ( udg_pkc[( udg_ip + 6 )] * udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] ) / 110 )) * ( ( 1.05 - I2R(( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R001', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)) / GetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)) )) ) * ( 2.00 - I2R(( ( ( udg_modeLives + 1 ) - udg_playerLives[udg_ip] ) / udg_modeLives )) ) ) ))
        if ( Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func001Func008Func003C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold as reward|r " ) ))
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) - 6 )
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_extinctionGold, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_extinctionGold) + " gold|r from survived villagers." ) ))
    set udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] + 1 )
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], I2S(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]))
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] == 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func008Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func008Func001Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetTriggerPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] == 36 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func015A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetDyingUnit(), udg_allUnits)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetDyingUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 30, GetUnitName(GetDyingUnit()))
        if ( Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004C() ) then
            call ForForce(udg_TwinBossGroup, function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func001A)
            set udg_extinctionGold=( ( udg_extinctionGold / 3 ) * 10 )
            call ForForce(udg_TwinBossGroup, function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func003A)
            set udg_extinctionGold=0
            // changes for Yogg Saron
            if ( Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func006C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func006Func001C() ) then
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), udg_hintText[16])
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_creepRegion[udg_ip]), 60.00, - 320.00), 1660.00, 270.00)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            // changes for final boss level
            if ( Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func008C() ) then
                if ( Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func008Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_modeDuelFrequency=100
                    set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=100
                    set udg_PlayerIsAtFinalBoss[udg_ip]=true
                    set udg_NeedFinalBoss=true
                    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func008Func001Func006A)
                    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_ip]=udg_BossRegion[udg_ip]
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_AntiBossTeam)
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(( udg_ip + 6 )), udg_AntiBossTeam)
                    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
                else
                    if ( Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func008Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_duelTicker=1
                        set udg_modeDuelFrequency=1
                        set udg_modeExtinctionFrequency=100
                        set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=100
                        set udg_classicDuels=true
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            else
            endif
            // ==========
            set udg_playerPoints[udg_ip]=( udg_playerPoints[udg_ip] + udg_modePointsForLevels )
            set udg_playerLevelAttempts[udg_ip]=1
            if ( Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func012C() ) then
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerPoints[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_modeVictoryPoints) ))
            else
            endif
            call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], I2S(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]))
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_scorcheVillageLiberationTroops, function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Func004Func004Func015A)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    set udg_Extinction=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TwinBossesSuccess takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TwinBossesSuccess=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TwinBossesSuccess, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TwinBossesSuccess, Condition(function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TwinBossesSuccess, function Trig_TwinBossesSuccess_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CastleDefenceSuccess
//
// Set NeedFinalBoss
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetDyingUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetDyingUnit(), udg_castleDefenceInvanders) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_castleDefenceArea, GetDyingUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func002Func008Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func002Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) - 6 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 30, "TRIGSTR_9073")
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[udg_ip]=- 1
    set udg_i=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold|r from your gold mine." ) ))
    set udg_extinctionGold=( udg_extinctionGold + udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] )
    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func002Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Multiplier=1
        set udg_i=R2I(( I2R(( ( udg_pkc[( udg_ip + 6 )] * udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] ) / 110 )) * ( ( 1.05 - I2R(( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R001', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)) / GetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)) )) ) * ( 2.00 - I2R(( ( ( udg_modeLives + 1 ) - udg_playerLives[udg_ip] ) / udg_modeLives )) ) ) ))
        if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func002Func008Func003C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i) + " gold as reward|r " ) ))
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) - 6 )
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_extinctionGold, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_extinctionGold) + " gold|r from ruler of this castle" ) ))
    set udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] + 1 )
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], I2S(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]))
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] == 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func009Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func009Func001Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetTriggerPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] == 36 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func016A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_castleDefenceDefenders)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_castleDefenceInvanders) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetDyingUnit(), udg_allUnits)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetDyingUnit(), udg_castleDefenceInvanders)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 30, GetUnitName(GetDyingUnit()))
        if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004C() ) then
            if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func001C() ) then
                set udg_Extinction=false
            else
            endif
            call ForForce(udg_CastleDefenceGroup, function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func002A)
            set udg_extinctionGold=( ( udg_extinctionGold / 6 ) * 10 )
            call ForForce(udg_CastleDefenceGroup, function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func004A)
            set udg_extinctionGold=0
            // changes for Yogg Saron
            if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func007C() ) then
                if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func007Func001C() ) then
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), udg_hintText[16])
                    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_creepRegion[udg_ip]), 60.00, - 320.00), 1660.00, 270.00)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            // changes for final boss level
            if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func009C() ) then
                if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func009Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_modeDuelFrequency=100
                    set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=100
                    set udg_PlayerIsAtFinalBoss[udg_ip]=true
                    set udg_NeedFinalBoss=true
                    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func009Func001Func006A)
                    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_ip]=udg_BossRegion[udg_ip]
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), udg_AntiBossTeam)
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(( udg_ip + 6 )), udg_AntiBossTeam)
                    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
                else
                    if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func009Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_duelTicker=1
                        set udg_modeDuelFrequency=1
                        set udg_modeExtinctionFrequency=100
                        set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=100
                        set udg_classicDuels=true
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            else
            endif
            // ==========
            set udg_playerPoints[udg_ip]=( udg_playerPoints[udg_ip] + udg_modePointsForLevels )
            set udg_playerLevelAttempts[udg_ip]=1
            if ( Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func013C() ) then
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerPoints[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_modeVictoryPoints) ))
            else
            endif
            call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 3, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], I2S(udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]))
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_castleDefenceDefenders, function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Func004Func004Func016A)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GameRoundFailure)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CastleDefenceSuccess takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CastleDefenceSuccess=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_CastleDefenceSuccess, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_CastleDefenceSuccess, Condition(function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CastleDefenceSuccess, function Trig_CastleDefenceSuccess_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SludgeCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SludgeCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nslf' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SludgeCast_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SludgeCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_SludgeCast_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_l[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[1], GetRandomReal(0.00, 80.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "clusterrockets", udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SludgeCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SludgeCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SludgeCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SludgeCast, Condition(function Trig_SludgeCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SludgeCast, function Trig_SludgeCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PitLordCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PitLordCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nzof' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0K5') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 120.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) < 250.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) < 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0K5') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) < 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0K2') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PitLordCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 300.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PitLordCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_PitLordCast_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "stomp")
        else
            if ( Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                if ( Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "hex", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "hex", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_PitLordCast_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "hex", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PitLordCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PitLordCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_PitLordCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_PitLordCast, Condition(function Trig_PitLordCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PitLordCast, function Trig_PitLordCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PitLordConversedUnit
//
// Fix + Add Img to Prewiew of Map = Fix Darklich
// Set l83
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PitLordConversedUnit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0K5' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PitLordConversedUnit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[83]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call ExplodeUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'ndmu', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[83], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_scorcheVillageTrapTroops)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[83])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PitLordConversedUnit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PitLordConversedUnit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_PitLordConversedUnit, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_PitLordConversedUnit, Condition(function Trig_PitLordConversedUnit_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PitLordConversedUnit, function Trig_PitLordConversedUnit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SellUnit
//
// ша Фксршеусе дмд +*085
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SellUnit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SellUnit_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allMercenaries) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SellUnit_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SellUnit_Func003Func001C() ) then
        set udg_hasNonMercenary[udg_pRR]=true
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_SellUnit_Func004Func012Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR], udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SellUnit_Func004Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR], udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SellUnit_Func004Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR]) == 'u00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SellUnit_Func004Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR]) == 'u00N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SellUnit_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_hasNonMercenary[udg_pRR] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SellUnit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_pRR=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR]=GetTriggerUnit()
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_pRR], function Trig_SellUnit_Func003A)
    if ( Trig_SellUnit_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_i=GetUnitPointValue(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR])
        set udg_i=R2I(( I2R(udg_i) * 0.85 ))
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(udg_pRR), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( "+" + I2S(udg_i) ), udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR], 0, 10, 100, 86.00, 0.00, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 5)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4)
        call ShowTextTagForceBJ(false, GetLastCreatedTextTag(), GetPlayersAll())
        call ShowTextTagForceBJ(true, GetLastCreatedTextTag(), GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_pRR)))
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR], udg_army[udg_pRR])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_SellUnit_Func004Func012Func001C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR], udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR], udg_allMercenaries)
            else
                if ( Trig_SellUnit_Func004Func012Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR], udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR], udg_allMercenaries)
                else
                endif
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call RemoveUnit(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR])
        if ( Trig_SellUnit_Func004Func014C() ) then
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('u00G', 1, GetOwningPlayer(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR]))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_SellUnit_Func004Func015C() ) then
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('u007', 1, GetOwningPlayer(udg_soldedUnit[udg_pRR]))
        else
        endif
    else
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_8029")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SellUnit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SellUnit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SellUnit, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SellUnit, Condition(function Trig_SellUnit_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SellUnit, function Trig_SellUnit_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != 'n046' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != 'n03Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != 'n040' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return true
    endif

        return true
    endif

        return false

        return true
