    if ( not Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func006Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreepBounty_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_i=udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())]
            else
                if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_i=( udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())] * 2 )
                else
                    if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_i=( udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())] * 4 )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_i=( udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())] * 2 )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_i=( udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())] * 2 )
                            else
                                set udg_i=udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())]
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(0, 1) )
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(- 1, 2) )
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(- 2, 2) )
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func005C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(- 2, 3) )
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func001Func006C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(- 3, 3) )
            else
            endif
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( "+" + I2S(udg_i) ), GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 10, 100, 86.00, 0.00, 0)
            call ShowTextTagForceBJ(false, GetLastCreatedTextTag(), GetPlayersAll())
            call ShowTextTagForceBJ(true, GetLastCreatedTextTag(), GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA())))
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
            call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
            call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 3.00)
            call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                set udg_i=udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())]
            else
                if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_i=( udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())] * 2 )
                else
                    if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_i=( udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())] * 4 )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_i=( udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())] * 2 )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_i=( udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())] * 2 )
                            else
                                set udg_i=udg_bountyTable[GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit())]
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(0, 1) )
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(- 1, 2) )
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(- 2, 2) )
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func005C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(- 2, 3) )
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_CreepBounty_Func001Func002Func006C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + GetRandomInt(- 3, 3) )
            else
            endif
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( "+" + I2S(udg_i) ), GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 10, 100, 86.00, 0.00, 0)
            call ShowTextTagForceBJ(false, GetLastCreatedTextTag(), GetPlayersAll())
            call ShowTextTagForceBJ(true, GetLastCreatedTextTag(), GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA())))
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
            call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
            call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 3.00)
            call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CreepBounty takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CreepBounty=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_CreepBounty, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_CreepBounty, Condition(function Trig_CreepBounty_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CreepBounty, function Trig_CreepBounty_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PlayerBounty
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PlayerBounty_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerBounty_Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'u00E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerBounty_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerBounty_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_PlayerBounty_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_i=1
            if ( Trig_PlayerBounty_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i + ( GetUnitPointValue(GetTriggerUnit()) / 50 ) )
            else
            endif
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( "+" + I2S(udg_i) ), GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 10, 100, 86.00, 0.00, 0)
            call ShowTextTagForceBJ(false, GetLastCreatedTextTag(), GetPlayersAll())
            call ShowTextTagForceBJ(true, GetLastCreatedTextTag(), GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA())))
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
            call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
            call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 3.00)
            call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PlayerBounty takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PlayerBounty=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_PlayerBounty, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_PlayerBounty, Condition(function Trig_PlayerBounty_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PlayerBounty, function Trig_PlayerBounty_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SnapToGrid
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SnapToGrid_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SnapToGrid_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_x=GetLocationX(udg_l[0])
    set udg_y=GetLocationY(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    set udg_r=64.00
    set udg_x=( udg_x / udg_r )
    set udg_x=I2R(R2I(udg_x))
    set udg_x=( udg_x * udg_r )
    set udg_x=( udg_x - ( udg_r / 2.00 ) )
    set udg_y=( udg_y / udg_r )
    set udg_y=I2R(R2I(udg_y))
    set udg_y=( udg_y * udg_r )
    set udg_y=( udg_y - ( udg_r / 2.00 ) )
    set udg_l[0]=Location(udg_x, udg_y)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), udg_l[0], 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

function Trig_SnapToGrid_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_SnapToGrid_Func003A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SnapToGrid takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SnapToGrid=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SnapToGrid, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SnapToGrid, Condition(function Trig_SnapToGrid_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SnapToGrid, function Trig_SnapToGrid_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PlayerLeaves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func006Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func006Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func006Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_oddPlayerOut == GetTriggerPlayer() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain != 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func007Func002Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func007Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_humanPlayers) == udg_eR ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_humanPlayers) != 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_endRoundGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5297")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + " has left the game." ))
    set udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=( "|cff404040" + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + " (left)|r" ) )
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 0, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], 40.00, 40.00, 40.00, 0)
    if ( Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(GetTriggerPlayer()), function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func006Func001A)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]), function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func006Func002A)
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_players)
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_humanPlayers)
        if ( Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func006Func005C() ) then
            set udg_oddPlayerOut=Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func007C() ) then
    else
        set udg_eR=( udg_eR + 1 )
        if ( Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func007Func002C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_allUnits, function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Func007Func002Func005A)
            set udg_eR=0
        else
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + " voted for end round." ))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 5.00, ( ( ( "(" + I2S(udg_eR) ) + ( "/" + ( I2S(CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_humanPlayers)) + ")" ) ) ) + " players voted." ))
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PlayerLeaves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PlayerLeaves=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(0))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(1))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(2))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(3))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(4))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(5))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(6))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(7))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(8))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(9))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(10))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, Player(11))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PlayerLeaves, function Trig_PlayerLeaves_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Zoom
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Zoom_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Zoom_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 3200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Zoom_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 2600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Zoom_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 2000.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Zoom_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 1650.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Zoom_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Zoom_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=2000.00
    else
        if ( Trig_Zoom_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=2600.00
        else
            if ( Trig_Zoom_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=3200.00
            else
                if ( Trig_Zoom_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=1200.00
                else
                    set udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=1650.00
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, udg_camHeight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], 0.30)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Zoom takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Zoom=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Zoom, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Zoom, Condition(function Trig_Zoom_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Zoom, function Trig_Zoom_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TipsPeriodic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TipsPeriodic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_pgTips, udg_hintText[GetRandomInt(1, 16)])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TipsPeriodic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TipsPeriodic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_TipsPeriodic, 60.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TipsPeriodic, function Trig_TipsPeriodic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Commands
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Commands_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-tipsoff" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Commands_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-tipson" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Commands_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-cameraoff" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Commands_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-cameraon" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Commands_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Commands_Func001C() ) then
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_pgTips)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), "TRIGSTR_1150")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Commands_Func002C() ) then
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_pgTips)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), "TRIGSTR_1857")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Commands_Func003C() ) then
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), "TRIGSTR_1856")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Commands_Func004C() ) then
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_cameraAutoSnapPG)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), "TRIGSTR_1858")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Commands takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Commands=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Commands, Player(0), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Commands, Player(1), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Commands, Player(2), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Commands, Player(3), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Commands, Player(4), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Commands, Player(5), "-", false)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Commands, function Trig_Commands_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PreventInBattleUpgrades
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PreventInBattleUpgrades_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PreventInBattleUpgrades_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == udg_upgradeOrderList[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PreventInBattleUpgrades_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // check unit types
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_upgradeOrderId
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_PreventInBattleUpgrades_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_playerArmy[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()), bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_playerArmy[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()))])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_allUnits)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PreventInBattleUpgrades takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PreventInBattleUpgrades=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_PreventInBattleUpgrades, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_PreventInBattleUpgrades, Condition(function Trig_PreventInBattleUpgrades_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PreventInBattleUpgrades, function Trig_PreventInBattleUpgrades_Actions)
endfunction

    endif

endfunction

    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_SargerasTheme)
endfunction

endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AshCdarAttack, function Trig_AshCdarAttack_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DefendersAutocast
//
// rost crossbow if damage from normal attack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A04P') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A04O') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A04M') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A04Y') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A04X') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A04T') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A09F') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A04D') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A08X') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n026' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n01M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n01N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 700.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n01E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 700.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n01G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n01I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 120.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "lavamonster")
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "wateryminion")
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "starfall")
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                    if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "tranquility")
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                        if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "metamorphosis")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_l[28]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "flamestrike", udg_l[28])
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[28])
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    else
                        if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "taunt")
                                set udg_l[23]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
                                set udg_l[24]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n047', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_l[23], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                                call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09F', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhra', GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit())))
                                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.20, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "shockwave", udg_l[24])
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[23])
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[24])
                            else
                            endif
                        else
                            if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                                set udg_l[22]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                                set udg_ipU[1]=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))
                                call TriggerSleepAction(0.21)
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01U', ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipU[1]), udg_l[22], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                                call UnitAddTypeBJ(UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED, GetLastCreatedUnit())
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[22])
                            else
                                if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                    if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                                        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "berserk")
                                    else
                                    endif
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        if ( Trig_DefendersAutocast_Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "berserk")
                                        else
                                        endif
                                    else
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DefendersAutocast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DefendersAutocast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DefendersAutocast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DefendersAutocast, function Trig_DefendersAutocast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: YseraEmerladDreamHeal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_YseraEmerladDreamHeal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_YseraEmerladDreamHeal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetSpellAbilityUnit()) + 200.00 ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_YseraEmerladDreamHeal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_YseraEmerladDreamHeal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_YseraEmerladDreamHeal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_YseraEmerladDreamHeal, Condition(function Trig_YseraEmerladDreamHeal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_YseraEmerladDreamHeal, function Trig_YseraEmerladDreamHeal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LostSoul
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LostSoul_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0A5' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LostSoul_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()))
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_playerCreeps[GetForLoopIndexA()])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_playerArmy[udg_ip])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_allUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LostSoul takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LostSoul=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_LostSoul, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_LostSoul, Condition(function Trig_LostSoul_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LostSoul, function Trig_LostSoul_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: SindragosaDesperationCast
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u00W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A06V') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) < 250.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 120.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A06V') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0EH') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 300.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "stomp")
        else
            if ( Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_l[50]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "breathoffrost", udg_l[50])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[50])
            else
            endif
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_l[50]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "breathoffrost", udg_l[50])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[50])
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SindragosaDesperationCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SindragosaDesperationCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SindragosaDesperationCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SindragosaDesperationCast, Condition(function Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SindragosaDesperationCast, function Trig_SindragosaDesperationCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SindragosaDesperation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SindragosaDesperation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0EH' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SindragosaDesperation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[5]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(1.00, true, udg_l[0], 210.00, 700.00, - 200.00, 1.00, 200.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_l[6]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_l[5], 600.00, 600.00))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u002', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[6], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[6], "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIim\\AIimTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[6])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[5])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SindragosaDesperation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SindragosaDesperation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SindragosaDesperation, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SindragosaDesperation, Condition(function Trig_SindragosaDesperation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SindragosaDesperation, function Trig_SindragosaDesperation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: NecromancerRaisesSceletons
//===========================================================================
function Trig_NecromancerRaisesSceletons_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 'u012' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitRace(GetDyingUnit()) != RACE_UNDEAD ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NecromancerRaisesSceletons_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[6]=GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_l[6], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[6])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_NecromancerRaisesSceletons takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_NecromancerRaisesSceletons=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_NecromancerRaisesSceletons, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_NecromancerRaisesSceletons, Condition(function Trig_NecromancerRaisesSceletons_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_NecromancerRaisesSceletons, function Trig_NecromancerRaisesSceletons_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: NecromancerDeathCoilCast
//
// !!!
//===========================================================================
function Trig_NecromancerDeathCoilCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u012' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 10.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NecromancerDeathCoilCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0HC') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NecromancerDeathCoilCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_NecromancerDeathCoilCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[13]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "holybolt", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[13])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[13])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_NecromancerDeathCoilCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_NecromancerDeathCoilCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_NecromancerDeathCoilCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_NecromancerDeathCoilCast, Condition(function Trig_NecromancerDeathCoilCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_NecromancerDeathCoilCast, function Trig_NecromancerDeathCoilCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DestructionLichCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DestructionLichCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DestructionLichCast_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_l[84], udg_l[86]) <= 650.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DestructionLichCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A08T') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DestructionLichCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DestructionLichCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[84]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        set udg_l[86]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        if ( Trig_DestructionLichCast_Func001Func003C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blizzard", udg_l[84])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[84])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[86])
        else
            set udg_l[85]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[84], 225.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blizzard", udg_l[85])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[84])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[85])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[86])
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DestructionLichCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DestructionLichCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DestructionLichCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DestructionLichCast, Condition(function Trig_DestructionLichCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DestructionLichCast, function Trig_DestructionLichCast_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return true
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_CrippleCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n03S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CrippleCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0H4') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CrippleCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_CrippleCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[50]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "cripple", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[50])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[50])
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_CrippleCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_CrippleCast, Condition(function Trig_CrippleCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CrippleCast, function Trig_CrippleCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FearOfReaper
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FearOfReaper_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) < 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitRace(GetTriggerUnit()) != RACE_UNDEAD ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FearOfReaper_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_FearOfReaper_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FearOfReaper_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_FearOfReaper_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Haunt_v2.mdx")
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_FearOfReaper_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_FearOfReaper_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(270.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_FearOfReaper_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_ReaperFear)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_FearOfReaper_Func004A)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.50)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_FearOfReaper_Func006A)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FearOfReaper takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FearOfReaper=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_FearOfReaper, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_FearOfReaper, Condition(function Trig_FearOfReaper_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FearOfReaper, function Trig_FearOfReaper_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

endfunction

    set gg_trg_PoisonGhoulsAddSummoned=CreateTrigger()

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BoneTempleGotRoot
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01D' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01E' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01G' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01H' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u01D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0J2', GetAttacker())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('ACah', GetAttacker())
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetAttacker())
    else
        if ( Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0J4', GetAttacker())
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0JX', GetAttacker())
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetAttacker())
        else
            if ( Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0J5', GetAttacker())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('ACah', GetAttacker())
                call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetAttacker())
            else
                if ( Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0J6', GetAttacker())
                    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0JX', GetAttacker())
                    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetAttacker())
                else
                    if ( Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0J7', GetAttacker())
                        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0JV', GetAttacker())
                        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetAttacker())
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BoneTempleGotRoot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BoneTempleGotRoot=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BoneTempleGotRoot, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BoneTempleGotRoot, Condition(function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BoneTempleGotRoot, function Trig_BoneTempleGotRoot_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A09Q') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HellGateCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_HellGateCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 650.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blink", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FireBoltCannon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'o00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitPausedBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A034') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "firebolt", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        else
            set udg_l[17]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(450.00, udg_l[17], Condition(function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Func001Func001Func002002003))
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "firebolt", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ug))
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[25])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[17])
            call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FireBoltCannon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FireBoltCannon=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_FireBoltCannon, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_FireBoltCannon, Condition(function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FireBoltCannon, function Trig_FireBoltCannon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FireBoltArcher
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitPausedBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false)))))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitPausedBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STUNNED) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A06C') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "firebolt", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        else
            set udg_l[17]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(450.00, udg_l[17], Condition(function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Func001Func001Func002002003))
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "firebolt", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ug))
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[25])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[17])
            call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_FireBoltArcher, Condition(function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FireBoltArcher, function Trig_FireBoltArcher_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KiljaedenSurprise
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'h00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Func006Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 666.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit(), udg_indexId)
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_kbDt[udg_indexId]=12
        set udg_kbDx[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * CosBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * SinBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Func002002003))
    call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(2.00, true, udg_l[0], 150.00, 720.00, 350.00, 0.70, 220.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "war3mapImported\\NuclearExplosion.mdx")
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_KilJaedenExplosionGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Func006A)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KiljaedenSurprise takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KiljaedenSurprise=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_KiljaedenSurprise, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KiljaedenSurprise, Condition(function Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KiljaedenSurprise, function Trig_KiljaedenSurprise_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KiljaedenMeteorCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KiljaedenMeteorCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 300.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KiljaedenMeteorCast_Func001Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A053') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A052') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_KiljaedenMeteorCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_KiljaedenMeteorCast_Func001Func008C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KiljaedenMeteorCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_KiljaedenMeteorCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 160.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blizzard", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KiljaedenMeteorCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KiljaedenMeteorCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_KiljaedenMeteorCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KiljaedenMeteorCast, Condition(function Trig_KiljaedenMeteorCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KiljaedenMeteorCast, function Trig_KiljaedenMeteorCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AstartaPhantom
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AstartaPhantom_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'h026' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AstartaPhantom_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 'A0IW') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AstartaPhantom_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AstartaPhantom_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[37]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathandDecay\\DeathandDecayTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "blink", udg_l[37])
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[37], "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\HowlOfTerror\\HowlCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[37])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AstartaPhantom takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AstartaPhantom=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AstartaPhantom, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AstartaPhantom, Condition(function Trig_AstartaPhantom_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AstartaPhantom, function Trig_AstartaPhantom_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_XaviusInvisibility_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A02U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_XaviusInvisibility_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_XaviusInvisibility_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_XaviusInvisibility_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_Xavius)
    call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Xavius))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_XaviusInvisibility, function Trig_XaviusInvisibility_Actions)
