//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BerserkGet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BerserkGet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A015', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Bblo') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BerserkGet_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BerserkGet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_BerserkGet_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A016', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "bloodlust", GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BerserkGet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BerserkGet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BerserkGet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BerserkGet, Condition(function Trig_BerserkGet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BerserkGet, function Trig_BerserkGet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CorrosionGet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CorrosionGet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08O', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CorrosionGet_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) < 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08Q', GetTriggerUnit()) < 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CorrosionGet_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) > 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08Q', GetTriggerUnit()) <= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CorrosionGet_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CorrosionGet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_CorrosionGet_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08Q', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
        if ( Trig_CorrosionGet_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IncUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08Q', GetTriggerUnit())
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_CorrosionGet_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call IncUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08Q', GetTriggerUnit())
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CorrosionGet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CorrosionGet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_CorrosionGet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_CorrosionGet, Condition(function Trig_CorrosionGet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CorrosionGet, function Trig_CorrosionGet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DwarfRunecasterDispel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DwarfRunecasterDispel_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h00W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 35.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DwarfRunecasterDispel_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A00R') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DwarfRunecasterDispel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DwarfRunecasterDispel_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "dispel", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DwarfRunecasterDispel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DwarfRunecasterDispel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DwarfRunecasterDispel, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DwarfRunecasterDispel, Condition(function Trig_DwarfRunecasterDispel_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DwarfRunecasterDispel, function Trig_DwarfRunecasterDispel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DispelCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DispelCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DispelCast_Func004Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), udg_buffBuff[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DispelCast_Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01U', GetEnumUnit()) >= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DispelCast_Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A024', GetEnumUnit()) >= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DispelCast_Func004Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_checkBuffs == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DispelCast_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_checkBuffs=false
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_buffId
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_DispelCast_Func004Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
            set udg_checkBuffs=true
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_DispelCast_Func004Func003C() ) then
        call DecUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01U', GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
        set udg_checkBuffs=true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DispelCast_Func004Func004C() ) then
        call DecUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A024', GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
        set udg_checkBuffs=true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DispelCast_Func004Func005C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\DispelMagic\\DispelMagicTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DispelCast_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DispelCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_i=0
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(200.00, udg_l[0])
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_DispelCast_Func004A)
    if ( Trig_DispelCast_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( I2S(( udg_i * 25 )) + "!" ), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 0, 10, 0.00, 0.00, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 3.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetSpellTargetUnit(), "Abilities\\Weapons\\DemonHunterMissile\\DemonHunterMissile.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), ( 25.00 * I2R(udg_i) ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetSpellTargetUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\CarrionSwarm\\CarrionSwarmDamage.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DispelCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DispelCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DispelCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DispelCast, Condition(function Trig_DispelCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DispelCast, function Trig_DispelCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HemingBombardCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HemingBombardCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h02A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HemingBombardCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0HW') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HemingBombardCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_HemingBombardCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[16]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blizzard", udg_l[16])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[16])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[16])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HemingBombardCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HemingBombardCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_HemingBombardCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_HemingBombardCast, Condition(function Trig_HemingBombardCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HemingBombardCast, function Trig_HemingBombardCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bear Slam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bear_Slam_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A063' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bear_Slam_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Bear_Slam_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bear_Slam_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Bear_Slam_Func004Func001C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit(), udg_indexId)
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_kbDt[udg_indexId]=5
        set udg_kbDx[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * CosBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * SinBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Bear_Slam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_Bear_Slam_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_slamKnockbackGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_Bear_Slam_Func004A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bear_Slam takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bear_Slam=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Bear_Slam, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Bear_Slam, Condition(function Trig_Bear_Slam_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bear_Slam, function Trig_Bear_Slam_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TowerShieldGet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TowerShieldGet_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h001' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h004' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h017' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShieldGet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_TowerShieldGet_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShieldGet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_TowerShield, GetTriggerUnit(), EVENT_UNIT_DAMAGED)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TowerShieldGet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TowerShieldGet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_TowerShieldGet, GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TowerShieldGet, Condition(function Trig_TowerShieldGet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TowerShieldGet, function Trig_TowerShieldGet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TowerShield
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( udg_tsFacing - udg_tsSource ) <= 90.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( ( udg_tsFacing - udg_tsSource ) >= - 90.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( ( udg_tsFacing - udg_tsSource ) >= 270.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( udg_tsFacing - udg_tsSource ) <= 45.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( ( udg_tsFacing - udg_tsSource ) >= - 45.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002Func003Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( ( udg_tsFacing - udg_tsSource ) >= 315.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShield_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TowerShield_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEventDamageSource())
    set udg_tsFacing=GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tsSource=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[1], udg_l[0])
    set udg_tsSource=( udg_tsSource + 180.00 )
    if ( Trig_TowerShield_Func006C() ) then
        if ( Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func001C() ) then
            set udg_r=( GetEventDamage() * 0.50 )
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + udg_r ))
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002Func001C() ) then
                set udg_r=( GetEventDamage() * 0.30 )
                call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + udg_r ))
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_TowerShield_Func006Func002Func002C() ) then
                set udg_r=( GetEventDamage() * 0.40 )
                call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + udg_r ))
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TowerShield takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TowerShield=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TowerShield, function Trig_TowerShield_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BaradungHitAndRun
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BaradungHitAndRun_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h02J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BaradungHitAndRun_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[38]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_l[39]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    set udg_l[40]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[39], 920.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[39], udg_l[38]))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "move", udg_l[40])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[38])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[39])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[40])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BaradungHitAndRun takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BaradungHitAndRun=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BaradungHitAndRun, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BaradungHitAndRun, Condition(function Trig_BaradungHitAndRun_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BaradungHitAndRun, function Trig_BaradungHitAndRun_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ConfusionGet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ConfusionGet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetAttacker(), 'B004') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ConfusionGet_Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_ConfusionGet_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomPercentageBJ() <= 40.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ConfusionGet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_ConfusionGet_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(150.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_ConfusionGet_Func001Func002002003))
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "attackonce", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ug))
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ConfusionGet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ConfusionGet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_ConfusionGet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ConfusionGet, Condition(function Trig_ConfusionGet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ConfusionGet, function Trig_ConfusionGet_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

endfunction

        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()))
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[51])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AerialShacklesCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AerialShacklesCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e013' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AerialShacklesCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'Amls') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AerialShacklesCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AerialShacklesCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[25]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "magicleash", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[25])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[25])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AerialShacklesCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AerialShacklesCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AerialShacklesCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AerialShacklesCast, Condition(function Trig_AerialShacklesCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AerialShacklesCast, function Trig_AerialShacklesCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AerialSuppressionCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AerialSuppressionCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e014' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AerialSuppressionCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0GR') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AerialSuppressionCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AerialSuppressionCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[26]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "stomp")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[26])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[26])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AerialSuppressionCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AerialSuppressionCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AerialSuppressionCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AerialSuppressionCast, Condition(function Trig_AerialSuppressionCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AerialSuppressionCast, function Trig_AerialSuppressionCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AelinSunWellCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AelinSunWellCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e00O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 300.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AelinSunWellCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A09G') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AelinSunWellCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AelinSunWellCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 125.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "flamestrike", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AelinSunWellCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AelinSunWellCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AelinSunWellCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AelinSunWellCast, Condition(function Trig_AelinSunWellCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AelinSunWellCast, function Trig_AelinSunWellCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SunWell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SunWell_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SunWell_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_SunWell_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SunWell_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SunWell_Func005Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[30]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[30], "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIem\\AIemTarget.mdl")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_l[31])
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[30])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_SunWell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_l[31]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_SunWell_Func003002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_SunWellGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_SunWell_Func005A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[31])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SunWell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SunWell=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SunWell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SunWell, Condition(function Trig_SunWell_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SunWell, function Trig_SunWell_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n03D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WitcherMagicBanCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'ACsi') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WitcherMagicBanCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_WitcherMagicBanCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 210.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "silence", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_KaelFireOfAnnihilationCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e015' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 160.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KaelFireOfAnnihilationCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0GW') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KaelFireOfAnnihilationCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_KaelFireOfAnnihilationCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 200.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "shockwave", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KaelFireOfAnnihilationCast, Condition(function Trig_KaelFireOfAnnihilationCast_Conditions))

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KaelOrb
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KaelOrb_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e015' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) <= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KaelOrb_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[15]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e016', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_l[15], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[15])
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "creepdevour", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KaelOrb takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KaelOrb=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_KaelOrb, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KaelOrb, Condition(function Trig_KaelOrb_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KaelOrb, function Trig_KaelOrb_Actions)
endfunction

        return false

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: UtherHolyStrike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) == 'h01E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Func007Func001C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit(), udg_indexId)
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_kbDt[udg_indexId]=12
        set udg_kbDx[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * CosBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * SinBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitScalePercent(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), 220.00, 220.00, 220.00)
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_l[46]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 700.00, 700.00))
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[46], "war3mapImported\\God Lightning.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[46])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(320.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Func004002003))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_slamKnockbackGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Func007A)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.05)
    call SetUnitScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 100.00, 100.00, 100.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A062', GetTriggerUnit())
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A062', GetTriggerUnit())
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_UtherHolyStrike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_UtherHolyStrike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_UtherHolyStrike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_UtherHolyStrike, Condition(function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_UtherHolyStrike, function Trig_UtherHolyStrike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: JailerEnsnareCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_JailerEnsnareCast_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n03U' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n04A' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_JailerEnsnareCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_JailerEnsnareCast_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_JailerEnsnareCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0HP') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_JailerEnsnareCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_JailerEnsnareCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[32]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_l[33]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        set udg_l[34]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[33], 320.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[33], udg_l[32]))
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "ensnare", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "move", udg_l[34])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[32])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[33])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[34])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_JailerEnsnareCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_JailerEnsnareCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_JailerEnsnareCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_JailerEnsnareCast, Condition(function Trig_JailerEnsnareCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_JailerEnsnareCast, function Trig_JailerEnsnareCast_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'h025' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SirDinadanTauntCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SirDinadanTauntCast_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "taunt")
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SirDinadanTauntCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SirDinadanTauntCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SirDinadanTauntCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SirDinadanTauntCast, Condition(function Trig_SirDinadanTauntCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SirDinadanTauntCast, function Trig_SirDinadanTauntCast_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SirDinadanTaunt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SirDinadanTaunt_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GB' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SirDinadanTaunt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[21]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_l[20]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[21], ( - 1200.00 + ( 2400.00 * GetRandomReal(0.00, 1.00) ) ), - 600.00)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "move", udg_l[20])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[21])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[20])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SirDinadanTaunt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SirDinadanTaunt=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SirDinadanTaunt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SirDinadanTaunt, Condition(function Trig_SirDinadanTaunt_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SirDinadanTaunt, function Trig_SirDinadanTaunt_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h02H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ExpelExorcist_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 5000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Medivh Crow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Medivh_Crow_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h01Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttacker()) <= 65.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Medivh_Crow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, "TRIGSTR_1842")
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_l[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 1040.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[2], udg_l[0]))
    call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, GetAttacker())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "ravenform")
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "move", udg_l[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "unravenform")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[2])
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Medivh_Crow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Medivh_Crow=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Medivh_Crow, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Medivh_Crow, Condition(function Trig_Medivh_Crow_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Medivh_Crow, function Trig_Medivh_Crow_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Medivh BackTrack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Medivh_BackTrack_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'h01Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) <= 45.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Medivh_BackTrack_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Medivh_Crow) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Medivh_BackTrack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, "TRIGSTR_2154")
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_l[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 1000.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[2], udg_l[0]))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[2], "war3mapImported\\BlackHole_squished.mdx")
    call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), udg_l[1])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "attack", udg_l[2])
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    if ( Trig_Medivh_BackTrack_Func012C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Medivh_Crow)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Medivh_BackTrack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Medivh_BackTrack=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Medivh_BackTrack, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Medivh_BackTrack, Condition(function Trig_Medivh_BackTrack_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Medivh_BackTrack, function Trig_Medivh_BackTrack_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: MedivhMeteorCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MedivhMeteorCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h01Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 300.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMeteorCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0B7') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMeteorCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MedivhMeteorCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 300.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blizzard", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MedivhMeteorCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MedivhMeteorCast, Condition(function Trig_MedivhMeteorCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MedivhMeteorCast, function Trig_MedivhMeteorCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MedivhMeteor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MedivhMeteor_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0B7' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMeteor_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMeteor_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMeteor_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MedivhMeteor_Func007Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 600.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit(), udg_indexId)
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_kbDt[udg_indexId]=7
        set udg_kbDx[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * CosBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * SinBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMeteor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, "TRIGSTR_2228")
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(320.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_MedivhMeteor_Func003002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_slamKnockbackGroup)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Volcano\\VolcanoDeath.mdl")
    call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(1.00, true, udg_l[0], 150.00, 500.00, 250.00, 0.50, 200.00)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_MedivhMeteor_Func007A)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MedivhMeteor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MedivhMeteor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MedivhMeteor, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MedivhMeteor, Condition(function Trig_MedivhMeteor_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MedivhMeteor, function Trig_MedivhMeteor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MedivhMassHexCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MedivhMassHexCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h01Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 150.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMassHexCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0JR') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMassHexCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MedivhMassHexCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 75.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "rainoffire", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_MedivhMassHexCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MedivhMassHexCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MedivhMassHexCast, Condition(function Trig_MedivhMassHexCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MedivhMassHexCast, function Trig_MedivhMassHexCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MedivhMassHex
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MedivhMassHex_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0JR' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMassHex_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMassHex_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetEnumUnit()) < 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMassHex_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MedivhMassHex_Func005Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[23]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n028', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[23], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "polymorph", GetEnumUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[23])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_MedivhMassHex_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_debugPg, "TRIGSTR_2231")
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(240.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_MedivhMassHex_Func003002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_HexUnitGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_MedivhMassHex_Func005A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MedivhMassHex takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MedivhMassHex=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MedivhMassHex, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MedivhMassHex, Condition(function Trig_MedivhMassHex_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MedivhMassHex, function Trig_MedivhMassHex_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_WizardBlizzard_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h00E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 40.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WizardBlizzard_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'ACbz') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WizardBlizzard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_WizardBlizzard_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 65.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blizzard", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h020' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0EW') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AntonidosBlizzard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AntonidosBlizzard_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blizzard", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    else
    endif
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_AntonidosSpiritTouch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_playerArmy[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit())) - 6 )]))
    set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 200.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "attack", udg_l[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KhadarAdalBlessing
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FJ' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Func006Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0FS', GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIem\\AIemTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Func002002003))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "war3mapImported\\WhiteSeal_squished.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_AdalBlessing)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Func006A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KhadarAdalBlessing takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KhadarAdalBlessing=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_KhadarAdalBlessing, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KhadarAdalBlessing, Condition(function Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KhadarAdalBlessing, function Trig_KhadarAdalBlessing_Actions)
endfunction

// !!!
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KadgarManaBurstCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h023' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    endif
    return true

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_KadgarManaBurstCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KadgarManaBurstCast, Condition(function Trig_KadgarManaBurstCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KadgarManaBurstCast, function Trig_KadgarManaBurstCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KhadarManaBurst
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FT' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Func007Func001C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit(), udg_indexId)
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_kbDt[udg_indexId]=4
        set udg_kbDx[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * CosBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * SinBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Monsoon\\MonsoonBoltTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n028', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "stomp")
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Func005002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_slamKnockbackGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Func007A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KhadarManaBurst takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KhadarManaBurst=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_KhadarManaBurst, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KhadarManaBurst, Condition(function Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KhadarManaBurst, function Trig_KhadarManaBurst_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KhadgarShield
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KhadgarShield_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h023' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttacker()) >= 99.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KhadgarShield_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[64]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "manashieldon")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "attack", udg_l[64])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[64])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KhadgarShield takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KhadgarShield=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_KhadgarShield, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KhadgarShield, Condition(function Trig_KhadgarShield_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KhadgarShield, function Trig_KhadgarShield_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KhadgarBlink
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KhadgarBlink_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'h023' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) <= 56.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_duelTicker != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KhadgarBlink_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 6.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KhadgarBlink_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_KhadgarBlink_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        set udg_l[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 600.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[2], udg_l[0]))
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkTarget.mdl")
        call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "blink", udg_l[1])
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) + 400.00 ))
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "manashieldon")
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "attack", udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KhadgarBlink takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KhadgarBlink=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_KhadgarBlink, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KhadgarBlink, Condition(function Trig_KhadgarBlink_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KhadgarBlink, function Trig_KhadgarBlink_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FuryGet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FuryGet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A031', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Brej') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FuryGet_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FuryGet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_FuryGet_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A016', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "rejuvination", GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FuryGet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FuryGet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_FuryGet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_FuryGet, Condition(function Trig_FuryGet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FuryGet, function Trig_FuryGet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tyrande
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tyrande_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'e008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_AttackTyrande) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_Tyrande_Func003002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_AttackTyrande)
    if ( Trig_Tyrande_Func005C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[0], bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_2424")
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('S007', GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "Morph Alternate")
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('S006', GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_AttackTyrande))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tyrande takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tyrande=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Tyrande, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Tyrande, Condition(function Trig_Tyrande_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tyrande, function Trig_Tyrande_Actions)
endfunction

    endif

// players

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'espv', GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BladeDancerWildBlade
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BladeDancerWildBlade_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n020' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BladeDancerWildBlade_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A07V') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BladeDancerWildBlade_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_BladeDancerWildBlade_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "whirlwind")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BladeDancerWildBlade takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BladeDancerWildBlade=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BladeDancerWildBlade, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BladeDancerWildBlade, Condition(function Trig_BladeDancerWildBlade_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BladeDancerWildBlade, function Trig_BladeDancerWildBlade_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tiger Roar
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tiger_Roar_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) < 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tiger_Roar_Func009Func001Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ( udg_tsFacing - udg_tsSource ) <= 90.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( ( udg_tsFacing - udg_tsSource ) >= - 90.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tiger_Roar_Func009Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Tiger_Roar_Func009Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( ( udg_tsFacing - udg_tsSource ) >= 270.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Tiger_Roar_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Tiger_Roar_Func009Func001Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tiger_Roar_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tiger_Roar_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEventDamageSource())
    set udg_tsFacing=GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tsSource=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[1], udg_l[0])
    set udg_tsSource=( udg_tsSource + 180.00 )
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        if ( Trig_Tiger_Roar_Func009Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[3]=GetUnitLoc(GetEventDamageSource())
            set udg_l[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[3], 400.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[3]))
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEventDamageSource(), "move", udg_l[4])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tiger_Roar takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tiger_Roar=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Tiger_Roar, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Tiger_Roar, Condition(function Trig_Tiger_Roar_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tiger_Roar, function Trig_Tiger_Roar_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blackout
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blackout_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09V', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blackout_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blackout_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_l[52]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02F', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_l[52], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.65)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "curse", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[52])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blackout takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blackout=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blackout, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blackout, Condition(function Trig_Blackout_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blackout, function Trig_Blackout_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e00Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MalFurionAvatarSummoned
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MalFurionAvatarSummoned_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSummonedUnit()) == 'eaom' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MalFurionAvatarSummoned_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_AoF[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSummoningUnit())) + 0 )]=GetSummoningUnit()
    set udg_AoF[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSummoningUnit())) + 6 )]=GetSummonedUnit()
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_AoF[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSummoningUnit()))])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", udg_AoF[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSummoningUnit()))], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkSummoning\\DarkSummonMissile.mdl")
    set udg_AofS=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_MalFurionAvatarSummoned=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MalFurionAvatarSummoned, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SUMMON)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MalFurionAvatarSummoned, Condition(function Trig_MalFurionAvatarSummoned_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MalFurionAvatarSummoned, function Trig_MalFurionAvatarSummoned_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction
