//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MalFurionStormCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MalFurionStormCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e00Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MalFurionStormCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0EA') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MalFurionStormCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MalFurionStormCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 150.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "cloudoffog", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MalFurionStormCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MalFurionStormCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MalFurionStormCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MalFurionStormCast, Condition(function Trig_MalFurionStormCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MalFurionStormCast, function Trig_MalFurionStormCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MalFurionStorm
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MalFurionStorm_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0EA' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MalFurionStorm_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e010', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 0, 0), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(6.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set udg_HighFireWall=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_HighFireWall > 6
        set udg_HighFireWallPoint[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], ( 3.00 * 120.00 ), I2R(( 30 * udg_HighFireWall )))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_HighFireWallPoint[( ( udg_HighFireWall - 1 ) * ( ( 4 - 3 ) + 0 ) )], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(6.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_HighFireWallPoint[1])
        set udg_HighFireWall=udg_HighFireWall + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MalFurionStorm takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MalFurionStorm=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MalFurionStorm, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MalFurionStorm, Condition(function Trig_MalFurionStorm_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MalFurionStorm, function Trig_MalFurionStorm_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: IllidanMorph
//
// turn on
//===========================================================================
function Trig_IllidanMorph_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n03B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttacker()) <= 35.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_IllidanMorph_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(800.00, GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()))))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaFlare\\ManaFlareBoltImpact.mdl")
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetAttacker(), udg_l[1])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('S00A', GetAttacker())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Doom\\DoomDeath.mdl")
    call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, GetAttacker())
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_IllidanMorph takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_IllidanMorph=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_IllidanMorph, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_IllidanMorph, Condition(function Trig_IllidanMorph_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_IllidanMorph, function Trig_IllidanMorph_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e00H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TigerRoarCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A05X') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_TigerRoarCast_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "howlofterror")
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TigerRoarCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TigerRoarCast, Condition(function Trig_TigerRoarCast_Conditions))

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HexWard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HexWard_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'o011' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HexWard_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_HexWard_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) <= 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_HexWard_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) <= 5)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_HexWard_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A04Z') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HexWard_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_ug) != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HexWard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[32]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(512.00, udg_l[32], Condition(function Trig_HexWard_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_HexWard_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_HexWard_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_HexWardGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "hex", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_HexWardGroup))
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[32])
            call DestroyGroup(udg_HexWardGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HexWard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HexWard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_HexWard, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_HexWard, Condition(function Trig_HexWard_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HexWard, function Trig_HexWard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WardAddToGroup
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WardAddToGroup_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_visionMain, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_visionDuels, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_WardAddToGroup_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o00D' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o01A' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o01G' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_WardAddToGroup_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_WardAddToGroup_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_WardAddToGroup_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WardAddToGroup_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_healingWardTargetGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WardAddToGroup_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_WardAddToGroup_Func006Func001C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_healingWardTargetGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_WardAddToGroup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(800.00, udg_l[0])
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_WardAddToGroup_Func006A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WardAddToGroup takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WardAddToGroup=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_WardAddToGroup, GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_WardAddToGroup, Condition(function Trig_WardAddToGroup_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_WardAddToGroup, function Trig_WardAddToGroup_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HealingWard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HealingWard_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_healingWardTargetGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HealingWard_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_HealingWard_Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o00D' )
endfunction

function Trig_HealingWard_Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o01G' )
endfunction

function Trig_HealingWard_Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o01A' )
endfunction

function Trig_HealingWard_Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o01G'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o01A')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_HealingWard_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o00D'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o01G'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o01A')))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_HealingWard_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o00D'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o01G'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o01A')))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_HealingWard_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_ug) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomPercentageBJ() <= 35.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HealingWard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_HealingWard_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_HealingWard_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_u=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ug)
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], GetRandomReal(- 150.00, - 50.00), ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u) + GetRandomReal(- 30.00, 30.00) ))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_u, "healingward", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HealingWard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HealingWard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_HealingWard, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_HealingWard, Condition(function Trig_HealingWard_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HealingWard, function Trig_HealingWard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HexWardVolJinCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HexWardVolJinCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'o00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 120.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HexWardVolJinCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A06N') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HexWardVolJinCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_HexWardVolJinCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[34]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "healingward", udg_l[34])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[34])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[34])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HexWardVolJinCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HexWardVolJinCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_HexWardVolJinCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_HexWardVolJinCast, Condition(function Trig_HexWardVolJinCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HexWardVolJinCast, function Trig_HexWardVolJinCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: YennikyRegenerationLoose
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'o01M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttacker()) >= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_YennikyRegenerationLoose_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0ET', GetAttacker())
endfunction

    endif
    return true

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DisarmGet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DisarmGet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A023', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DisarmGet_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) < 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A024', GetTriggerUnit()) < 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DisarmGet_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) > 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A024', GetTriggerUnit()) <= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DisarmGet_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A024', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DisarmGet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DisarmGet_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A024', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
        if ( Trig_DisarmGet_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IncUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A024', GetTriggerUnit())
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_DisarmGet_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call IncUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A024', GetTriggerUnit())
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DisarmGet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DisarmGet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DisarmGet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DisarmGet, Condition(function Trig_DisarmGet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DisarmGet, function Trig_DisarmGet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bushwacker
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bushwacker_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A075' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bushwacker_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Bushwacker_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_Bushwacker_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_enemy)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.70)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_enemy))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bushwacker takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bushwacker=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Bushwacker, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Bushwacker, Condition(function Trig_Bushwacker_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bushwacker, function Trig_Bushwacker_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla
//===========================================================================
function Trig_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nmpe' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'o015' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 15.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A075') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla_Func003C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "windwalk")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla, Condition(function Trig_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla, function Trig_StartBushwackGaribaldiGuerilla_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BloodyMaidenKilling
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BloodyMaidenKilling_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 'o01N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BloodyMaidenKilling_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetDyingUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HumanBlood\\HumanBloodFootman.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetDyingUnit()) * 0.10 ) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_BloodyMaidenKilling=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BloodyMaidenKilling, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BloodyMaidenKilling, Condition(function Trig_BloodyMaidenKilling_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BloodyMaidenKilling, function Trig_BloodyMaidenKilling_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    endif

    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CorruptGet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CorruptGet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01T', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CorruptGet_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) < 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01U', GetTriggerUnit()) <= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CorruptGet_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) > 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01U', GetTriggerUnit()) <= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CorruptGet_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01U', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CorruptGet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_CorruptGet_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01U', GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Abyss.mdx")
    else
        if ( Trig_CorruptGet_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IncUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01U', GetTriggerUnit())
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_CorruptGet_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call IncUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01U', GetTriggerUnit())
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CorruptGet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CorruptGet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_CorruptGet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_CorruptGet, Condition(function Trig_CorruptGet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CorruptGet, function Trig_CorruptGet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ArchitectAttack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ArchitectAttack_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n03N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ArchitectAttack_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R008', ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) - 6 ))) == GetForLoopIndexA() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ArchitectAttack_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R009', ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) - 6 ))) == GetForLoopIndexA() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ArchitectAttack_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00A', ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) - 6 ))) == GetForLoopIndexA() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ArchitectAttack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_ArchitectAttack_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=0
            set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=GetForLoopIndexA()
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
                set udg_aoL[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03P', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_aoL[GetForLoopIndexA()], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_aoL[1])
                set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_ArchitectAttack_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=0
            set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=GetForLoopIndexA()
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
                set udg_aoL[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_aoL[GetForLoopIndexA()], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_aoL[2])
                set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_ArchitectAttack_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=0
            set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=GetForLoopIndexA()
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
                set udg_aoL[3]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03O', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_aoL[GetForLoopIndexA()], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_aoL[3])
                set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ArchitectAttack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ArchitectAttack=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_ArchitectAttack, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ArchitectAttack, Condition(function Trig_ArchitectAttack_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ArchitectAttack, function Trig_ArchitectAttack_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: RazuHanabInstaKill
//===========================================================================
function Trig_RazuHanabInstaKill_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u00Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) < 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RazuHanabInstaKill_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HumanBlood\\HumanBloodFootman.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 50000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    set udg_RazuHanab[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))]=( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttacker()) / ( 20.00 + I2R(GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))) ) )
    call SetUnitScalePercent(GetAttacker(), udg_RazuHanab[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))], udg_RazuHanab[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))], udg_RazuHanab[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))])
    set udg_Some_Unit=GetAttacker()
    set udg_Max_Hp=( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttacker())) + ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ())) / 10 ) )
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_Max_Hp)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_RazuHanabInstaKill takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_RazuHanabInstaKill=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_RazuHanabInstaKill, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_RazuHanabInstaKill, Condition(function Trig_RazuHanabInstaKill_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RazuHanabInstaKill, function Trig_RazuHanabInstaKill_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 'u00Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetDyingUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HumanBlood\\HumanBloodKnight.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Some_Unit=GetKillingUnitBJ()
    set udg_Max_Hp=( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ())) + ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetDyingUnit())) / 10 ) )
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_Max_Hp)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetDyingUnit()) * 0.20 ) ))
    set udg_RazuHanab[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))]=( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) / ( 20.00 + I2R(GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))) ) )
    call SetUnitScalePercent(GetKillingUnitBJ(), udg_RazuHanab[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))], udg_RazuHanab[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))], udg_RazuHanab[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation, Condition(function Trig_RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation, function Trig_RazuHanabBloodRejuvenation_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0GE') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_AcridBladeCast_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "shadowstrike", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AcridBladeCast, Condition(function Trig_AcridBladeCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AcridBladeCast, function Trig_AcridBladeCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SuicideCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SuicideCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SuicideCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0G2') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SuicideCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SuicideCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[47]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "selfdestruct", udg_l[47])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[47])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_SuicideCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SuicideCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SuicideCast, Condition(function Trig_SuicideCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SuicideCast, function Trig_SuicideCast_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DemensionShift
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DemensionShift_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0EX' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DemensionShift_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'Beng') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'Bena') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetSpellTargetUnit()) < 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DemensionShift_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_DemensionShift_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DemensionShift_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DemensionShift_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[67]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
        set udg_l[65]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
        set udg_l[66]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[65], 0, 500.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[67], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathPact\\DeathPactTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_l[66])
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "ensnare", GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[65])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[66])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[67])
    else
        call UnitResetCooldown(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DemensionShift takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DemensionShift=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DemensionShift, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DemensionShift, Condition(function Trig_DemensionShift_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DemensionShift, function Trig_DemensionShift_Actions)
endfunction

        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[22])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[22])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ThrallCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ThrallCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'o00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ThrallCast_Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A054') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ThrallCast_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) < 180.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ThrallCast_Func003Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A054') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ThrallCast_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A05M') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ThrallCast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ThrallCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_ThrallCast_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_ThrallCast_Func003Func002C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "spiritwolf")
        else
            if ( Trig_ThrallCast_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "chainlightning", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            else
            endif
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_ThrallCast_Func003Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_ThrallCast_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "chainlightning", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ThrallCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ThrallCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_ThrallCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ThrallCast, Condition(function Trig_ThrallCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ThrallCast, function Trig_ThrallCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AssassinInvisibility
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AssassinInvisibility_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AssassinInvisibility_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_AssassinInvisibility_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_AssassinInvisibility_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_StealthStrike)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_StealthStrike))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AssassinInvisibility takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AssassinInvisibility=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AssassinInvisibility, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AssassinInvisibility, Condition(function Trig_AssassinInvisibility_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AssassinInvisibility, function Trig_AssassinInvisibility_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HellScreem
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HellScreem_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetSpellTargetUnit()) < 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HellScreem_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_HellScreem_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_HeroUnits) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HellScreem_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_HellScreem_Func003Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    else
        set udg_l[3]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_l[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[3], 400.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[3]))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_HellScreem_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_HellScreem_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_HellScreem_Func003A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HellScreem takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HellScreem=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_HellScreem, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_HellScreem, Condition(function Trig_HellScreem_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HellScreem, function Trig_HellScreem_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BroxigarLastStrike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BroxigarLastStrike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'o01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) <= 17.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroxigarLastStrike_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0BF', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroxigarLastStrike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_BroxigarLastStrike_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    else
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BF', GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\BattleRoar\\RoarCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BH', GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BroxigarLastStrike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BroxigarLastStrike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BroxigarLastStrike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BroxigarLastStrike, Condition(function Trig_BroxigarLastStrike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BroxigarLastStrike, function Trig_BroxigarLastStrike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BerserkBroxigarGet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BerserkBroxigarGet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0CQ', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Bblo') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BerserkBroxigarGet_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BerserkBroxigarGet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_BerserkBroxigarGet_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A016', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "bloodlust", GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BerserkBroxigarGet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BerserkBroxigarGet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BerserkBroxigarGet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BerserkBroxigarGet, Condition(function Trig_BerserkBroxigarGet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BerserkBroxigarGet, function Trig_BerserkBroxigarGet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: IgniteInsanity
//===========================================================================
function Trig_IgniteInsanity_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0EO' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_IgniteInsanity_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_u=GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_l[53]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(512, udg_l[53])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[53])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ug))
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03C', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u), udg_l[53], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "soulburn", udg_u)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_IgniteInsanity takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_IgniteInsanity=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_IgniteInsanity, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_IgniteInsanity, Condition(function Trig_IgniteInsanity_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_IgniteInsanity, function Trig_IgniteInsanity_Actions)
endfunction

    return true

    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0H2', udg_Matilda[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit())) - 6 )])
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'o01P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Matilda[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit())) - 0 )], "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\TalkToMe\\TalkToMe.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0H2', udg_Matilda[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit())) - 0 )])
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MatildaDying, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MatildaDying, Condition(function Trig_MatildaDying_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MatildaDying, function Trig_MatildaDying_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ReturnToBattle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ReturnToBattle_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ReturnToBattle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_ReturnToBattle_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[0]=OffsetLocation(GetRectCenter(udg_visionRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0, 750.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ReturnToBattle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ReturnToBattle=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_ReturnToBattle, gg_rct_mba1)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_ReturnToBattle, gg_rct_mba2)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_ReturnToBattle, gg_rct_mba3)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_ReturnToBattle, gg_rct_mba4)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_ReturnToBattle, gg_rct_mba5)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_ReturnToBattle, gg_rct_mba6)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ReturnToBattle, function Trig_ReturnToBattle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ReturnToMassDuel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ReturnToMassDuel_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ReturnToMassDuel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_ReturnToMassDuel_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[0]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_MDA)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ReturnToMassDuel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ReturnToMassDuel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_ReturnToMassDuel, gg_rct_MDA)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ReturnToMassDuel, function Trig_ReturnToMassDuel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ReturnToSargeras
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ReturnToSargeras_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ReturnToSargeras_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_ReturnToSargeras_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[0]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_FBA)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: RangedUnitAttackAir
//===========================================================================
function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ATTACKS_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ATTACKS_FLYING) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetAttacker())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 40.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) != 'u00E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
        if ( Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func003Func003A)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "attack", GetAttacker())
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_RangedUnitAttackAir takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_RangedUnitAttackAir=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_RangedUnitAttackAir, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_RangedUnitAttackAir, Condition(function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RangedUnitAttackAir, function Trig_RangedUnitAttackAir_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Flee
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Flee_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01B', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flee_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 15.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flee_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_Flee_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 300.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[2], udg_l[0]))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[1])
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIam\\AIamTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Flee takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Flee=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Flee, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Flee, Condition(function Trig_Flee_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Flee, function Trig_Flee_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fear
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fear_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A017', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) < 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fear_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 15.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fear_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_Fear_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], - 200.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[1])
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttacker(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\HowlOfTerror\\HowlCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fear takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fear=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Fear, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Fear, Condition(function Trig_Fear_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fear, function Trig_Fear_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

        return false

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then

function Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n01A' )
endfunction

function Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func004002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n01B' )
endfunction

function Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n01A'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n01B')) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreepCast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n04D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CreepCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_iM=( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) - 6 )
        if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_l[41]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "thunderbolt", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_l[41], bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(0.10, 'BTLF', GetAttacker())
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(0.10, 'BTLF', GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[41])
        else
            set udg_l[41]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[41])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[41])
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
            if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "stomp")
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "creepthunderclap")
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                    if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "breathoffrost", udg_l[0])
                        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[0])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                        if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "stomp")
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                        if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                            if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "dispel", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                            else
                            endif
                        else
                            if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                                if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "forkedlightning", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                                else
                                endif
                            else
                                if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                                    if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                                        set udg_l[55]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "rainoffire", udg_l[55])
                                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[55])
                                    else
                                    endif
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                                        if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                                            set udg_l[56]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
                                            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "carrionswarm", udg_l[56])
                                            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[56])
                                        else
                                        endif
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                                            if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                                                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "purge", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                                            else
                                            endif
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                                                if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                                                    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "animatedead")
                                                else
                                                endif
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                                                    if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                                                        set udg_l[54]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
                                                        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "sleep", GetAttacker())
                                                        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                                                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[54])
                                                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[54])
                                                    else
                                                    endif
                                                else
                                                    if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                        set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
                                                        if ( Trig_CreepCast_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                                                            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "ensnare", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
                                                        else
                                                        endif
                                                    else
                                                    endif
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CreepCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CreepCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_CreepCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CreepCast, function Trig_CreepCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TaskmasterSlamCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TaskmasterSlamCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nkol' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TaskmasterSlamCast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 40.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TaskmasterSlamCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_TaskmasterSlamCast_Func003C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "creepthunderclap")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TaskmasterSlamCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TaskmasterSlamCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TaskmasterSlamCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TaskmasterSlamCast, Condition(function Trig_TaskmasterSlamCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TaskmasterSlamCast, function Trig_TaskmasterSlamCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Worms Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Worms_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nkol' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Worms_Cast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 35.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Worms_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_Worms_Cast_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_l[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "deathanddecay", udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CrockedCoboldCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CrockedCoboldCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nkol' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CrockedCoboldCast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CrockedCoboldCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_CrockedCoboldCast_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "elementalfury")
        call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(0.30, true, udg_l[1], 300.00, 300.00, 200.00, 0.30, 100.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Volcano\\VolcanoDeath.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CrockedCoboldCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CrockedCoboldCast=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CrockedCoboldCast)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_CrockedCoboldCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_CrockedCoboldCast, Condition(function Trig_CrockedCoboldCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CrockedCoboldCast, function Trig_CrockedCoboldCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Underwalk
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Underwalk_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Underwalk_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06Q', GetSpellAbilityUnit()), 'n01R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Underwalk takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Underwalk=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Underwalk, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Underwalk, Condition(function Trig_Underwalk_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Underwalk, function Trig_Underwalk_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Worms Container
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Worms_Container_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0IF' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Worms_Container_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[1]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Polymorph\\PolyMorphTarget.mdl")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(( 2 * GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) ), 'n01T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Worms_Container takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Worms_Container=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Worms_Container, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Worms_Container, Condition(function Trig_Worms_Container_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Worms_Container, function Trig_Worms_Container_Actions)
endfunction
