    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Understrike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "creepthunderclap")
endfunction

function InitTrig_Understrike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Understrike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Understrike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Understrike, Condition(function Trig_Understrike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Understrike, function Trig_Understrike_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tricking
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tricking_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tricking_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[57]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(0.30, true, udg_l[57], 300.00, 300.00, 500.00, 0.30, 100.00)
    set udg_l[58]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_l[57], 300.00, 300.00))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08C', GetTriggerUnit()), 'n01R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[58], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[57])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[58])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tricking takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tricking=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Tricking, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Tricking, Condition(function Trig_Tricking_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tricking, function Trig_Tricking_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SlamStart
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SlamStart_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SlamStart_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_SlamStart_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SlamStart_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SlamStart_Func004Func001C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit(), udg_indexId)
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_kbDt[udg_indexId]=10
        set udg_kbDx[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * CosBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * SinBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_SlamStart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_SlamStart_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_slamKnockbackGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_SlamStart_Func004A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SlamStart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SlamStart=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SlamStart, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SlamStart, Condition(function Trig_SlamStart_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SlamStart, function Trig_SlamStart_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stone
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stone_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Stone_Func004Func001C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit(), udg_indexId)
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_kbDt[udg_indexId]=10
        set udg_kbDx[udg_indexId]=( 32.00 * CosBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_indexId]=( 32.00 * SinBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_Stone_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_slamKnockbackGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_Stone_Func004A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stone takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stone=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Stone, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Stone, Condition(function Trig_Stone_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stone, function Trig_Stone_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SlamLoop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SlamLoop_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_kbDt[udg_ti] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SlamLoop_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ti=GetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_SlamLoop_Func001Func002C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_slamKnockbackGroup)
    else
        set udg_kbDt[udg_ti]=( udg_kbDt[udg_ti] - 1 )
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], udg_kbDx[udg_ti], udg_kbDy[udg_ti])
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        set udg_kbDx[udg_ti]=( udg_kbDx[udg_ti] * 0.93 )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_ti]=( udg_kbDy[udg_ti] * 0.93 )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_SlamLoop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_slamKnockbackGroup, function Trig_SlamLoop_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SlamLoop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SlamLoop=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_SlamLoop, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SlamLoop, function Trig_SlamLoop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spell Task
//
// олололо можно перенсти в папку data
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spell_Task_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TaskMaster[1]='A06Q'
    set udg_TaskMaster[2]='A0IF'
    set udg_TaskMaster[3]='A008'
    set udg_TaskMaster[4]='A08C'
    set udg_TaskMaster[5]='A08G'
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spell_Task takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spell_Task=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spell_Task, function Trig_Spell_Task_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DarkTrollAxesCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DarkTrollAxesCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ndtw' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DarkTrollAxesCast_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DarkTrollAxesCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_DarkTrollAxesCast_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_l[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[1], GetRandomReal(0.00, 80.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "clusterrockets", udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DarkTrollAxesCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DarkTrollAxesCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DarkTrollAxesCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DarkTrollAxesCast, Condition(function Trig_DarkTrollAxesCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DarkTrollAxesCast, function Trig_DarkTrollAxesCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GF' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DarkFogSummon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03M', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[59], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "silence", udg_l[59])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[59])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TrapEnsnare
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TrapEnsnare_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n025' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TrapEnsnare_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 90.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TrapEnsnare_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_TrapEnsnare_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_l[60]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(512, udg_l[60])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[60])
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "ensnare", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ug))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TrapEnsnare takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TrapEnsnare=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TrapEnsnare, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TrapEnsnare, Condition(function Trig_TrapEnsnare_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TrapEnsnare, function Trig_TrapEnsnare_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TrapTaunt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TrapTaunt_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n025' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TrapTaunt_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 70.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TrapTaunt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_TrapTaunt_Func004C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "taunt")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TrapTaunt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TrapTaunt=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TrapTaunt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TrapTaunt, Condition(function Trig_TrapTaunt_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TrapTaunt, function Trig_TrapTaunt_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WindWalkGogogo
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WindWalkGogogo_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A009' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WindWalkGogogo_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_WindWalkGogogo_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('Bfae', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_WindWalkGogogo_Func003002003))
    set udg_u=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ug)
    set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_u)
    set udg_l[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[1], GetRandomReal(- 900.00, - 600.00), GetUnitFacing(udg_u))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WindWalkGogogo takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WindWalkGogogo=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_WindWalkGogogo, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_WindWalkGogogo, Condition(function Trig_WindWalkGogogo_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_WindWalkGogogo, function Trig_WindWalkGogogo_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spell Dark Troll
//
// олололо можно перенсти в папку data
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spell_Dark_Troll_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DarkTrollSpell[1]='A0GF'
    set udg_DarkTrollSpell[2]='A06Y'
    set udg_DarkTrollSpell[3]='A00A'
    set udg_DarkTrollSpell[4]='A08I'
    set udg_DarkTrollSpell[5]='A08L'
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spell_Dark_Troll takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spell_Dark_Troll=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spell_Dark_Troll, function Trig_Spell_Dark_Troll_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BehemothWaveCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BehemothWaveCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nsgb' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehemothWaveCast_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 10.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehemothWaveCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_BehemothWaveCast_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "carrionswarm", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BehemothWaveCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BehemothWaveCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BehemothWaveCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BehemothWaveCast, Condition(function Trig_BehemothWaveCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BehemothWaveCast, function Trig_BehemothWaveCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WaveStart
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WaveStart_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WaveStart_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_WaveStart_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[3]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_l[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[3], 300.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[3]))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
endfunction

function Trig_WaveStart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_l[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 275.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1]))
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(275.00, udg_l[2], Condition(function Trig_WaveStart_Func004002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_WaveStart_Func005A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WaveStart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WaveStart=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_WaveStart, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_WaveStart, Condition(function Trig_WaveStart_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_WaveStart, function Trig_WaveStart_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Water Power
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Water_Power_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Power_Func003Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "attackground", udg_Waterpoint[2])
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Power_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Waterpoint[1]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_Waterpoint[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Waterpoint[1], 600.00, I2R(( 30 * 6 )))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Waterpoint[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(8.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[3])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_ug=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'h01L')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_Water_Power_Func003Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Water_Power takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Water_Power=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Water_Power, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Water_Power, Condition(function Trig_Water_Power_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Water_Power, function Trig_Water_Power_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BehemoticsCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BehemoticsCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nsgb' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehemoticsCast_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehemoticsCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_BehemoticsCast_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[3]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 60.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "silence", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BehemoticsCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BehemoticsCast=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_BehemoticsCast)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BehemoticsCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BehemoticsCast, Condition(function Trig_BehemoticsCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BehemoticsCast, function Trig_BehemoticsCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Behemotics
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Behemotics_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AI' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Behemotics_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Behemotics_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Behemotics_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Behemotics_Func005Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02C', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Behemotics_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(1.00, true, udg_l[0], 150.00, 500.00, 150.00, 0.50, 200.00)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_Behemotics_Func003002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_BehemoticsGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_Behemotics_Func005A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Behemotics takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Behemotics=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Behemotics)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Behemotics, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Behemotics, Condition(function Trig_Behemotics_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Behemotics, function Trig_Behemotics_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spell Behemoth
//
// олололо можно перенсти в папку data
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spell_Behemoth_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BehemothSpell[1]='A06S'
    set udg_BehemothSpell[2]='A084'
    set udg_BehemothSpell[3]='A08P'
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spell_Behemoth takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spell_Behemoth=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spell_Behemoth, function Trig_Spell_Behemoth_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BroodMoreVenom
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BroodMoreVenom_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nsbm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroodMoreVenom_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) )
endfunction

function Trig_BroodMoreVenom_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(160.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_BroodMoreVenom_Func003002003))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_l[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ug))
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BroodMoreVenom takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BroodMoreVenom=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BroodMoreVenom, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BroodMoreVenom, Condition(function Trig_BroodMoreVenom_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BroodMoreVenom, function Trig_BroodMoreVenom_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BroodLeap
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BroodLeap_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nsbm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroodLeap_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r >= 84.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroodLeap_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 19.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroodLeap_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_BroodLeap_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "shockwave", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
        if ( Trig_BroodLeap_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "creepthunderclap")
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BroodLeap takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BroodLeap=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BroodLeap, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BroodLeap, Condition(function Trig_BroodLeap_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BroodLeap, function Trig_BroodLeap_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BroodLeapStart
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BroodLeapStart_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroodLeapStart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitPathing(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_leapGroup)
    set udg_i=GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_kbDz[udg_i]=40.00
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 15.00, 1000.00)
    set udg_kbDx[udg_i]=( 40.00 * CosBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
    set udg_kbDy[udg_i]=( 40.00 * SinBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BroodLeapStart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BroodLeapStart=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BroodLeapStart, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BroodLeapStart, Condition(function Trig_BroodLeapStart_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BroodLeapStart, function Trig_BroodLeapStart_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BroodLeapLoop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BroodLeapLoop_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_kbDz[udg_ti] < - 15.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroodLeapLoop_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ti=GetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_BroodLeapLoop_Func001Func002C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_leapGroup)
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 0.00, 1000.00)
        call SetUnitPathing(GetEnumUnit(), true)
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetEnumUnit(), false)
    else
        set udg_kbDz[udg_ti]=( udg_kbDz[udg_ti] - 6.00 )
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( udg_kbDz[udg_ti] + GetUnitFlyHeight(GetEnumUnit()) ), 1000.00)
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], udg_kbDx[udg_ti], udg_kbDy[udg_ti])
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        set udg_kbDx[udg_ti]=( udg_kbDx[udg_ti] * 0.97 )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_ti]=( udg_kbDy[udg_ti] * 0.97 )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_BroodLeapLoop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_leapGroup, function Trig_BroodLeapLoop_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BroodLeapLoop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BroodLeapLoop=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_BroodLeapLoop, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BroodLeapLoop, function Trig_BroodLeapLoop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BroodSpawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BroodSpawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroodSpawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "creepthunderclap")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BroodSpawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BroodSpawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BroodSpawn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BroodSpawn, Condition(function Trig_BroodSpawn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BroodSpawn, function Trig_BroodSpawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BroodEggHatch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BroodEggHatch_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BroodEggHatch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call KillUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nssp', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(40.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================

endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_WebCast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WebCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_WebCast_Func003C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "ensnare", GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( Trig_SpiderrRain_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Waterpoint[5]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blizzard", udg_Waterpoint[5])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[5])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SpiderRainSpawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SpiderRainSpawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0CS' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SpiderRainSpawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=30
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n030', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_l[0], 600.00, 600.00)), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(30.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SpiderRainSpawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SpiderRainSpawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SpiderRainSpawn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SpiderRainSpawn, Condition(function Trig_SpiderRainSpawn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SpiderRainSpawn, function Trig_SpiderRainSpawn_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'nsbm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( udg_r <= 2.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    set udg_Waterpoint[6]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nsgn', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), udg_Waterpoint[6], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[6])
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_BadTripCast_Func006C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "avatar")
    else
    endif
endfunction

// Trigger: SpidersSwarm
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nsbm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_r <= 45.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SpidersSwarm_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_SpidersSwarm_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Waterpoint[7]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "locustswarm")
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Waterpoint[7], "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaBlood\\NagaBloodWindserpent.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[7])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: OdinSuicideBuildersCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_OdinSuicideBuildersCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OdinSuicideBuildersCast_Func002Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "wateryminion")
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_OdinSuicideBuildersCast_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OdinSuicideBuildersCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_OdinSuicideBuildersCast_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Waterpoint[8]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "wateryminion")
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_Waterpoint[8])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[8])
        set udg_ug=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'hpea')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_OdinSuicideBuildersCast_Func002Func006A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_OdinSuicideBuildersCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_OdinSuicideBuildersCast=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_OdinSuicideBuildersCast)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_OdinSuicideBuildersCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_OdinSuicideBuildersCast, Condition(function Trig_OdinSuicideBuildersCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_OdinSuicideBuildersCast, function Trig_OdinSuicideBuildersCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CannonerCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CannonerCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0HR', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CannonerCast_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 10.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CannonerCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_CannonerCast_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_l[8]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u014', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_l[8], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[8])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CannonerCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CannonerCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_CannonerCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_CannonerCast, Condition(function Trig_CannonerCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CannonerCast, function Trig_CannonerCast_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientDragonLord_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_AncientDragonLord_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Waterpoint[9]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "forkedlightning", GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_Waterpoint[9])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[9])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AncientDragonLordFirework
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AncientDragonLordFirework_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) >= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientDragonLordFirework_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientDragonLordFirework_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_AncientDragonLordFirework_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Waterpoint[9]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "shockwave", GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_Waterpoint[9])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[9])
    else
    endif
endfunction

    else

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AncientDragonLordFlyCast, Condition(function Trig_AncientDragonLordFlyCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AncientDragonLordFlyCast, function Trig_AncientDragonLordFlyCast_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AncientDragonLordFly
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AncientDragonLordFly_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AR' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientDragonLordFly_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPointBlightedBJ(udg_l[17]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_sV[1], udg_l[17]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_sV[2], udg_l[17]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_sV[3], udg_l[17]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_sV[4], udg_l[17]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_sV[5], udg_l[17]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_sV[6], udg_l[17]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientDragonLordFly_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[17]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_x=GetRandomReal(0, 2.00)
    set udg_l[18]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[17], ( - 450.00 + ( udg_x * 450.00 ) ), - 700.00)
    if ( Trig_AncientDragonLordFly_Func004C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.30)
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "Dissipate")
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "blink", udg_l[17])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "attack", udg_l[17])
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[17])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[18])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AncientDragonLordFly takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AncientDragonLordFly=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AncientDragonLordFly, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AncientDragonLordFly, Condition(function Trig_AncientDragonLordFly_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AncientDragonLordFly, function Trig_AncientDragonLordFly_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[20])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[20])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WrathCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WrathCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WrathCast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 70.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WrathCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_WrathCast_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_l[19]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "wateryminion")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[19])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[19])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WrathCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WrathCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_WrathCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_WrathCast, Condition(function Trig_WrathCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_WrathCast, function Trig_WrathCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wrath
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wrath_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wrath_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_l[17]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[18]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_l[17], 1100.00, 1100.00))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n024', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[18], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(30.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(1.00, true, udg_l[17], 600.00, 600.00, 25.00, 0.30, 300.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[17])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[18])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wrath takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wrath=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wrath, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wrath, Condition(function Trig_Wrath_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wrath, function Trig_Wrath_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BaddiestTrip
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BaddiestTrip_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BaddiestTrip_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 45.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BaddiestTrip_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_BaddiestTrip_Func002C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "metamorphosis")
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\DarkOrb.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5301")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BaddiestTrip takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BaddiestTrip=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_BaddiestTrip)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BaddiestTrip, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BaddiestTrip, Condition(function Trig_BaddiestTrip_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BaddiestTrip, function Trig_BaddiestTrip_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragon ritual of burning
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragon_ritual_of_burning_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A048' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_ritual_of_burning_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Waterpoint[12]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Dragons=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Dragons > 5
        set udg_Waterpoint[11]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_Waterpoint[12], 600.00, 600.00))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nbwm', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Waterpoint[11], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_AirStrikeCopters[udg_Dragons]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[11])
        set udg_Dragons=udg_Dragons + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragon_ritual_of_burning takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragon_ritual_of_burning=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dragon_ritual_of_burning, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dragon_ritual_of_burning, Condition(function Trig_Dragon_ritual_of_burning_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragon_ritual_of_burning, function Trig_Dragon_ritual_of_burning_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FireLand
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FireLand_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A083' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FireLand_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[71]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_l[70]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[71], 900.00, 0)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[70], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(12.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "volcano", udg_l[70])
    set udg_l[70]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[71], - 900.00, 0)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[70], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(12.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "volcano", udg_l[70])
    set udg_l[70]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[71], 450.00, - 850.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[70], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(12.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "volcano", udg_l[70])
    set udg_l[70]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[71], - 450.00, - 850.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[70], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(12.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "volcano", udg_l[70])
    set udg_l[70]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[71], 450.00, 850.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[70], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(12.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "volcano", udg_l[70])
    set udg_l[70]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[71], - 450.00, 850.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[70], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(12.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "volcano", udg_l[70])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[70])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[71])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FireLand takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FireLand=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_FireLand, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_FireLand, Condition(function Trig_FireLand_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FireLand, function Trig_FireLand_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spell Dragon Lord
//
// олололо можно перенсти в папку data
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spell_Dragon_Lord_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_AncientDragon[1]='A048'
    set udg_AncientDragon[2]='A083'
    set udg_AncientDragon[3]='A08D'
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Spell_Dragon_Lord=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spell_Dragon_Lord, function Trig_Spell_Dragon_Lord_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WhisperOfTheOldGod
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WhisperOfTheOldGod_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'edes' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLevel(GetAttacker()) <= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WhisperOfTheOldGod_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[5]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(600.00, udg_l[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("head", GetAttacker(), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\FaerieDragonInvis\\FaerieDragon_Invis.mdl")
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ug))
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetAttacker(), 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[5])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WhisperOfTheOldGod takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WhisperOfTheOldGod=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_WhisperOfTheOldGod, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_WhisperOfTheOldGod, Condition(function Trig_WhisperOfTheOldGod_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_WhisperOfTheOldGod, function Trig_WhisperOfTheOldGod_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'edes' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SummonTentaleCast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 32.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SummonTentaleCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_SummonTentaleCast_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Waterpoint[15]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "thunderclap")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "attack", udg_Waterpoint[15])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[15])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SummonedTentacle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SummonedTentacle_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FW' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SummonedTentacle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Waterpoint[1]=OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), - 600.00, - 600.00)
    set udg_Waterpoint[2]=OffsetLocation(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), 600.00, - 600.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01S', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_Waterpoint[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01S', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_Waterpoint[2], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TsunamiCast
//
// damage 5000
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TsunamiCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'edes' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TsunamiCast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TsunamiCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_TsunamiCast_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Waterpoint[5]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_Waterpoint[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_Waterpoint[5], 0.00, - 600.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "stampede", udg_Waterpoint[4])
        call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_Waterpoint[5])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[5])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GeuserSplash
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GeuserSplash_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FY' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GeuserSplash_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[9]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[9], "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "stomp")
endfunction

function Trig_GeuserSplash_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[7]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_l[8]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_l[7], 900.00, 900.00))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03K', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[8], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[8])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('n03K')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_GeuserSplash_Func004A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[9])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GeuserSplash takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GeuserSplash=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GeuserSplash, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GeuserSplash, Condition(function Trig_GeuserSplash_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GeuserSplash, function Trig_GeuserSplash_Actions)
endfunction

    endif
    return true

    set udg_l[26]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())

    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.20, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "shockwave", udg_l[26])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[25])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[26])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TentackleHurt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TentackleHurt_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'ndqs' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TentackleHurt_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_l[6])
endfunction

function Trig_TentackleHurt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[6]=GetRectCenter(udg_creepRegion[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 6 )])
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(udg_visionRegion[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 6 )], GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_TentackleHurt_Func003A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[6])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TentackleHurt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TentackleHurt=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TentackleHurt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TentackleHurt, Condition(function Trig_TentackleHurt_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TentackleHurt, function Trig_TentackleHurt_Actions)
endfunction

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ChaosWalkCast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 35.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ChaosWalkCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_ChaosWalkCast_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 1200.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        set udg_l[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(1.00, true, udg_l[0], 1000.00, 1000.00, 150.00, 1.00, 210.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "blink", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ChaosWalkCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ChaosWalkCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_ChaosWalkCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ChaosWalkCast, Condition(function Trig_ChaosWalkCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ChaosWalkCast, function Trig_ChaosWalkCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HellRage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HellRage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'n014' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) <= 42.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HellRage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Sarg=GetAttackedUnitBJ()
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IJ', GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "immolation")
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "stand channel")
    set udg_l[32]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    set udg_HighFireWall=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_HighFireWall > 13
        set udg_HighFireWall=udg_HighFireWall + 1
    endloop
    set udg_HighFireWall=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_HighFireWall > 13
        set udg_Waterpoint[12]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[32], ( 3.00 * 120.00 ), I2R(( 30 * udg_HighFireWall )))
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n049', Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_Waterpoint[12], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(4.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "immolation")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Waterpoint[12])
        set udg_HighFireWall=udg_HighFireWall + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[32])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_HellRageEnd)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HellRage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HellRage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_HellRage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_HellRage, Condition(function Trig_HellRage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HellRage, function Trig_HellRage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HellRageEnd
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HellRageEnd_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Sarg, "Spell Slam")
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0IJ', udg_Sarg)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IL', udg_Sarg)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Sarg)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HellRageEnd takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HellRageEnd=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HellRageEnd, function Trig_HellRageEnd_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Exterminaton Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Func005Func001C() ) then
        set udg_indexId=( udg_indexId + 1 )
        call SetUnitUserData(GetEnumUnit(), udg_indexId)
        set udg_l[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_kbDt[udg_indexId]=30
        set udg_kbDx[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * CosBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        set udg_kbDy[udg_indexId]=( 35.00 * SinBJ(AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[1])) )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(3.00, true, udg_l[0], 3000.00, 3000.00, 300.00, 1.00, 270.00)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Func003002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_slamKnockbackGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Func005A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Exterminaton_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Exterminaton_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Exterminaton_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Exterminaton_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Exterminaton_Strike, function Trig_Exterminaton_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: GreatRift
//===========================================================================
function Trig_GreatRift_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A071' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_GreatRift_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[7]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_l[7], 600.00, 70.00)
    call CameraSetTargetNoiseForPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer(), 100.00, 0.50)
    call TriggerSleepAction(8.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_GreatRift takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_GreatRift=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_GreatRift, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_GreatRift, Condition(function Trig_GreatRift_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_GreatRift, function Trig_GreatRift_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DarkPortal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DarkPortal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DarkPortal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[3]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01Y', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], - 500.00, 200.00), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01X', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), OffsetLocation(udg_l[3], 500.00, 200.00), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_DarkPortal=CreateTrigger()

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BlackHole
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BlackHole_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BlackHole_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[5]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call TerrainDeformationCraterBJ(0.5, true, udg_l[5], 450.00, 150.00)
    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(udg_l[5], 'Gdkr', - 1, 5, 0)
    call CameraSetTargetNoiseForPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer(), 100.00, 0.50)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[5])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
