        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DarkGift_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DarkGift_Func004Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_DarkGift_Func004Func001Func050C() ) then
            set udg_l[25]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[25], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkCaster.mdl")
            call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), false)
            call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'nfov', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), 3000.00)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[25])
        else
            if ( Trig_DarkGift_Func004Func001Func050Func008C() ) then
                set udg_l[25]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[25], "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIam\\AIamTarget.mdl")
                call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), false)
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'nchg', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
                call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), 3000.00)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[25])
            else
                if ( Trig_DarkGift_Func004Func001Func050Func008Func008C() ) then
                    set udg_l[25]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[25], "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UndeadDissipate\\UndeadDissipate.mdl")
                    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), false)
                    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
                    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[25])
                else
                    if ( Trig_DarkGift_Func004Func001Func050Func008Func008Func007C() ) then
                        set udg_l[25]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[25], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
                        call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), false)
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'nsth', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
                        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), 3000.00)
                        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[25])
                    else
                        if ( Trig_DarkGift_Func004Func001Func050Func008Func008Func007Func008C() ) then
                            set udg_l[25]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[25], "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Doom\\DoomDeath.mdl")
                            call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
                            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[25])
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DarkGift_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[5]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(625.00, udg_l[5], Condition(function Trig_DarkGift_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_DarkGiftGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_DarkGift_Func004A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[5])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DarkGift takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DarkGift=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DarkGift, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DarkGift, Condition(function Trig_DarkGift_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DarkGift, function Trig_DarkGift_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AncientFear
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AncientFear_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0F5' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientFear_Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_AncientFear_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_HeroUnits) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'o01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientFear_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AncientFear_Func006Func001C() ) then
    else
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fear_loop)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_AncientFear_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[31]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n048', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[31], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(60.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "immolation")
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_l[31], Condition(function Trig_AncientFear_Func005002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_AncientFear_Func006A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[31])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AncientFear takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AncientFear=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AncientFear, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AncientFear, Condition(function Trig_AncientFear_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AncientFear, function Trig_AncientFear_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AncientFearGolems
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AncientFearGolems_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0F5' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientFearGolems_Func001Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) < 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientFearGolems_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) < 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) > 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientFearGolems_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) < 90.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) > 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AncientFearGolems_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AncientFearGolems_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(2, 3)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_l[0]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), 1200.00, 1200.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03F', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "dreadlordinferno", udg_l[0])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        if ( Trig_AncientFearGolems_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 5)
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                set udg_l[0]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 1200.00, 1200.00))
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03F', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "dreadlordinferno", udg_l[0])
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
            if ( Trig_AncientFearGolems_Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(4, 8)
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    set udg_l[0]=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 1200.00, 1200.00))
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03F', GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "dreadlordinferno", udg_l[0])
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AncientFearGolems takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AncientFearGolems=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AncientFearGolems, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AncientFearGolems, Condition(function Trig_AncientFearGolems_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AncientFearGolems, function Trig_AncientFearGolems_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fear loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fear_loop_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Fear_loop_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_HeroUnits) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fear_loop_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Fear_loop_Func003Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    else
        set udg_l[3]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_l[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[3], 800.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[0], udg_l[3]))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "move", udg_l[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Fear_loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_Fear_loop_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_Fear_loop_Func003A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fear_loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fear_loop=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fear_loop, function Trig_Fear_loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PortalBurst
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PortalBurst_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'n02B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PortalBurst_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) >= 110000.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PortalBurst_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MarkOfChaos\\MarkOfChaosTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_PortalBurst_Func002Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 100000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 1000.00)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_PortalBurst_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('n014')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_PortalBurst_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PortalBurst takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PortalBurst=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_PortalBurst, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_PortalBurst, Condition(function Trig_PortalBurst_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PortalBurst, function Trig_PortalBurst_Actions)
endfunction

//
// олололо можно перенсти в папку data

    set udg_SargerasSpell[1]='A07Q'
    set udg_SargerasSpell[2]='A07T'
    set udg_SargerasSpell[3]='A0E4'
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Sargeras_Spell=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sargeras_Spell, function Trig_Sargeras_Spell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ArchimondFrozenTrap
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ArchimondFrozenTrap_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n013' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ArchimondFrozenTrap_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 22.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ArchimondFrozenTrap_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_ArchimondFrozenTrap_Func002C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "stomp")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ArchimondFrozenTrap takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ArchimondFrozenTrap=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_ArchimondFrozenTrap, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ArchimondFrozenTrap, Condition(function Trig_ArchimondFrozenTrap_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ArchimondFrozenTrap, function Trig_ArchimondFrozenTrap_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FrozenTrapTeleport
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0DY' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Func011002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Func013Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Func013Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_l[0])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], - 900.00, GetUnitFacing(GetSpellAbilityUnit()))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.30)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), udg_l[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "flamestrike", udg_l[0])
    call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(6.00, true, udg_l[0], 130.00, 1200.00, - 170.00, 1.00, 210.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.50)
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Func011002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_FrostBurstGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Func013A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "attack", udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FrozenTrapTeleport takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FrozenTrapTeleport=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_FrozenTrapTeleport, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_FrozenTrapTeleport, Condition(function Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FrozenTrapTeleport, function Trig_FrozenTrapTeleport_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MannorothPoisonCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MannorothPoisonCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'n011' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MannorothPoisonCast_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MannorothPoisonCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
    if ( Trig_MannorothPoisonCast_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 450.00, GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "flamestrike", udg_l[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "attack", udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MannorothPoisonCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MannorothPoisonCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MannorothPoisonCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MannorothPoisonCast, Condition(function Trig_MannorothPoisonCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MannorothPoisonCast, function Trig_MannorothPoisonCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: OMFGEnd
//===========================================================================
function Trig_OMFGEnd_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nsgh' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nsgb' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'nsbm' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetDyingUnit()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_OMFGEnd_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_OMFGEnd_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OMFGEnd_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ipOMG=( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 6 )
    set udg_modeDuelFrequency=100
    set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=100
    set udg_PlayerIsAtNozdormu[udg_ipOMG]=true
    set udg_NeedSecretBoss=true
    set udg_playerBattleChecker[udg_ipOMG]=40
    set udg_spawnRegion[udg_ipOMG]=udg_NozdormuRegion[udg_ipOMG]
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_OMFGEnd takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_OMFGEnd=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_OMFGEnd)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_OMFGEnd, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_OMFGEnd, Condition(function Trig_OMFGEnd_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_OMFGEnd, function Trig_OMFGEnd_Actions)
endfunction

    else
    endif
