//===========================================================================
// Trigger: OMFG
//===========================================================================
function Trig_OMFG_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OMFG_Func001Func002Func026A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ipOMG=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipOMG), udg_AntiBossTeam)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(( udg_ipOMG + 6 )), udg_AntiBossTeam)
endfunction

function Trig_OMFG_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer) >= 1.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OMFG_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[1] > 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OMFG_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_OMFG_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_OMFG_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2517")
            set udg_modeDuelFrequency=100
            set udg_modeMassDuelFrequency=100
            set udg_modeExtinctionFrequency=100
            set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(0))]=40
            set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(1))]=40
            set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(2))]=40
            set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(3))]=40
            set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(4))]=40
            set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(5))]=40
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 15, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhar', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhra', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhme', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhpt', 15, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM))
            call SetTimeOfDay(24.00)
            call UseTimeOfDayBJ(false)
            call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_OMFG_Func001Func002Func026A)
            call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_AntiBossTeam, udg_AntiBossTeam, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_OMGTide)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Nozdormu)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_OMFGEnd)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_NozdormuEnd)
        else
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2511")
        endif
    else
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2522")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_OMFG takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_OMFG=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_OMFG, Player(0), "-ahm", true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_OMFG, Condition(function Trig_OMFG_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_OMFG, function Trig_OMFG_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CM Loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CM_Loop_Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DefendersDragons < 12 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CM_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BasePoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis)
    set udg_DefendersDragons=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 12
        set udg_InitialPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons])
        set udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_BasePoint, udg_InitialPoint)
        set udg_EndPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 600.00, ( udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy + 5.25 ))
        call SetUnitX(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationX(udg_EndPoint))
        call SetUnitY(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationY(udg_EndPoint))
        if ( Trig_CM_Loop_Func002Func006C() ) then
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons + 1 )])))
        else
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons - 11 )])))
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_EndPoint)
        set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_BasePoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CM_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CM_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_CM_Loop, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CM_Loop, function Trig_CM_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CM Loop2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CM_Loop2_Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DefendersDragons < 12 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CM_Loop2_Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DefendersDragons < 31 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CM_Loop2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BasePoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis)
    set udg_DefendersDragons=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 12
        set udg_InitialPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons])
        set udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_BasePoint, udg_InitialPoint)
        set udg_EndPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 500.00, ( udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy + 5.25 ))
        call SetUnitX(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationX(udg_EndPoint))
        call SetUnitY(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationY(udg_EndPoint))
        if ( Trig_CM_Loop2_Func002Func006C() ) then
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons + 1 )])))
        else
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons - 11 )])))
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_EndPoint)
        set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
    endloop
    set udg_DefendersDragons=14
    loop
        exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 31
        set udg_InitialPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons])
        set udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_BasePoint, udg_InitialPoint)
        set udg_EndPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 750.00, ( udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy - 5.25 ))
        call SetUnitX(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationX(udg_EndPoint))
        call SetUnitY(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationY(udg_EndPoint))
        if ( Trig_CM_Loop2_Func003Func006C() ) then
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons + 1 )])))
        else
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons - 17 )])))
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_EndPoint)
        set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_BasePoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CM_Loop2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CM_Loop2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop2)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_CM_Loop2, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CM_Loop2, function Trig_CM_Loop2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CM Loop3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CM_Loop3_Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DefendersDragons < 12 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CM_Loop3_Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DefendersDragons < 31 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CM_Loop3_Func004Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DefendersDragons < 57 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CM_Loop3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BasePoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis)
    set udg_DefendersDragons=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 12
        set udg_InitialPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons])
        set udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_BasePoint, udg_InitialPoint)
        set udg_EndPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 500.00, ( udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy + 5.25 ))
        call SetUnitX(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationX(udg_EndPoint))
        call SetUnitY(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationY(udg_EndPoint))
        if ( Trig_CM_Loop3_Func002Func006C() ) then
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons + 1 )])))
        else
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons - 11 )])))
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_EndPoint)
        set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
    endloop
    set udg_DefendersDragons=14
    loop
        exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 31
        set udg_InitialPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons])
        set udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_BasePoint, udg_InitialPoint)
        set udg_EndPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 750.00, ( udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy - 5.25 ))
        call SetUnitX(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationX(udg_EndPoint))
        call SetUnitY(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationY(udg_EndPoint))
        if ( Trig_CM_Loop3_Func003Func006C() ) then
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons + 1 )])))
        else
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons - 17 )])))
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_EndPoint)
        set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
    endloop
    set udg_DefendersDragons=33
    loop
        exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 57
        set udg_InitialPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons])
        set udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_BasePoint, udg_InitialPoint)
        set udg_EndPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 1000.00, ( udg_AngleBetweenCasterToDummy + 5.25 ))
        call SetUnitX(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationX(udg_EndPoint))
        call SetUnitY(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], GetLocationY(udg_EndPoint))
        if ( Trig_CM_Loop3_Func004Func006C() ) then
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons + 1 )])))
        else
            call SetUnitFacing(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], AngleBetweenPoints(GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]), GetUnitLoc(udg_Dummy[( udg_DefendersDragons - 24 )])))
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_EndPoint)
        set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_BasePoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CM_Loop3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CM_Loop3=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop3)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_CM_Loop3, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CM_Loop3, function Trig_CM_Loop3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CM End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CM_End_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDyingUnit() == udg_DummyBasis ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CM_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop2)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop3)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CM_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CM_End=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_End)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_CM_End, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_CM_End, Condition(function Trig_CM_End_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CM_End, function Trig_CM_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: RaceSpellUnlock
//
// захват контроля
//===========================================================================
function Trig_RaceSpellUnlock_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RaceSpellUnlock_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_RaceSpellUnlock_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('Rhss', 1, GetEnumPlayer())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_RaceSpellUnlock_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_RaceSpellUnlock_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_RaceSpellUnlock takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_RaceSpellUnlock=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RaceSpellUnlock, function Trig_RaceSpellUnlock_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KnightingCeremony
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0DB' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func002Func001Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetSpellAbilityUnit()) >= 8.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'h001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func003Func001Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetSpellAbilityUnit()) >= 3.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'h004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func004Func001Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetSpellAbilityUnit()) >= 2.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'h016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func005Func001Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetSpellAbilityUnit()) >= 5.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'n002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func006Func001Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'n009' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'h001' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'h004' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'h016' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'n002' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'n009' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func007C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()))
    if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                set udg_l[61]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call SetUnitManaBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetSpellAbilityUnit()) - 8.00 ))
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[61], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'h006', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[61])
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ip])
                set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func002Func001Func011A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
            else
                call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6679")
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func003C() ) then
            if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                set udg_l[61]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call SetUnitManaBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetSpellAbilityUnit()) - 3.00 ))
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[61], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'h006', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[61])
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ip])
                set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func003Func001Func011A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
            else
                call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6680")
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func004C() ) then
            if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
                set udg_l[61]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call SetUnitManaBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetSpellAbilityUnit()) - 2.00 ))
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[61], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'h006', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[61])
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ip])
                set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func004Func001Func011A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
            else
                call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6681")
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func005C() ) then
            if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func005Func001C() ) then
                set udg_l[61]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call SetUnitManaBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetSpellAbilityUnit()) - 5.00 ))
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[61], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'h006', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[61])
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ip])
                set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func005Func001Func011A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
            else
                call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6683")
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func006C() ) then
            if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
                set udg_l[61]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[61], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'h006', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[61])
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ip])
                set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Func003Func006Func001Func009A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6673")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KnightingCeremony takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KnightingCeremony=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_KnightingCeremony, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_KnightingCeremony, Condition(function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KnightingCeremony, function Trig_KnightingCeremony_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DwarfMines
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DwarfMines_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0CY' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DwarfMines_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set udg_i2=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(( udg_i2 * 2 ), ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(( udg_i2 * 2 )) + " gold|r from dwarf gold mine." ) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DwarfMines takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DwarfMines=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DwarfMines, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DwarfMines, Condition(function Trig_DwarfMines_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DwarfMines, function Trig_DwarfMines_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ElfForestTanquility
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0CZ' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] )
endfunction

function Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_ug) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Func003C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Units\\NightElf\\Owl\\Owl.mdl")
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02E', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(13.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "tranquility")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 3.00 ))
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6566")
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ElfForestTanquility takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ElfForestTanquility=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_ElfForestTanquility, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ElfForestTanquility, Condition(function Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ElfForestTanquility, function Trig_ElfForestTanquility_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HighElfFireWall
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HighElfFireWall_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0D4' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HighElfFireWall_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_roundTimer) >= 1.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HighElfFireWall_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_HighFireWall=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_HighFireWall > 13
        set udg_HighFireWallPoint[udg_HighFireWall]=PolarProjectionBJ(GetSpellTargetLoc(), ( 3.00 * 120.00 ), I2R(( 30 * udg_HighFireWall )))
        set udg_HighFireWall=udg_HighFireWall + 1
    endloop
    set udg_HighFireWall=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_HighFireWall > 13
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n037', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_HighFireWallPoint[( ( udg_HighFireWall - 1 ) * ( ( 4 - 3 ) + 0 ) )], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set udg_HighFireWall=udg_HighFireWall + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_HighElfFireWall_Func004C() ) then
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 9.00 ))
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6643")
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HighElfFireWall takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HighElfFireWall=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_HighElfFireWall, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_HighElfFireWall, Condition(function Trig_HighElfFireWall_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HighElfFireWall, function Trig_HighElfFireWall_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DefendersDragonsRitual
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0DD' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func013Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func013Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 700.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func019Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func019Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 850.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func025Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func025A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func025Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 1000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] >= 21 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func013Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func013Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 700.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func019Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func019Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 850.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] <= 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func013Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func013Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 700.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    if ( Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(520.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func002002003))
        call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_DragonRitualGroup)
        set udg_DefendersDragons=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 12
            set udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[udg_DefendersDragons]=PolarProjectionBJ(GetSpellTargetLoc(), ( 3.00 * 120.00 ), I2R(( 30 * udg_DefendersDragons )))
            set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
        endloop
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u008', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_DummyBasis=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set udg_DefendersDragons=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 12
            set udg_BasePoint=udg_l[0]
            set udg_InitialPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 600.00, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nadr', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[( ( ( udg_DefendersDragons - 1 ) * ( 4 - 3 ) ) + ( ( 4 - 3 ) + 0 ) )], I2R(( 90 + ( udg_DefendersDragons * 30 ) )))
            set udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call UnitAddAbility(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], 'Aloc')
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_BasePoint)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
            call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 125.00)
            set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
        endloop
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), "war3mapImported\\Blue Lightning.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), 720.00, 720.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Monsoon\\MonsoonBoltTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(1.00, true, GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), 520.00, 700.00, 100.00, 0.50, 200.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func013A)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    else
        if ( Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(720.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func002002003))
            call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_DragonRitualGroup)
            set udg_DefendersDragons=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 12
                set udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[udg_DefendersDragons]=PolarProjectionBJ(GetSpellTargetLoc(), ( 3.00 * 120.00 ), I2R(( 30 * udg_DefendersDragons )))
                set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
            endloop
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u008', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
            set udg_DummyBasis=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            set udg_DefendersDragons=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 12
                set udg_BasePoint=udg_l[0]
                set udg_InitialPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 500.00, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nadr', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[( ( ( udg_DefendersDragons - 1 ) * ( 4 - 3 ) ) + ( ( 4 - 3 ) + 0 ) )], I2R(( 90 + ( udg_DefendersDragons * 30 ) )))
                set udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call UnitAddAbility(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], 'Aloc')
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_BasePoint)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
                call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 125.00)
                set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
            endloop
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), "war3mapImported\\Blue Lightning.mdx")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), 620.00, 620.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Monsoon\\MonsoonBoltTarget.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
            call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(1.00, true, GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), 620.00, 700.00, 100.00, 0.50, 200.00)
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func013A)
            set udg_DefendersDragons=14
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 31
                set udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[udg_DefendersDragons]=PolarProjectionBJ(GetSpellTargetLoc(), ( 3.00 * 180.00 ), I2R(( 30 * udg_DefendersDragons )))
                set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
            endloop
            set udg_DefendersDragons=14
            loop
                exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 31
                set udg_BasePoint=udg_l[0]
                set udg_InitialPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 750.00, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'ngrd', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[( ( ( udg_DefendersDragons - 1 ) * ( 4 - 3 ) ) + ( ( 4 - 3 ) + 0 ) )], I2R(( 90 + ( udg_DefendersDragons * 30 ) )))
                set udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call UnitAddAbility(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], 'Aloc')
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop2)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_BasePoint)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
                call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
                set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
            endloop
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Taunt\\TauntCaster.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=24
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), 900.00, 900.00)), "Environment\\UndeadBuildingFire\\UndeadSmallBuildingFire2.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func019A)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
        else
            if ( Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(920.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func002002003))
                call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_DragonRitualGroup)
                set udg_DefendersDragons=1
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 12
                    set udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[udg_DefendersDragons]=PolarProjectionBJ(GetSpellTargetLoc(), ( 3.00 * 120.00 ), I2R(( 30 * udg_DefendersDragons )))
                    set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
                endloop
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u008', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                set udg_DummyBasis=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                set udg_DefendersDragons=1
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 12
                    set udg_BasePoint=udg_l[0]
                    set udg_InitialPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 500.00, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nadr', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[( ( ( udg_DefendersDragons - 1 ) * ( 4 - 3 ) ) + ( ( 4 - 3 ) + 0 ) )], I2R(( 90 + ( udg_DefendersDragons * 30 ) )))
                    set udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    call UnitAddAbility(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], 'Aloc')
                    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_BasePoint)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
                    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 125.00)
                    set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
                endloop
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), "war3mapImported\\Blue Lightning.mdx")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), 620.00, 620.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Monsoon\\MonsoonBoltTarget.mdl")
                    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
                call TerrainDeformationRippleBJ(1.00, true, GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), 620.00, 700.00, 100.00, 0.50, 200.00)
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func013A)
                set udg_DefendersDragons=14
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 31
                    set udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[udg_DefendersDragons]=PolarProjectionBJ(GetSpellTargetLoc(), ( 3.00 * 180.00 ), I2R(( 30 * udg_DefendersDragons )))
                    set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
                endloop
                set udg_DefendersDragons=14
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 31
                    set udg_BasePoint=udg_l[0]
                    set udg_InitialPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 750.00, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'ngrd', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[( ( ( udg_DefendersDragons - 1 ) * ( 4 - 3 ) ) + ( ( 4 - 3 ) + 0 ) )], I2R(( 90 + ( udg_DefendersDragons * 30 ) )))
                    set udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    call UnitAddAbility(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], 'Aloc')
                    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop2)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_BasePoint)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
                    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
                    set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
                endloop
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=24
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), 900.00, 900.00)), "Environment\\UndeadBuildingFire\\UndeadSmallBuildingFire2.mdl")
                    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func019A)
                set udg_DefendersDragons=33
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 57
                    set udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[udg_DefendersDragons]=PolarProjectionBJ(GetSpellTargetLoc(), ( 3.00 * 180.00 ), I2R(( 30 * udg_DefendersDragons )))
                    set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
                endloop
                set udg_DefendersDragons=33
                loop
                    exitwhen udg_DefendersDragons > 57
                    set udg_BasePoint=udg_l[0]
                    set udg_InitialPoint=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_BasePoint, 1000.00, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nrwm', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_DefendersDragonsPoint[( ( ( udg_DefendersDragons - 1 ) * ( 4 - 3 ) ) + ( ( 4 - 3 ) + 0 ) )], I2R(( 90 + ( udg_DefendersDragons * 30 ) )))
                    set udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    call UnitAddAbility(udg_Dummy[udg_DefendersDragons], 'Aloc')
                    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_CM_Loop3)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_BasePoint)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_InitialPoint)
                    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 75.00)
                    set udg_DefendersDragons=udg_DefendersDragons + 1
                endloop
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Doom\\DoomDeath.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=36
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DummyBasis), 900.00, 900.00)), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Incinerate\\FireLordDeathExplode.mdl")
                    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Func002Func001Func001Func025A)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
                call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
            else
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DefendersDragonsRitual takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DefendersDragonsRitual=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DefendersDragonsRitual, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DefendersDragonsRitual, Condition(function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DefendersDragonsRitual, function Trig_DefendersDragonsRitual_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: OrksDarkPortal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_OrksDarkPortal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0D8' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OrksDarkPortal_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] >= 16 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OrksDarkPortal_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] <= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OrksDarkPortal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    if ( Trig_OrksDarkPortal_Func002C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_playerLevel[udg_ip]
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Doom\\DoomDeath.mdl")
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_OrksDrenorPortal[GetRandomInt(1, 3)], udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(30.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        if ( Trig_OrksDarkPortal_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] / 2 )
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Doom\\DoomDeath.mdl")
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_OrksDrenorPortal[GetRandomInt(4, 6)], udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(30.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_OrksDarkPortal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_OrksDarkPortal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_OrksDarkPortal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_OrksDarkPortal, Condition(function Trig_OrksDarkPortal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_OrksDarkPortal, function Trig_OrksDarkPortal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: TrollStoneSkin
//===========================================================================
function Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0D1' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] )
endfunction

function Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_ug) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n036', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(22.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 3.00 ))
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6595")
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TrollStoneSkin takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TrollStoneSkin=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_TrollStoneSkin, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_TrollStoneSkin, Condition(function Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TrollStoneSkin, function Trig_TrollStoneSkin_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: NerubianFear
//===========================================================================
function Trig_NerubianFear_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0DC' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NerubianFear_Func002Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] >= 21 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NerubianFear_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] <= 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NerubianFear_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NerubianFear_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    if ( Trig_NerubianFear_Func002C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] * 4 )
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nanc', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(24.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        if ( Trig_NerubianFear_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] * 2 )
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nanw', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(24.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
            if ( Trig_NerubianFear_Func002Func004Func001C() ) then
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] * 1 )
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nano', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
                    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(24.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_NerubianFear takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_NerubianFear=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_NerubianFear, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_NerubianFear, Condition(function Trig_NerubianFear_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_NerubianFear, function Trig_NerubianFear_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SkeletonUndeadBeast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0D3' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] )
endfunction

function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Func004Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CE_AOE[1]=( udg_CE_AOE[1] + GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_CE_AOE[1])
endfunction

function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_ug) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_UndeadBeast)
    if ( Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00V', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(24.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Func004Func004A)
    else
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 4.00 ))
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6625")
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
    set udg_CE_AOE[1]=0.00
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SkeletonUndeadBeast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SkeletonUndeadBeast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SkeletonUndeadBeast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SkeletonUndeadBeast, Condition(function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SkeletonUndeadBeast, function Trig_SkeletonUndeadBeast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DemonsFireRain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DemonsFireRain_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0D6' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DemonsFireRain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n038', udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], GetSpellTargetLoc(), GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "blizzard", GetSpellTargetLoc())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
