    set gg_trg_DemonsFireRain=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DemonsFireRain, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DemonsFireRain, Condition(function Trig_DemonsFireRain_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DemonsFireRain, function Trig_DemonsFireRain_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: NagaRaceSkill
//===========================================================================
function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0D9' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func002Func002Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 14.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'o00O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func003Func002Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 40.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'o00Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func004Func002Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'o00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func005Func002Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=( udg_playerValue[udg_ip] + GetUnitPointValue(GetEnumUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func005Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'o01C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'o00O' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'o00Q' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'o00P' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'o01C' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()))
    if ( Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func002C() ) then
            set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
            if ( Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\EntBirthTarget\\EntBirthTarget.mdl")
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'o00U', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ip])
                set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func002Func002Func007A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
            else
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\ResourceItems\\ResourceEffectTarget.mdl")
                call KillUnit(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func003C() ) then
            set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
            if ( Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func003Func002C() ) then
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\EntBirthTarget\\EntBirthTarget.mdl")
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'o00S', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ip])
                set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func003Func002Func010A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\ResourceItems\\ResourceEffectTarget.mdl")
                call KillUnit(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            else
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\ResourceItems\\ResourceEffectTarget.mdl")
                call KillUnit(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func004C() ) then
            set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
            if ( Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func004Func002C() ) then
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\EntBirthTarget\\EntBirthTarget.mdl")
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'o00U', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ip])
                set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func004Func002Func007A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
            else
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\ResourceItems\\ResourceEffectTarget.mdl")
                call KillUnit(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func005C() ) then
            set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
            if ( Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func005Func002C() ) then
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\EntBirthTarget\\EntBirthTarget.mdl")
                call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'o00T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_DEFAULTS)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), true)
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), udg_army[udg_ip])
                set udg_playerValue[udg_ip]=0
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ip], function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Func003Func005Func002Func010A)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unlock250Value)
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 4, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)) + "/" ) + I2S(GetPlayerState(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_CAP)) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 5, udg_boardPos[udg_ip], ( ( I2S(udg_playerValue[udg_ip]) + "/" ) + I2S(udg_playerValueResearch[udg_ip]) ))
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01H', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastReplacedUnitBJ())
            else
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\ResourceItems\\ResourceEffectTarget.mdl")
                call KillUnit(GetSpellTargetUnit())
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_6664")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_NagaRaceSkill takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_NagaRaceSkill=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_NagaRaceSkill, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_NagaRaceSkill, Condition(function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_NagaRaceSkill, function Trig_NagaRaceSkill_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: sbLightningBolt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_sbLightningBolt_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbLightningBolt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 500000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Weapons\\Bolt\\BoltImpact.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Monsoon\\MonsoonBoltTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_sbLightningBolt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_sbLightningBolt=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_sbLightningBolt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_sbLightningBolt, Condition(function Trig_sbLightningBolt_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_sbLightningBolt, function Trig_sbLightningBolt_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: sbGold
//===========================================================================
function Trig_sbGold_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbGold_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set udg_i2=udg_upgGoldInc[udg_ip]
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_i2, ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip)), 10.00, ( "You receive |cffffcc00" + ( I2S(udg_i2) + " gold|r from your gold mine." ) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_sbGold takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_sbGold=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_sbGold, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_sbGold, Condition(function Trig_sbGold_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_sbGold, function Trig_sbGold_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: sbForecast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_sbForecast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A010' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbForecast_Func001Func009Func003Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() == udg_roundRobinPlayer[udg_ip] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_stillTrue == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbForecast_Func001Func009Func003Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_sbForecast_Func001Func009Func003Func005Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempPlayer=GetEnumPlayer()
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer)
        set udg_stillTrue=true
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_sbForecast_Func001Func009Func003Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() == udg_roundRobinPlayer[udg_ip2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_stillTrue == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbForecast_Func001Func009Func003Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_sbForecast_Func001Func009Func003Func007Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempPlayer2=GetEnumPlayer()
        set udg_ip2=GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_tempPlayer2)
        set udg_stillTrue=true
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_sbForecast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbForecast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_sbForecast_Func001C() ) then
        // show upcoming matchups
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=( udg_round + 0 )
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=( udg_round + 1 )
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_i=0
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 20.00, ( ( "Round " + I2S(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) + ":" ))
            set bj_forLoopBIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd=( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_players) / 2 )
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
                set udg_i=( udg_i + 1 )
                set udg_ip=S2I(SubStringBJ(udg_roundRobinRounds[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( ( udg_i * 2 ) - 1 ), ( ( udg_i * 2 ) - 1 )))
                set udg_ip2=S2I(SubStringBJ(udg_roundRobinRounds[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( ( udg_i * 2 ) - 0 ), ( ( udg_i * 2 ) - 0 )))
                set udg_stillTrue=false
                call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_sbForecast_Func001Func009Func003Func005A)
                set udg_stillTrue=false
                call ForForce(udg_players, function Trig_sbForecast_Func001Func009Func003Func007A)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 20.00, ( ( udg_playerName[udg_ip] + " vs " ) + udg_playerName[udg_ip2] ))
                set bj_forLoopBIndex=bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
            endloop
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        set udg_ip=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call DestroyFogModifier(udg_forecastVisibility[udg_ip])
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, udg_levelRegion[udg_forecastLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]])
        set udg_forecastVisibility[udg_ip]=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
        set udg_l[0]=GetRectCenter(udg_levelRegion[udg_forecastLevel[udg_ip]])
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_l[0], 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_sbForecast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_sbForecast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_sbForecast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_sbForecast, Condition(function Trig_sbForecast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_sbForecast, function Trig_sbForecast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: sbRift
//===========================================================================
function Trig_sbRift_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbRift_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_sbRift_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] )
endfunction

function Trig_sbRift_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_sbRift_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitGroupInRectBJ(udg_ug, gg_rct_visionMain) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitGroupInRectBJ(udg_ug, gg_rct_visionDuels) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitGroupInRectBJ(udg_ug, gg_rct_teamBattleArena) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitGroupInRectBJ(udg_ug, gg_rct_twinBossArea) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitGroupInRectBJ(udg_ug, gg_rct_castleDefenceArea) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitGroupInRectBJ(udg_ug, gg_rct_visionBossBattle) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_sbRift_Func003Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbRift_Func003Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i == ( GetForLoopIndexA() * 5 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbRift_Func003Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_playerLevel[udg_ip] >= 36 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbRift_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_sbRift_Func003Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_ug) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbRift_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_sbRift_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_sbRift_Func003C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_l[0], "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        if ( Trig_sbRift_Func003Func007C() ) then
            set udg_i=( ( udg_playerValue[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] / 150 ) + 1 )
        else
            set udg_i=udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=7
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_sbRift_Func003Func008Func001C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i - 1 )
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=1
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_sbRift_Func003Func009Func001C() ) then
                set udg_i=( udg_i - 3 )
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=GetRandomInt(3, 3)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_levelArmy[udg_i])), udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_l[0], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(45.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_playerArmy[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_allUnits)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\FeralSpirit\\feralspirittarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 4.00 ))
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_1414")
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_sbRift takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_sbRift=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_sbRift, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_sbRift, Condition(function Trig_sbRift_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_sbRift, function Trig_sbRift_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: sbPossess
//
// Doesnt work properly at Event
//===========================================================================
function Trig_sbPossess_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func001Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(( udg_ipU[2] + 6 )), udg_CastleDefenceGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(( udg_ipU[2] + 6 )), udg_TwinBossGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Extinction == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(( udg_ipU[2] + 6 )), udg_team2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(( udg_ipU[2] + 6 )), udg_team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MassDuel == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbPossess_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == ConvertedPlayer(( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit())) + 6 )) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_sbPossess_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_sbPossess_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ipU[2]=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 10.00, I2S(udg_ipU[2]))
        call SetUnitOwner(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), false)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetSpellTargetUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetSpellTargetUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Parasite\\ParasiteTarget.mdl")
        call SetUnitUseFoodBJ(false, GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0DU', GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0F7', GetSpellTargetUnit())
        if ( Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012C() ) then
            if ( Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func002C() ) then
                call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipU[2]), udg_team1P)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 10.00, I2S(GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())))
                call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team1P, udg_team1, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED)
            else
                if ( Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func002Func004C() ) then
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipU[2]), udg_team2P)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 10.00, I2S(GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())))
                    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team2P, udg_team2, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED)
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func001C() ) then
                if ( Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipU[2]), udg_team1P)
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 10.00, I2S(GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipU[2]))))
                    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team1P, udg_TwinBossGroup, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED)
                    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_TwinBossGroup, udg_team1P, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED)
                else
                    if ( Trig_sbPossess_Func001Func012Func001Func001Func005C() ) then
                        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipU[2]), udg_team2P)
                        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_debugPg, 10.00, I2S(GetConvertedPlayerId(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipU[2]))))
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_team2P, udg_CastleDefenceGroup, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED)
                        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_CastleDefenceGroup, udg_team2P, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            else
            endif
        endif
        set udg_ipU[2]=0
    else
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ipU[2])), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_2672")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_sbPossess takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_sbPossess=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_sbPossess, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_sbPossess, Condition(function Trig_sbPossess_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_sbPossess, function Trig_sbPossess_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: shoutForHelp
//===========================================================================
function Trig_shoutForHelp_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0DU' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_shoutForHelp_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_shoutForHelp_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] )
endfunction

function Trig_shoutForHelp_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_shoutForHelp_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_shoutForHelp_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_shoutForHelp_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "smart", GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_shoutForHelp_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1300.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_shoutForHelp_Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_shoutForHelpGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_shoutForHelp_Func004A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_shoutForHelp takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_shoutForHelp=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_shoutForHelp, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_shoutForHelp, Condition(function Trig_shoutForHelp_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_shoutForHelp, function Trig_shoutForHelp_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: attackOrder
//===========================================================================
function Trig_attackOrder_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0F7' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attackOrder_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_attackOrder_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] )
endfunction

function Trig_attackOrder_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_attackOrder_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_attackOrder_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_attackOrder_Func006Func001C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetSpellTargetUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_attackOrder_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\BattleRoar\\RoarCaster.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(450.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_attackOrder_Func004002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_OrderGroup)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_attackOrder_Func006A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_attackOrder takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_attackOrder=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_attackOrder, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_attackOrder, Condition(function Trig_attackOrder_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_attackOrder, function Trig_attackOrder_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: spawningAddBehaviours
//===========================================================================
function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bFlee25) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bFlee50) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bBattleMarch) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_cCharge5) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_cCharge10) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func008Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_cCharge10) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_duelTicker != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_massDuelTicker != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bFocusFireLeader) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bFocusFire) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bHeroHunter) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func012Func001Func004Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func012Func001Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_u, udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_duelTicker != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_massDuelTicker != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_extinctionTicker != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitAcquireRange(udg_u))
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func002C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func003C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func004C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func005C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func006C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func007C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func008C() ) then
        if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func008Func004C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func008Func001C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
        else
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func009C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func010C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func011C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bHeroHunter)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func012C() ) then
        if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func012Func001C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func012Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                else
                    if ( Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Func012Func001Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                    else
                    endif
                endif
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_spawningAddBehaviours takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_spawningAddBehaviours, function Trig_spawningAddBehaviours_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bSetFlee
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bSetFlee_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bSetFlee_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bSetFlee_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bSetFlee_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_bSetFlee_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to flee at 50% hp." ))
    else
        if ( Trig_bSetFlee_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to not flee." ))
        else
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to flee at 25% hp." ))
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bSetFlee takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bSetFlee=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bSetFlee, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bSetFlee, Condition(function Trig_bSetFlee_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bSetFlee, function Trig_bSetFlee_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bSetCharge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bSetCharge_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bSetCharge_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bSetCharge_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bSetCharge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_bSetCharge_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to charge after 7 s." ))
    else
        if ( Trig_bSetCharge_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to charge off." ))
        else
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set charge after 3 s." ))
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bSetCharge, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bSetCharge, Condition(function Trig_bSetCharge_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bSetCharge, function Trig_bSetCharge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bFlank
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bFlank_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlank_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlank_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlank_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_bFlank_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to flank right." ))
    else
        if ( Trig_bFlank_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to attack normally." ))
        else
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to flank left." ))
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_bFlank=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bFlank, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bFlank, Condition(function Trig_bFlank_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bFlank, function Trig_bFlank_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bAcquisitionRange
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Func002Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAcquireRange(GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1050.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAcquireRange(GetTriggerUnit()) == ( 200.00 + ( 50.00 * I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_stillTrue == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_stillTrue=true
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=16
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Func002Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitAcquireRange(GetTriggerUnit()) + 50.00 ))
                if ( Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Func002Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 250.00)
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( " acquisition range set to " + ( R2S(GetUnitAcquireRange(GetTriggerUnit())) + "." ) ) ))
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( " acquisition range set to " + ( R2S(GetUnitAcquireRange(GetTriggerUnit())) + "." ) ) ))
                endif
                set udg_stillTrue=false
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bAcquisitionRange takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bAcquisitionRange=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bAcquisitionRange, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bAcquisitionRange, Condition(function Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bAcquisitionRange, function Trig_bAcquisitionRange_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bSetFocusFire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bSetFocusFire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bSetFocusFire_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bSetFocusFire_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bSetFocusFire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_bSetFocusFire_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to focus fire (accept orders)." ))
    else
        if ( Trig_bSetFocusFire_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to not focus fire." ))
        else
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " set to focus fire leader." ))
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bSetFocusFire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bSetFocusFire=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bSetFocusFire, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bSetFocusFire, Condition(function Trig_bSetFocusFire_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bSetFocusFire, function Trig_bSetFocusFire_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bBattleMarch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bBattleMarch_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A088' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bBattleMarch_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bBattleMarch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_bBattleMarch_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " removed from the battle march group." ))
    else
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " add to battle march group." ))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bBattleMarch takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bBattleMarch=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bBattleMarch, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bBattleMarch, Condition(function Trig_bBattleMarch_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bBattleMarch, function Trig_bBattleMarch_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bResetBehaviours
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bResetBehaviours_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A020' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bResetBehaviours_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bResetBehaviours takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bResetBehaviours=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bResetBehaviours, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bResetBehaviours, Condition(function Trig_bResetBehaviours_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bResetBehaviours, function Trig_bResetBehaviours_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bResetAllUnitsBehaviours
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0JS' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFocusFireLeader)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFocusFire)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
endfunction

function Trig_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ipOMG=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[udg_ipOMG], function Trig_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours, Condition(function Trig_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours, function Trig_bResetAllUnitsBehaviours_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bFlee
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bFlee_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_bFlee_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_bFlee_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlee_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlee_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlee_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_bFlee_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 400.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[2], udg_l[0]))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee25)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bFlee_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_l[1]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_l[0], 400.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_l[2], udg_l[0]))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlee50)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bFlee takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bFlee=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bFlee, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bFlee, Condition(function Trig_bFlee_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bFlee, function Trig_bFlee_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bChargeOld
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bChargeOld_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_bChargeOld_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_bChargeOld_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bChargeOld_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bChargeOld_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bChargeOld_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_bChargeOld_Func002C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Encourage.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BI', GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0BI', GetTriggerUnit())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge5)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bChargeOld_Func003C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Encourage.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cCharge10)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bChargeOld takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bChargeOld=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bChargeOld, gg_rct_visionDuels)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bChargeOld, gg_rct_visionMain)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bChargeOld, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bChargeOld, gg_rct_Team1spawn)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bChargeOld, gg_rct_Team2spawn)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bChargeOld, Condition(function Trig_bChargeOld_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bChargeOld, function Trig_bChargeOld_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bFlankFix
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bFlankFix_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFix_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_bFlankFix_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFix_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFix_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFix_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_bFlankFix_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 1500.00, 0)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_bFlankFix_Func002C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], - 1500.00, 0)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bFlankFix takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bFlankFix=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bFlankFix, gg_rct_flankFixerCreeps)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bFlankFix, Condition(function Trig_bFlankFix_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bFlankFix, function Trig_bFlankFix_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bMarchGroup
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bMarchGroup_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bBattleMarch) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bMarchGroup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_bMarchGroup_Func006C() ) then
        call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), 250.00)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bMarchGroup takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bMarchGroup=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bMarchGroup, gg_rct_visionDuels)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bMarchGroup, gg_rct_visionMain)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bMarchGroup, gg_rct_visionBossBattle)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bMarchGroup, gg_rct_Team1spawn)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bMarchGroup, gg_rct_Team2spawn)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bMarchGroup, function Trig_bMarchGroup_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bFlankFixDuels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bFlankFixDuels_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFixDuels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_bFlankFixDuels_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFixDuels_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFixDuels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_bFlankFixDuels_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[0]=GetRectCenter(udg_duellingRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bFlankFixDuels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bFlankFixDuels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bFlankFixDuels, gg_rct_flankFixerD1)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bFlankFixDuels, gg_rct_flankFixerD2)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_bFlankFixDuels, gg_rct_flankFixerD3)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bFlankFixDuels, Condition(function Trig_bFlankFixDuels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bFlankFixDuels, function Trig_bFlankFixDuels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bFlankFixDuelAttacked
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bFlankFixDuelAttacked_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFixDuelAttacked_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_visionDuels, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_bFlankFixDuelAttacked_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFixDuelAttacked_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_dummyplayer[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFlankFixDuelAttacked_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_bFlankFixDuelAttacked_Func004Func001C() ) then
            set udg_l[0]=GetRectCenter(udg_duellingRegion[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bFlankFixDuelAttacked takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bFlankFixDuelAttacked=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bFlankFixDuelAttacked, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bFlankFixDuelAttacked, Condition(function Trig_bFlankFixDuelAttacked_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bFlankFixDuelAttacked, function Trig_bFlankFixDuelAttacked_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: bFocusFire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_bFocusFire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetAttacker(), udg_bFocusFireLeader) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_bFocusFire_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) )
endfunction

function Trig_bFocusFire_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_bFocusFire) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_bFocusFire_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())), (IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_bFocusFire) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_bFocusFire_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_bFocusFire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_l[0], Condition(function Trig_bFocusFire_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_bFocusFire_Func003A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ug)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_bFocusFire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_bFocusFire=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_bFocusFire, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bFocusFire, Condition(function Trig_bFocusFire_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_bFocusFire, function Trig_bFocusFire_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: bFlankAttacked
//===========================================================================

    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankLeft) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_bFlankRight) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_bFlankAttacked_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_l[27]=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[27])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_l[27])
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_bFlankAttacked, Condition(function Trig_bFlankAttacked_Conditions))

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BehavioursPresets
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FF' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_uTypePerset[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_uTypePerset1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_uTypePerset2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_uTypePerset3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_uTypePerset4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_uTypePerset5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=GetSpellAbilityUnit()
    call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, "TRIGSTR_7883")
    if ( Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func003C() ) then
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, "TRIGSTR_7906")
        set udg_p=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    else
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, GetUnitName(udg_uL[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]))
        set udg_p=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    endif
    if ( Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func004C() ) then
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, "TRIGSTR_7913")
        set udg_p1=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    else
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, GetUnitName(udg_uL1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]))
        set udg_p1=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    endif
    if ( Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func005C() ) then
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, "TRIGSTR_7915")
        set udg_p2=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    else
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, GetUnitName(udg_uL2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]))
        set udg_p2=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    endif
    if ( Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func006C() ) then
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, "TRIGSTR_7916")
        set udg_p3=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    else
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, GetUnitName(udg_uL3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]))
        set udg_p3=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    endif
    if ( Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func007C() ) then
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, "TRIGSTR_7917")
        set udg_p4=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    else
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, GetUnitName(udg_uL4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]))
        set udg_p4=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    endif
    if ( Trig_BehavioursPresets_Func008C() ) then
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, "TRIGSTR_7918")
        set udg_p5=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    else
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, GetUnitName(udg_uL5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]))
        set udg_p5=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    endif
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns, "TRIGSTR_8351")
    set udg_p6=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_BehaviourPatterns, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BehavioursPresets takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BehavioursPresets=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BehavioursPresets, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BehavioursPresets, Condition(function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BehavioursPresets, function Trig_BehavioursPresets_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
