    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bBattleMarch) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_cCharge5) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RecordPreset_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_p ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RecordPreset_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001C() ) then
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetUnitName(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]) + " set as role model for this type of units." ))
        call DialogClearBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns)
        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_uL[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]
            set udg_uTypePerset[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetUnitTypeId(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004Func004C() ) then
                set udg_bF25[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
            else
                set udg_bF25[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            endif
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004Func005C() ) then
                set udg_bF50[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
            else
                set udg_bF50[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            endif
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004Func006C() ) then
                set udg_bFlankL[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
            else
                set udg_bFlankL[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            endif
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004Func007C() ) then
                set udg_bFlankR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
            else
                set udg_bFlankR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            endif
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004Func008C() ) then
                set udg_bBM[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
            else
                set udg_bBM[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            endif
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004Func009C() ) then
                set udg_bCharge3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
            else
                set udg_bCharge3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            endif
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004Func010C() ) then
                set udg_bCharge7[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
            else
                set udg_bCharge7[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            endif
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004Func011C() ) then
                set udg_bFFL[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
            else
                set udg_bFFL[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            endif
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func004Func012C() ) then
                set udg_bFF[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
            else
                set udg_bFF[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            endif
        else
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_7919")
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetUnitName(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]) + " set as role model for this type of units." ))
            call DialogClearBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns)
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
                set udg_uL1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]
                set udg_uTypePerset1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetUnitTypeId(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004Func009C() ) then
                    set udg_bF251[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                else
                    set udg_bF251[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                endif
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004Func010C() ) then
                    set udg_bF501[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                else
                    set udg_bF501[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                endif
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004Func011C() ) then
                    set udg_bFlankL1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                else
                    set udg_bFlankL1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                endif
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004Func012C() ) then
                    set udg_bFlankR1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                else
                    set udg_bFlankR1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                endif
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004Func013C() ) then
                    set udg_bBM1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                else
                    set udg_bBM1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                endif
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004Func014C() ) then
                    set udg_bCharge31[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                else
                    set udg_bCharge31[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                endif
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004Func015C() ) then
                    set udg_bCharge71[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                else
                    set udg_bCharge71[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                endif
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004Func016C() ) then
                    set udg_bFFL1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                else
                    set udg_bFFL1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                endif
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func004Func017C() ) then
                    set udg_bFF1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                else
                    set udg_bFF1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                endif
            else
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_8040")
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetUnitName(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]) + " set as role model for this type of units." ))
                call DialogClearBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns)
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                    set udg_uL2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]
                    set udg_uTypePerset2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetUnitTypeId(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004Func009C() ) then
                        set udg_bF252[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    else
                        set udg_bF252[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004Func010C() ) then
                        set udg_bF502[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    else
                        set udg_bF502[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004Func011C() ) then
                        set udg_bFlankL2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    else
                        set udg_bFlankL2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004Func012C() ) then
                        set udg_bFlankR2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    else
                        set udg_bFlankR2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004Func013C() ) then
                        set udg_bBM2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    else
                        set udg_bBM2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004Func014C() ) then
                        set udg_bCharge32[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    else
                        set udg_bCharge32[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004Func015C() ) then
                        set udg_bCharge72[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    else
                        set udg_bCharge72[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004Func016C() ) then
                        set udg_bFFL2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    else
                        set udg_bFFL2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func004Func017C() ) then
                        set udg_bFF2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    else
                        set udg_bFF2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    endif
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_8038")
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetUnitName(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]) + " set as role model for this type of units." ))
                    call DialogClearBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns)
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004C() ) then
                        set udg_uL3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]
                        set udg_uTypePerset3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetUnitTypeId(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004Func009C() ) then
                            set udg_bF253[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                        else
                            set udg_bF253[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004Func010C() ) then
                            set udg_bF503[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                        else
                            set udg_bF503[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004Func011C() ) then
                            set udg_bFlankL3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                        else
                            set udg_bFlankL3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004Func012C() ) then
                            set udg_bFlankR3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                        else
                            set udg_bFlankR3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004Func013C() ) then
                            set udg_bBM3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                        else
                            set udg_bBM3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004Func014C() ) then
                            set udg_bCharge33[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                        else
                            set udg_bCharge33[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004Func015C() ) then
                            set udg_bCharge73[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                        else
                            set udg_bCharge73[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004Func016C() ) then
                            set udg_bFFL3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                        else
                            set udg_bFFL3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                        endif
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func004Func017C() ) then
                            set udg_bFF3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                        else
                            set udg_bFF3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                        endif
                    else
                        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_8041")
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetUnitName(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]) + " set as role model for this type of units." ))
                        call DialogClearBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns)
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004C() ) then
                            set udg_uL4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]
                            set udg_uTypePerset4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetUnitTypeId(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004Func009C() ) then
                                set udg_bF254[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                            else
                                set udg_bF254[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004Func010C() ) then
                                set udg_bF504[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                            else
                                set udg_bF504[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004Func011C() ) then
                                set udg_bFlankL4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                            else
                                set udg_bFlankL4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004Func012C() ) then
                                set udg_bFlankR4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                            else
                                set udg_bFlankR4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004Func013C() ) then
                                set udg_bBM4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                            else
                                set udg_bBM4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004Func014C() ) then
                                set udg_bCharge34[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                            else
                                set udg_bCharge34[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004Func015C() ) then
                                set udg_bCharge74[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                            else
                                set udg_bCharge74[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004Func016C() ) then
                                set udg_bFFL4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                            else
                                set udg_bFFL4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                            endif
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func004Func017C() ) then
                                set udg_bFF4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                            else
                                set udg_bFF4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                            endif
                        else
                            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_8043")
                        endif
                    else
                        if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetUnitName(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]) + " set as role model for this type of units." ))
                            call DialogClearBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns)
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004C() ) then
                                set udg_uL5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]
                                set udg_uTypePerset5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetUnitTypeId(udg_undecidedUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func009C() ) then
                                    set udg_bF255[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                                else
                                    set udg_bF255[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func010C() ) then
                                    set udg_bF505[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                                else
                                    set udg_bF505[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func011C() ) then
                                    set udg_bFlankL5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                                else
                                    set udg_bFlankL5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func012C() ) then
                                    set udg_bFlankR5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                                else
                                    set udg_bFlankR5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func013C() ) then
                                    set udg_bBM5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                                else
                                    set udg_bBM5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func014C() ) then
                                    set udg_bCharge35[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                                else
                                    set udg_bCharge35[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func015C() ) then
                                    set udg_bCharge75[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                                else
                                    set udg_bCharge75[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func016C() ) then
                                    set udg_bFFL5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                                else
                                    set udg_bFFL5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                                endif
                                if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func004Func017C() ) then
                                    set udg_bFF5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                                else
                                    set udg_bFF5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                                endif
                            else
                                call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), "TRIGSTR_8042")
                            endif
                        else
                            if ( Trig_RecordPreset_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call DialogClearBJ(udg_BehaviourPatterns)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_RecordPreset takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_RecordPreset=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_RecordPreset, udg_BehaviourPatterns)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RecordPreset, function Trig_RecordPreset_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: cTricking
//===========================================================================
function Trig_cTricking_Func007Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cTricking_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cTricking) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cTricking_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_cTricking_Func007C() ) then
        call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), 120.00)
        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 600.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit()))
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 1300.00, - 1200.00)
        set udg_l[2]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], - 1300.00, - 1200.00)
        set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 1500.00, - 1200.00)
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], - 1500.00, - 1200.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIam\\AIamTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
        if ( Trig_cTricking_Func007Func014C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[1])
            call TriggerSleepAction(2.50)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[3])
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1300.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        else
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[2])
            call TriggerSleepAction(2.50)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1300.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[4])
        endif
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_cTricking takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_cTricking=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cTricking, gg_rct_creeps01)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cTricking, gg_rct_creeps02)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cTricking, gg_rct_creeps03)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cTricking, gg_rct_creeps04)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cTricking, gg_rct_c05)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cTricking, gg_rct_c06)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_cTricking, function Trig_cTricking_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: cHammer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_cHammer_Func007Func011Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cHammer_Func007Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cHammer_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cHammer) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cHammer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_cHammer_Func007C() ) then
        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 600.00)
        call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit()))
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 1400.00, 0.00)
        set udg_l[2]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], - 1400.00, 0.00)
        set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 750.00, - 1600.00)
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], - 750.00, - 1600.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIsm\\AIsmTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
        if ( Trig_cHammer_Func007Func011C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[1])
            call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[3])
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1300.00)
            call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
        else
            set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
            if ( Trig_cHammer_Func007Func011Func002C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[2])
                call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
                call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1300.00)
                call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            else
                call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
                call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
                call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
                call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_cHammer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_cHammer=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cHammer, gg_rct_creeps01)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cHammer, gg_rct_creeps02)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cHammer, gg_rct_creeps03)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cHammer, gg_rct_creeps04)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cHammer, gg_rct_c05)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cHammer, gg_rct_c06)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_cHammer, function Trig_cHammer_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: cGenghisKhan
//===========================================================================
function Trig_cGenghisKhan_Func007Func011Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cGenghisKhan_Func007Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cGenghisKhan_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cGenghisKhan) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cGenghisKhan_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_cGenghisKhan_Func007C() ) then
        call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 600.00)
        call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit()))
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 1400.00, 0.00)
        set udg_l[2]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], - 1400.00, 0.00)
        set udg_l[3]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 900.00, - 2000.00)
        set udg_l[4]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], - 900.00, - 2000.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIsm\\AIsmTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
        if ( Trig_cGenghisKhan_Func007Func011C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[1])
            call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[3])
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
            call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1300.00)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
        else
            set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
            if ( Trig_cGenghisKhan_Func007Func011Func002C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[2])
                call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[4])
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
                call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
                call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1300.00)
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0BJ', GetTriggerUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            else
                call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
                call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
                call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
                call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), 200.00)
                call TriggerSleepAction(6.00)
                call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit()))
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_l[3])
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_cGenghisKhan takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_cGenghisKhan=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cGenghisKhan, gg_rct_creeps01)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cGenghisKhan, gg_rct_creeps02)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cGenghisKhan, gg_rct_creeps03)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cGenghisKhan, gg_rct_creeps04)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cGenghisKhan, gg_rct_c05)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cGenghisKhan, gg_rct_c06)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_cGenghisKhan, function Trig_cGenghisKhan_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: cAssaultL
//===========================================================================
function Trig_cAssaultL_Func007Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cAssaultL_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cAssautL) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cAssaultL_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_cAssaultL_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 1400.00, 0.00)
        set udg_l[2]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 1400.00, - 2400.00)
        set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
        if ( Trig_cAssaultL_Func007Func005C() ) then
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 300.00)
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BI', GetTriggerUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIim\\AIimTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[1])
            call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[2])
            call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 0, - 2200.00))
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1600.00)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0BI', GetTriggerUnit())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        else
            call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), 240.00)
            call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
            call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit()))
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_cAssaultL takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_cAssaultL=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultL, gg_rct_creeps01)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultL, gg_rct_creeps02)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultL, gg_rct_creeps03)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultL, gg_rct_creeps04)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultL, gg_rct_c05)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultL, gg_rct_c06)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_cAssaultL, function Trig_cAssaultL_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: cAssaultR
//===========================================================================
function Trig_cAssaultR_Func007Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_r <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cAssaultR_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_cAssautR) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_cAssaultR_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_cAssaultR_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_l[0]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_l[1]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], - 1400.00, 0.00)
        set udg_l[2]=OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], - 1400.00, - 2400.00)
        set udg_r=GetRandomPercentageBJ()
        if ( Trig_cAssaultR_Func007Func005C() ) then
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 300.00)
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BI', GetTriggerUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIim\\AIimTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_l[1])
            call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_l[2])
            call TriggerSleepAction(5.50)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", OffsetLocation(udg_l[0], 0, - 2200.00))
            call SetUnitAcquireRangeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1600.00)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0BI', GetTriggerUnit())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        else
            call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), 240.00)
            call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
            call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit()))
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[0])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_l[2])
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultR, gg_rct_creeps03)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultR, gg_rct_creeps04)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultR, gg_rct_c05)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cAssaultR, gg_rct_c06)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetTactics
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetTactics_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TacticalCreeps[1]=udg_cAssautL
    set udg_TacticalCreeps[2]=udg_cAssautR
    set udg_TacticalCreeps[3]=udg_cTricking
    set udg_TacticalCreeps[4]=udg_cHammer
    set udg_TacticalCreeps[5]=udg_cGenghisKhan
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetTactics takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetTactics=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetTactics, function Trig_SetTactics_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: setSide
//===========================================================================
function Trig_setSide_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FI' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setSide_Func003Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setSide_Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setSide_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_setSide_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0IT', GetEnumUnit())
            call GroupRemoveGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[udg_ip4], udg_allMercenaries)
        else
            if ( Trig_setSide_Func003Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0IU', GetEnumUnit())
                call GroupRemoveGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[udg_ip4], udg_allMercenaries)
            else
            endif
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

function Trig_setSide_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_allMercenaries) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_undecidedUnitRR[udg_ip4]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setSide_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_setSide_Func005Func001C() ) then
        set udg_hasNonMercenary[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=true
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_setSide_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_hasNonMercenary[udg_ip4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setSide_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ip4=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set udg_ug=GetUnitsSelectedAll(ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip4))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ug, function Trig_setSide_Func003A)
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_army[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], function Trig_setSide_Func005A)
    if ( Trig_setSide_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_hasNonMercenary[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=false
        call GroupAddGroup(udg_ug, udg_allMercenaries)
        call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_RR[udg_ip4], "TRIGSTR_878")
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RR[udg_ip4], "TRIGSTR_897")
        set udg_fRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RR[udg_ip4], "TRIGSTR_944")
        set udg_eRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RR[udg_ip4], "TRIGSTR_945")
        set udg_eRRR=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_RR[udg_ip4], ConvertedPlayer(udg_ip4))
    else
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), "TRIGSTR_877")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_setSide takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_setSide=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_setSide, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_setSide, Condition(function Trig_setSide_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_setSide, function Trig_setSide_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: setGroup1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, GetUnitName(GetEnumUnit()))
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call GroupRemoveGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_allMercenaries)
        else
            if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, GetUnitName(GetEnumUnit()))
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                call GroupRemoveGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_allMercenaries)
            else
            endif
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_eRRR ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(5) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_eRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif

    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(5) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_fRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_friend[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
        call DialogClearBJ(udg_RR[1])
        call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_RRG, "TRIGSTR_947")
        if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func005C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(0)))
            set udg_bRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func006C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(1)))
            set udg_bRR1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func007C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(2)))
            set udg_bRR2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func008C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(3)))
            set udg_bRR3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func009C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(4)))
            set udg_bRR4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func010C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(5)))
            set udg_bRR5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_RRG, GetTriggerPlayer())
    else
        if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_friend[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            call DialogClearBJ(udg_RR[1])
            call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_RRG, "TRIGSTR_946")
            if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func005C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(0)))
                set udg_bRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func006C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(1)))
                set udg_bRR1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func007C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(2)))
                set udg_bRR2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func008C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(3)))
                set udg_bRR3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func009C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(4)))
                set udg_bRR4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func010C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(5)))
                set udg_bRR5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_RRG, GetTriggerPlayer())
        else
            if ( Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_setGroup1_Func002Func001Func001Func001A)
                call DialogClearBJ(udg_RR[1])
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_setGroup1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_setGroup1, udg_RR[1])
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_setGroup1, function Trig_setGroup1_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_setGroup2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_fRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_friend[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
        call DialogClearBJ(udg_RR[2])
        call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_RRG, "TRIGSTR_949")
        if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func005C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(0)))
            set udg_bRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func006C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(1)))
            set udg_bRR1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func007C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(2)))
            set udg_bRR2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func008C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(3)))
            set udg_bRR3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func009C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(4)))
            set udg_bRR4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func010C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(5)))
            set udg_bRR5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_RRG, GetTriggerPlayer())
    else
        if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_friend[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            call DialogClearBJ(udg_RR[2])
            call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_RRG, "TRIGSTR_948")
            if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func001Func005C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(0)))
                set udg_bRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func001Func006C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(1)))
                set udg_bRR1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func001Func007C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(2)))
                set udg_bRR2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func001Func008C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(3)))
                set udg_bRR3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func001Func009C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(4)))
                set udg_bRR4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func001Func010C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(5)))
                set udg_bRR5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_RRG, GetTriggerPlayer())
        else
            if ( Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_setGroup2_Func002Func001Func001Func001A)
                call DialogClearBJ(udg_RR[2])
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_setGroup2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_setGroup2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_setGroup2, udg_RR[2])
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_setGroup2, function Trig_setGroup2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: setGroup3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_setGroup3_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup3_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup3_Func002Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_setGroup3_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, GetUnitName(GetEnumUnit()))
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call GroupRemoveGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_allMercenaries)
        else
            if ( Trig_setGroup3_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, GetUnitName(GetEnumUnit()))
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                call GroupRemoveGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_allMercenaries)
            else
            endif
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup3_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_eRRR ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup3_Func002Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false

                set udg_bRR1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()

            if ( Trig_setGroup3_Func002Func001Func007C() ) then

                set udg_bRR2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()

            if ( Trig_setGroup3_Func002Func001Func008C() ) then

                set udg_bRR3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup5_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_fRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_friend[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
        call DialogClearBJ(udg_RR[5])
        call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_RRG, "TRIGSTR_955")
        if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func005C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(0)))
            set udg_bRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func006C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(1)))
            set udg_bRR1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func007C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(2)))
            set udg_bRR2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func008C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(3)))
            set udg_bRR3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func009C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(4)))
            set udg_bRR4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func010C() ) then
        else
            call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(5)))
            set udg_bRR5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
        endif
        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_RRG, GetTriggerPlayer())
    else
        if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_friend[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
            call DialogClearBJ(udg_RR[5])
            call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_RRG, "TRIGSTR_954")
            if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func001Func005C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(0)))
                set udg_bRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func001Func006C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(1)))
                set udg_bRR1[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func001Func007C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(2)))
                set udg_bRR2[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func001Func008C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(3)))
                set udg_bRR3[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func001Func009C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(4)))
                set udg_bRR4[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func001Func010C() ) then
            else
                call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_RRG, GetPlayerName(Player(5)))
                set udg_bRR5[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
            endif
            call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_RRG, GetTriggerPlayer())
        else
            if ( Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_setGroup5_Func002Func001Func001Func001A)
                call DialogClearBJ(udg_RR[5])
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_setGroup5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_setGroup5=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_setGroup5, udg_RR[5])
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_setGroup5, function Trig_setGroup5_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: setGroup6
//===========================================================================
function Trig_setGroup6_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup6_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup6_Func002Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_setGroup6_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, GetUnitName(GetEnumUnit()))
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup1[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call GroupRemoveGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_allMercenaries)
        else
            if ( Trig_setGroup6_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, GetUnitName(GetEnumUnit()))
                call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_bRRGroup2[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                call GroupRemoveGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_allMercenaries)
            else
            endif
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

function Trig_setGroup6_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_eRRR ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func002Func003A takes nothing returns nothing

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0IT', GetEnumUnit())
