function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_friend[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_bRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_confirmGroup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight for " + GetPlayerName(Player(0)) ) ))
            call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup1[1])
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func002Func007A)
            call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
        else
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight against " + GetPlayerName(Player(0)) ) ))
            call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup2[1])
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func002Func003A)
            call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight for  " + GetPlayerName(Player(1)) ) ))
                call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup1[2])
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func002Func007A)
                call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
            else
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight against " + GetPlayerName(Player(1)) ) ))
                call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup2[2])
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func002Func003A)
                call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight for " + GetPlayerName(Player(2)) ) ))
                    call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup1[3])
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func007A)
                    call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight against " + GetPlayerName(Player(2)) ) ))
                    call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup2[3])
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func003A)
                    call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight for " + GetPlayerName(Player(3)) ) ))
                        call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup1[4])
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002Func007A)
                        call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                    else
                        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight against " + GetPlayerName(Player(3)) ) ))
                        call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup2[4])
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002Func003A)
                        call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight for " + GetPlayerName(Player(4)) ) ))
                            call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup1[5])
                            call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002Func007A)
                            call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                        else
                            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight against " + GetPlayerName(Player(4)) ) ))
                            call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup2[5])
                            call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002Func003A)
                            call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                        endif
                    else
                        if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            if ( Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight for " + GetPlayerName(Player(5)) ) ))
                                call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup1[6])
                                call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func007A)
                                call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                            else
                                call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( "Picked units" + ( " will fight against " + GetPlayerName(Player(5)) ) ))
                                call GroupAddGroup(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], udg_bRRGroup2[6])
                                call ForGroupBJ(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], function Trig_confirmGroup_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003A)
                                call GroupClear(udg_undecidedUnitRR[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
                            endif
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call DialogClearBJ(udg_RRG)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_confirmGroup takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_confirmGroup=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_confirmGroup, udg_RRG)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_confirmGroup, function Trig_confirmGroup_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set Max Hp
//
// Default melee game initialization for all players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_Max_Hp_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Max_Hp > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Max_Hp_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Max_Hp=( udg_Max_Hp - R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, udg_Some_Unit)) )
    if ( Trig_Set_Max_Hp_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Loop_Integer=( ( udg_Max_Hp - ModuloInteger(udg_Max_Hp, 100) ) / 100 )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Loop_Integer
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit, 4)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Max_Hp=ModuloInteger(udg_Max_Hp, 100)
        set udg_Loop_Integer=( ( udg_Max_Hp - ModuloInteger(udg_Max_Hp, 10) ) / 10 )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Loop_Integer
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit, 3)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Max_Hp=ModuloInteger(udg_Max_Hp, 10)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Max_Hp
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit, 2)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        set udg_Max_Hp=( 0 - udg_Max_Hp )
        set udg_Loop_Integer=( ( udg_Max_Hp - ModuloInteger(udg_Max_Hp, 100) ) / 100 )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Loop_Integer
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit, 7)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Max_Hp=ModuloInteger(udg_Max_Hp, 100)
        set udg_Loop_Integer=( ( udg_Max_Hp - ModuloInteger(udg_Max_Hp, 10) ) / 10 )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Loop_Integer
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit, 6)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Max_Hp=ModuloInteger(udg_Max_Hp, 10)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Max_Hp
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit, 5)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GK', udg_Some_Unit)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Set_Max_Hp takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Set_Max_Hp=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_Max_Hp, function Trig_Set_Max_Hp_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 10, 11))
    set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(1))]=S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 10, 11))
    set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(2))]=S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 10, 11))
    set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(3))]=S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 10, 11))
    set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(4))]=S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 10, 11))
    set udg_playerLevel[GetConvertedPlayerId(Player(5))]=S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 10, 11))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Level, Player(0), "-level's", false)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Level, function Trig_Level_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test endround
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_endround_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_AlliesSargerasBattle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_test_endround_Func001Func001Func003Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_test_endround_Func001Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_humanPlayers) == udg_eR ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_humanPlayers) != 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_test_endround_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_endRoundGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_test_endround_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_test_endround_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_humanPlayers) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_test_endround_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_test_endround_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_allUnits, function Trig_test_endround_Func001Func003A)
    else
        if ( Trig_test_endround_Func001Func001C() ) then
        else
            set udg_eR=( udg_eR + 1 )
            call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_endRoundGroup)
            if ( Trig_test_endround_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_allUnits, function Trig_test_endround_Func001Func001Func003Func005A)
                set udg_eR=0
            else
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, ( udg_playerName[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + " voted for end round." ))
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 5.00, ( ( ( "(" + I2S(udg_eR) ) + ( "/" + ( I2S(CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_humanPlayers)) + ")" ) ) ) + " players voted." ))
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test_endround takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test_endround=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_test_endround, Player(0), "-endround", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_test_endround, Player(1), "-endround", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_test_endround, Player(2), "-endround", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_test_endround, Player(3), "-endround", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_test_endround, Player(4), "-endround", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_test_endround, Player(5), "-endround", true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_test_endround, Condition(function Trig_test_endround_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test_endround, function Trig_test_endround_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: EventsTurnOn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_EventsTurnOn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_454")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenMeteor)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenTornado)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenVolcano)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_EventsTurnOn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_EventsTurnOn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOn, Player(0), "-ee", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOn, Player(1), "-ee", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOn, Player(2), "-ee", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOn, Player(3), "-ee", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOn, Player(4), "-ee", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOn, Player(5), "-ee", true)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_EventsTurnOn, function Trig_EventsTurnOn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: EventsTurnOff
//===========================================================================
function Trig_EventsTurnOff_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1818")
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenMeteor)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenTornado)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SuddenVolcano)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_EventsTurnOff takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_EventsTurnOff=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOff, Player(0), "-de", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOff, Player(1), "-de", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOff, Player(2), "-de", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOff, Player(3), "-de", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOff, Player(4), "-de", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_EventsTurnOff, Player(5), "-de", true)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_EventsTurnOff, function Trig_EventsTurnOff_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_endlessTornament_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MSMain == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_test_endlessTornament_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_test_endlessTornament_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_MSSpeed=8
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_ScheduleRoundRobin)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_MultiboardTournament)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_7009")
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Alexey
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Alexey_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(Player(0)) == "Wilu_Daskar" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) == "Wilu_Daskar" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(Player(2)) == "Wilu_Daskar" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(Player(3)) == "Wilu_Daskar" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(Player(4)) == "Wilu_Daskar" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(Player(5)) == "Wilu_Daskar" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alexey_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_pgTips, udg_hintText[GetRandomInt(16, 18)])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Alexey takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Alexey=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Alexey, Condition(function Trig_Alexey_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Alexey, function Trig_Alexey_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_TKnight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, udg_boardPos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], "war3mapImported\\TKnight.blp")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_TKnight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_TKnight=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_TKnight, ConvertedPlayer(1), "-TKI", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_TKnight, ConvertedPlayer(2), "-TKI", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_TKnight, ConvertedPlayer(3), "-TKI", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_TKnight, ConvertedPlayer(4), "-TKI", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_TKnight, ConvertedPlayer(5), "-TKI", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_TKnight, ConvertedPlayer(6), "-TKI", true)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_TKnight, function Trig_TKnight_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: heavydrugabuse
//===========================================================================
function Trig_heavydrugabuse_Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_MSMain == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_heavydrugabuse_Func001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_MSMain == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_heavydrugabuse_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((udg_MSMain == 1), (udg_MSMain == 2)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_heavydrugabuse_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5272")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_heavyDrugAbuse)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_CrockedCoboldCast)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Behemotics)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_BehemoticsCast)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_BadTripCast)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_OdinSuicideBuildersCast)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_BaddiestTrip)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_GoldPresentDrug)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_FearEnd)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_AncientDragonLord)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_WrathCast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_FireLandOrRitualCast)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_heavydrugabuse takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_heavydrugabuse=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_heavydrugabuse, Player(0), "-hda", true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_heavydrugabuse, Condition(function Trig_heavydrugabuse_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_heavydrugabuse, function Trig_heavydrugabuse_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: lostSouls
//===========================================================================
function Trig_lostSouls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_LostSouls)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_lostSouls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_lostSouls=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_lostSouls, Player(0), "-lostSouls", true)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_lostSouls, function Trig_lostSouls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function RunInitializationTriggers takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_Unique_Units)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_DarkPortalOrks)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_NozdormuRegions)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_RandomUnitsList)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_RandomRaceSpellList)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetMisc1)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetWater)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetRaces)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetPlayerColours)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetupPlayers)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetHelpQuests)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetUnitUpgradeOrders)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetTerrain)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetBot)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_AddBot2)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_AddBot3)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_AddBot4)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_AddBot5)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_AddBot6)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SinglePlayer)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spell_Task)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spell_Dark_Troll)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spell_Behemoth)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spell_Brood_Mother)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StrongholdSpell)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spell_Dragon_Lord)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spell_Yogg_Saron)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Sargeras_Spell)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetTactics)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Alexey)
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Players
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitCustomPlayerSlots takes nothing returns nothing

    // Player 0
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(0), 0)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(0), 0)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(0), ConvertPlayerColor(0))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(0), RACE_PREF_RANDOM)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(0), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 1
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(1), 1)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(1), 1)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(1), ConvertPlayerColor(1))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(1), RACE_PREF_RANDOM)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(1), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 2
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(2), 2)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(2), 2)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(2), ConvertPlayerColor(2))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(2), RACE_PREF_RANDOM)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(2), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 3
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(3), 3)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(3), 3)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(3), ConvertPlayerColor(3))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(3), RACE_PREF_RANDOM)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(3), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 4
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(4), 4)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(4), 4)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(4), ConvertPlayerColor(4))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(4), RACE_PREF_RANDOM)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(4), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 5
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(5), 5)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(5), 5)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(5), ConvertPlayerColor(5))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(5), RACE_PREF_RANDOM)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(5), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 6
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(6), 6)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(6), 6)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(6), ConvertPlayerColor(6))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(6), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(6), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(6), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER)

    // Player 7
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(7), 7)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(7), 7)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(7), ConvertPlayerColor(7))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(7), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(7), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(7), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER)

    // Player 8
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(8), 8)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(8), 8)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(8), ConvertPlayerColor(8))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(8), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(8), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(8), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER)

    // Player 9
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(9), 9)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(9), 9)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(9), ConvertPlayerColor(9))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(9), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(9), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(9), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER)

    // Player 10
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(10), 10)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(10), 10)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(10), ConvertPlayerColor(10))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(10), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(10), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(10), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER)

    // Player 11
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(11), 11)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(11), 11)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(11), ConvertPlayerColor(11))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(11), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(11), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(11), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER)

endfunction

function InitCustomTeams takes nothing returns nothing
    // Force: TRIGSTR_451
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(0), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(1), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(2), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(3), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(4), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(5), 0)

    // Force: TRIGSTR_980
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(6), 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(7), 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(8), 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(9), 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(10), 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(11), 1)

endfunction

function InitAllyPriorities takes nothing returns nothing

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(0, 1)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(1, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 1, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(2, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(2, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(2, 1, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(3, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 0, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 1, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(4, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 0, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 1, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(5, 1)
    call SetStartLocPrio(5, 0, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Main Initialization
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
function main takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraBounds(- 7680.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), - 11776.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM), 28288.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), 11264.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), - 7680.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), 11264.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), 28288.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), - 11776.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM))
    call SetDayNightModels("Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranTerrain\\DNCDalaranTerrain.mdl", "Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranUnit\\DNCDalaranUnit.mdl")
    call NewSoundEnvironment("Default")
    call SetAmbientDaySound("DalaranDay")
    call SetAmbientNightSound("DalaranNight")
    call SetMapMusic("Music", true, 0)
    call InitSounds()
    call CreateRegions()
    call CreateCameras()
    call CreateAllUnits()
    call InitBlizzard()


    call InitGlobals()
    call InitCustomTriggers()
    call RunInitializationTriggers()

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Configuration
//*
//***************************************************************************

function config takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetMapName("TRIGSTR_2334")
    call SetMapDescription("TRIGSTR_5327")
    call SetPlayers(12)
    call SetTeams(12)
    call SetGamePlacement(MAP_PLACEMENT_TEAMS_TOGETHER)

    call DefineStartLocation(0, - 6144.0, - 10752.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(1, - 1536.0, - 10752.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(2, 3072.0, - 10752.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(3, 7680.0, - 10752.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(4, 12288.0, - 10752.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(5, 16896.0, - 10752.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(6, - 6144.0, - 5120.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(7, - 1536.0, - 5120.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(8, 3072.0, - 5120.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(9, 7680.0, - 5120.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(10, 12288.0, - 5120.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(11, 16896.0, - 5120.0)

    // Player setup
    call InitCustomPlayerSlots()
    call InitCustomTeams()
    call InitAllyPriorities()
endfunction
